name: society
trans: n. 社会；交往；社团；社交界

sentences.english: technology and its effects on modern society
sentences.chinese: 科技及其对现代社会的影响

sentences.english: Children are the most vulnerable members of society .
sentences.chinese: 儿童是最脆弱的社会成员。

detailed_translations.english: people in general, considered in relation to the laws, organizations etc that make it possible for them to live together

sentences.english: The test was easy.
sentences.chinese: 考试很容易。

sentences.english: Finishing the task will not be easy.
sentences.chinese: 完成这项任务并不容易。

sentences.english: There must be an easier way to do that.
sentences.chinese: 一定有更容易的方法去做那件事。

sentences.english: instructions that are easy to follow
sentences.chinese: 易于掌握的使用说明

sentences.english: It would have been easy for the team to lose the game.
sentences.chinese: 球队本来是很容易会输掉这场比赛的。

sentences.english: Having you here does make things a lot easier for me.
sentences.chinese: 对我来说，有你在这里事情的确好办多了。

sentences.english: On the whole, Dad has had an easy life.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，爸爸过着安逸舒适的生活。

sentences.english: You can have an easy time of it now that the kids have all left home.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们都离开了家，你日子可以过得轻松了。

detailed_translations.english: not difficult to do, and not needing much effort

sentences.english: a rubbish bin
sentences.chinese: 垃圾桶

detailed_translations.english: food, paper etc that is no longer needed and has been thrown away

name: work
trans: n. 工作； 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
vt. 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
sentences.chinese: 他失业有两年了。

sentences.english: More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

name: sense
trans: n. 感觉，功能；观念；道理；理智

sentences.english: Cats have a very acute sense of hearing (= very good, so that they can hear even the smallest sound ) .
sentences.chinese: 猫的听觉非常敏锐。

sentences.english: Employees need the sense of being appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 雇员需要被赏识的感觉。

sentences.english: It was dark and he had completely lost his sense of direction.
sentences.chinese: 天黑了，他完全失去了方向感。

sentences.english: This is true in a general sense.
sentences.chinese: 从一般意义上来讲，这是对的。

sentences.english: Perhaps he sensed your distrust.
sentences.chinese: 也许他感觉到了你的不信任。

detailed_translations.chinese: 感官；感觉；理解力；判断力；意义
detailed_translations.english: one of the five natural powers of sight, hearing, feeling, taste, and smell, that give us information about the things around us
if you sense something, you feel that it exists or is true, without being told or having proof

name: conversation
trans: n. 交谈，会话；社交；交往，交际；会谈；（人与计算机的）人机对话

sentences.english: a telephone conversation
sentences.chinese: 电话交谈

sentences.english: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.chinese: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.english: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.chinese: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.english: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.chinese: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.english: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.chinese: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.english: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.chinese: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.english: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.english: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.chinese: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.english: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.chinese: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

detailed_translations.english: an informal talk in which people exchange news, feelings, and thoughts

sentences.english: The majority of union members voted in favour of a strike.
sentences.chinese: 大多数工会成员投票赞成罢工。

detailed_translations.english: a person or country that belongs to a group or organization

sentences.english: Katie had drawn a cottage with a little stream running next to it.
sentences.chinese: 凯蒂画了一间小茅舍，旁边流淌着一条小溪。

sentences.english: She asked the little girl to draw a picture of the man she’d spoken to.
sentences.chinese: 她让小女孩把刚才和她说话的那个男人画出来。

sentences.english: Keith was drawing a complicated-looking graph.
sentences.chinese: 基思在画一张看上去很复杂的图表。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to draw very well.
sentences.chinese: 我从来就画不好图画。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a picture of something using a pencil, pen etc

name: relative
trans: n. 亲戚；相关物； 关系词；亲缘植物
adj. 相对的；有关系的；成比例的

sentences.english: The relative merits of both approaches have to be considered.
sentences.chinese: 两种方法的相对优点都得考虑在内。

sentences.english: her opponent’s relative lack of experience
sentences.chinese: 她的对手相对来说缺少经验

sentences.english: You may think you’re poor, but it’s all relative (= you are not poor compared to some people ) .
sentences.chinese: 你可能认为自己很穷，但一切都是相对的。

detailed_translations.english: having a particular quality when compared with something else
a member of your family

name: ship
trans: vt. 运送，乘船；以船运送
vi. 上船；乘船旅行；当船员

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

sentences.english: I’m going out for a bit – I’ll see you later.
sentences.chinese: 我出去一会儿——回头见。

detailed_translations.english: after the time you are talking about or after the present time

name: perfect
trans: adj. 完美的；最好的；精通的

sentences.english: His English was perfect.
sentences.chinese: 他的英语很地道。

sentences.english: The car was in perfect condition.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车的车况极佳。

sentences.english: You’re very lucky to have perfect teeth.
sentences.chinese: 你能拥有一口完美的牙齿太幸运了。

sentences.english: a perfect performance
sentences.chinese: 完美的演出

sentences.english: In a perfect world, we wouldn’t need an army.
sentences.chinese: 在理想世界中，我们不需要军队。

detailed_translations.english: not having any mistakes, faults, or damage

sentences.english: Campbell’s broken leg will probably require surgery.
sentences.chinese: 坎贝尔的一条腿骨折，可能需要手术。

sentences.english: What’s required is a complete reorganization of the system.
sentences.chinese: 需要做的是彻底整顿整个系统。

sentences.english: Most house plants require regular watering.
sentences.chinese: 大多数室内盆栽植物需要定期浇水。

sentences.english: The bill failed to get the required number of votes.
sentences.chinese: 法案没有得到规定的票数。

detailed_translations.english: to need something

sentences.english: He asked permission to leave the room.
sentences.chinese: 他请求离开房间的许可。

sentences.english: They cannot leave the country without permission.
sentences.chinese: 没有许可他们不得离开这个国家。

detailed_translations.english: the act of allowing sb to do sth, especially when this is done by sb in a position of authority

name: opera
trans: n. 歌剧；歌剧院；歌剧团

sentences.english: We go to the opera (= go to a performance of opera ) regularly.
sentences.chinese: 我们常去听歌剧。

sentences.english: an opera singer
sentences.chinese: 歌剧演员

detailed_translations.english: a musical play in which all of the words are sung

sentences.english: What’s the best way to learn a language?
sentences.chinese: 学习语言的最佳方法是什么？

sentences.english: The teacher’s task is to help the pupil learn.
sentences.chinese: 老师的任务是帮助学生学习。

sentences.english: The student will learn from experience about the importance of planning.
sentences.chinese: 学生将从经验中学到制订计划的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: to gain knowledge of a subject or skill, by experience, by studying it, or by being taught

name: underwater
trans: adj. 在水中的；水面下的

sentences.english: an underwater camera
sentences.chinese: 水下摄影机

sentences.english: ...giant submarines able to travel at high speeds underwater.
sentences.chinese: …能在水下高速行驶的巨型潜艇。

sentences.english: Some stretches of beach are completely underwater at high tide.
sentences.chinese: 有些沙滩在涨潮时会完全被水淹没。

detailed_translations.english: below the surface of an area of water, or able to be used there
Something that exists or happens underwater exists or happens below the surface of the ocean, a river, or a lake

name: calm
trans: adj. 静的，平静的；沉着的
vi. 平静下来；镇定下来

sentences.english: Glen was calm and composed at the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 格伦在葬礼上表现得平静而镇定。

detailed_translations.english: relaxed and quiet, not angry, nervous, or upset
to become quiet and relaxed after you have been angry, excited, nervous, or upset, or to make someone become quiet and relaxed
a situation or time that is quiet and peaceful

sentences.english: When you have your simplified core concept ready, then build that core concept very quickly and cheaply.
sentences.chinese: 如果你已经将核心概念简化，那么非常快速并且廉价地构建这一概念。

sentences.english: He wore his medals with pride.
sentences.chinese: 他自豪地戴着奖章。

sentences.english: The people have a sense of pride in their community.
sentences.chinese: 人们对自己的社区有一种自豪感。

sentences.english: His heart swelled with pride when his daughter came in.
sentences.chinese: 女儿进来时他的内心充满了自豪感。

sentences.english: She felt a glow of pride when her name was announced for the prize.
sentences.chinese: 宣布她获奖时她感到非常自豪。

sentences.english: Success in sport is a source of national pride .
sentences.chinese: 体育方面的成就可以激发民族自豪感。

detailed_translations.english: a feeling that you are proud of something that you or someone connected with you has achieved
to be especially proud of something that you do well, or of a good quality that you have

name: age
trans: n. 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段
vt. 使成熟；使变老，使上年纪

sentences.english: Francis is the same age as me.
sentences.chinese: 弗朗西斯和我同年岁。

sentences.english: Experts disagree over the age of the drawings.
sentences.chinese: 专家对这些画作的年代意见不统一。

sentences.english: Dad retired at the age of 56.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸是在56岁时退休的。

sentences.english: We are living in the age of technology.
sentences.chinese: 我们生活在科技时代。

sentences.english: He was worried to see how much she’d aged.
sentences.chinese: 看到她苍老了许多，他很担心。

detailed_translations.english: the number of years someone has lived or something has existed
to start looking older or to make someone or something look older

name: dance
trans: adj. 舞蹈的；用于跳舞的

sentences.english: Come on, let’s dance.
sentences.chinese: 来吧，我们跳舞吧。

sentences.english: The words danced before her tired eyes.
sentences.chinese: 这些字在她疲乏的眼前晃动。

sentences.english: The waltz is an easy dance to learn.
sentences.chinese: 华尔兹这种舞很容易学。

detailed_translations.english: to move your body to the sound and rhythm of music
a special set of movements performed to a particular type of music

sentences.english: He undertook to finish the job by Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他答应在星期三以前完成这项工作。

sentences.english: They have to vacate their offices before Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 他们必须在星期三以前将办公室腾出来。

sentences.english: The foreign guests will call on you next Wednesday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 外宾将在下周星期三下午拜访你。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Tuesday and Thursday

sentences.english: The purpose is to build new houses for local people.
sentences.chinese: 目的是要为当地居民建造新的住宅。

sentences.english: The road took many years to build.
sentences.chinese: 这条路修了好几年。

sentences.english: They needed $3 million to build the bridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们需要300万美元来修建这座桥。

sentences.english: It is the female birds that build the nests.
sentences.chinese: 筑巢的是雌鸟。

sentences.english: She had built a reputation as a criminal lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 她已经树立起了刑事诉讼律师的声望。

sentences.english: She’s been busy building her career.
sentences.chinese: 她忙于创建自己的事业。

detailed_translations.english: to make something, especially a building or something large

name: suit
trans: n. 诉讼；恳求；套装，西装；一套外衣

sentences.english: Johnson has filed suit against her.
sentences.chinese: 约翰逊对她提起了诉讼。

sentences.english: a civil suit
sentences.chinese: 民事诉讼

sentences.english: There are countryside walks to suit everyone.
sentences.chinese: 有适合每个人的乡村步行路径。

detailed_translations.english: a problem or complaint that a person or company brings to a court of law to be settled
to be acceptable, suitable, or  convenient  for a particular person or in a particular situation

name: sixteenth
trans: adj. 第十六的；十六分之一的
num. 第十六；十六分之一

sentences.english: From the sixteenth of January to the seventh of February is our Winter Holiday.
sentences.chinese: 我们的寒假放假时间是从一月十六号截至到二月七日。

sentences.english: He became the sixteenth, and some say one of the greatest presidents this country ever had.
sentences.chinese: 他荣任第十六届美国总统，有些人说他是本世纪最伟大的总统之一。

detailed_translations.english: one of 16 equal parts of something
one of 16 equal parts of something

name: physical
trans: adj.  物理的；身体的；物质的；根据自然规律的，符合自然法则的

sentences.english: She was in constant physical pain.
sentences.chinese: 她一直感到身上疼痛。

sentences.english: the physical and emotional needs of young adults
sentences.chinese: 青年人的身心需求

sentences.english: people with severe physical disabilities
sentences.chinese: 身体重度残疾的人

sentences.english: Don’t be put off by his physical appearance .
sentences.chinese: 别因为他的外貌讨厌他。

sentences.english: He was obsessed with physical fitness .
sentences.chinese: 他对健身着了迷。

detailed_translations.english: related to someone’s body rather than their mind or emotions

name: hero
trans: n. 英雄；男主角，男主人公

sentences.english: He had dared to speak out against injustice, and overnight he became a national hero .
sentences.chinese: 他敢于站出来抨击不公正的现象，一夜之间就成了国家英雄。

sentences.english: His father was a war hero , a former fighter pilot.
sentences.chinese: 他父亲是一位战争英雄，曾经是战斗机飞行员。

sentences.english: the unsung heroes who drove convoys of aid to Bosnia
sentences.chinese: 运载援助物品到波斯尼亚的那些无名英雄

sentences.english: A man hailed as a hero for 50 years has been unmasked as a traitor.
sentences.chinese: 50年来一直被誉为英雄的人被揭发为叛徒。

sentences.english: The hero of Doctor Zhivago dies in 1929.
sentences.chinese: 《日瓦戈医生》的男主人公于1929年去世。

detailed_translations.english: a man who is admired for doing something extremely brave

name: television
trans: n. 电视，电视机；电视业

sentences.english: Lucy turned on the television to watch the evening news.
sentences.chinese: 露西打开电视收看晚间新闻。

sentences.english: They have a television in every room.
sentences.chinese: 他们每个房间都配有电视。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of electronic equipment shaped like a box with a screen, on which you can watch programmes

name: present
trans: vt. 提出；介绍；呈现；赠送

sentences.english: She was presented with an award .
sentences.chinese: 她被授予一个奖项。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone, for example at a formal or official occasion

name: clever
trans: adj. 聪明的；机灵的；熟练的

sentences.english: a clever man
sentences.chinese: 聪明的人

detailed_translations.english: able to learn and understand things quickly

sentences.english: He wanted to ask her, but he didn’t dare.
sentences.chinese: 他想问她，但又不敢。

sentences.english: ‘I’ll tell Dad.’ ‘You wouldn’t dare!’
sentences.chinese: “我要告诉爸爸。” “谅你也不敢！”

sentences.english: How dare you accuse me of lying!
sentences.chinese: 你竟敢说我撒谎！

detailed_translations.english: to be brave enough to do something that is risky or that you are afraid to do – used especially in questions or negative sentences

name: at
trans: prep. 在（表示存在或出现的地点、场所、位置、空间）；以（某种价格、速度等）；向；达；因为；朝；忙于
n. 阿特（老挝货币基本单位att）；砹（极不稳定放射性元素）

sentences.english: They live at 18 Victoria Street.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在维多利亚街18 号。

sentences.english: Does this train stop at Preston?
sentences.chinese: 这列火车在普雷斯顿停吗？

sentences.english: I was waiting at the bus stop.
sentences.chinese: 我在公共汽车站等着。

sentences.english: Liz and her friend sat down at a corner table.
sentences.chinese: 莉兹和她的朋友在靠角落的一张桌子旁坐下。

sentences.english: Turn left at the church.
sentences.chinese: 在教堂那里朝左转。

sentences.english: We’ll meet at Harry’s (=  at Harry’s house  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们将在哈里家碰头。

sentences.english: I spent an unpleasant hour at the dentist’s.
sentences.chinese: 我在牙医诊所度过了难熬的一小时。

sentences.english: The film starts at 8 o'clock.
sentences.chinese: 电影8点钟开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to say exactly where something or someone is, or where something happens

sentences.english: Littman refused to discuss the case publicly.
sentences.chinese: 利特曼拒绝公开讨论此案。

sentences.english: If you would like to discuss the matter further, please call me.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想进一步讨论此事，请打电话给我。

sentences.english: This topic will be discussed in Chapter 4.
sentences.chinese: 该主题将在第四章进行详述。

detailed_translations.english: to talk about something with another person or a group in order to exchange ideas or decide something

name: nearly
trans: adv. 差不多，几乎；密切地

sentences.english: It took nearly two hours to get here.
sentences.chinese: 到这里花了将近两小时。

sentences.english: Michelle’s nearly twenty.
sentences.chinese: 米歇尔年近二十。

sentences.english: Is the job nearly finished?
sentences.chinese: 这工作快干完了吗？

sentences.english: Louise is nearly as tall as her mother.
sentences.chinese: 路易丝差不多和她母亲一样高。

sentences.english: I nearly always go home for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我几乎总是回家吃午饭。

sentences.english: He very nearly died.
sentences.chinese: 他差点送命。

detailed_translations.english: almost, but not quite or not completely

sentences.english: Would you like some bread with your soup?
sentences.chinese: 你喝汤时要吃点面包吗？

sentences.english: a loaf of brown bread
sentences.chinese: 一条黑面包

sentences.english: a piece of bread and butter
sentences.chinese: 一块黄油面包

detailed_translations.english: a type of food made from flour and water that is mixed together and then baked

name: funny
trans: n. 滑稽人物；笑话，有趣的故事；滑稽连环漫画栏；（英）（比赛用）单人双桨小艇
adj. 有趣的，好笑的，滑稽的；（口）稀奇的，古怪的，奇异的；有病的，不舒服的；狡猾的，欺骗（性）的，可疑的，不光明

sentences.english: the funniest man in Britain
sentences.chinese: 英国最滑稽的男人

sentences.english: If this is your idea of a joke, I don’t find it at all funny .
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得这是个玩笑，那我认为它一点也不好笑。

sentences.english: Luckily, when I explained the situation, he saw the funny side (= recognized that it was partly funny ) .
sentences.chinese: 好在我把情况解释了以后，他看到了好笑的一面。

sentences.english: His laughter stopped her mid-sentence. ‘ What’s so funny? ’ she demanded.
sentences.chinese: 他的笑声打断了她的话。“有什么好笑的？”她厉声问道。

sentences.english: What’s that funny smell?
sentences.chinese: 那是什么怪味？

detailed_translations.english: making you laugh

name: gentleman
trans: n. 先生；绅士；有身份的人

sentences.english: Could you serve this gentleman please, Miss Bath?
sentences.chinese: 巴思小姐，请你接待一下这位先生好吗？

sentences.english: Good morning, ladies and gentlemen .
sentences.chinese: 早上好，女士们，先生们。

sentences.english: An elderly gentleman was asleep next to the fire.
sentences.chinese: 一位老先生在火炉旁边睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a polite word for a man, used especially when talking to or about a man you do not know

name: office
trans: n. 办公室；政府机关；官职；营业处

sentences.english: The department occupies an office just a mile from the White House.
sentences.chinese: 该部门就在离白宫一英里远的地方有个办公楼。

sentences.english: Did you go to the office (= the office where you work ) today?
sentences.chinese: 今天你去办公室了吗？

sentences.english: the increased demand for office space
sentences.chinese: 对办公室空间日益增长的需求

sentences.english: the Foreign Office
sentences.chinese: 外交部

detailed_translations.english: a building that belongs to a company or organization, with rooms where people can work at desks

sentences.english: sixty years ago
sentences.chinese: 六十年前

detailed_translations.english: the number

name: politely
trans: adv. 有礼貌地；客气地；委婉地；殷勤地

sentences.english: Another thing, you should do is politely tell why could this happen, and what to do next.
sentences.chinese: 还有一件事情需要注意，你应该客气地告诉他们为什么会发生这个问题，下一步该怎么做。

name: memory
trans: n. 记忆，记忆力；内存， 存储器；回忆

sentences.english: He has lots of happy memories of his stay in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 他对在日本逗留的那段时光有许多美好的回忆。

sentences.english: The data is stored in the computer’s memory.
sentences.chinese: 数据储存在电脑的存储器里

detailed_translations.english: something that you remember from the past about a person, place, or experience

name: move
trans: n. 移动；步骤；迁居；策略
vi. 移动；搬家，迁移；离开

sentences.english: Please keep the doors closed while the train is moving.
sentences.chinese: 火车行驶时请保持车门关闭。

sentences.english: ‘Come on,’ Sue said. No one moved.
sentences.chinese: “来吧。”休说。但没有人动。

sentences.english: Could you move your car, please? It’s blocking the road.
sentences.chinese: 你能把车挪一下吗？挡着路了。

sentences.english: Becca moved down the steps and into the yard.
sentences.chinese: 贝卡走下台阶，来到院子里。

sentences.english: The bar was so crowded you could hardly move .
sentences.chinese: 酒吧很挤，人都难以挪动。

sentences.english: His speech moved the audience to tears.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲让听众感动得落泪。

sentences.english: He made no move to come any nearer.
sentences.chinese: 他没有再靠近。

detailed_translations.english: to change from one place or position to another, or to make something do this
when someone moves for a short time in a particular direction

name: theme
trans: adj. 以奇想主题布置的

sentences.english: The book’s theme is the conflict between love and duty.
sentences.chinese: 本书的主题是爱与责任之间的冲突。

sentences.english: Freia’s theme in Wagner’s opera
sentences.chinese: 瓦格纳歌剧中的弗莱雅主旋律

detailed_translations.chinese: 题目；主题；主旋律；（句子的）主位；词干
detailed_translations.english: the main subject or idea in a piece of writing, speech, film etc

name: sad
trans: adj. 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）

sentences.english: The relationship had been important to me and its loss left me feeling sad and empty.
sentences.chinese: 这种关系对我一直都很重要，失去它让我感到难过而空虚。

sentences.english: I'm sad that Julie's marriage is on the verge of splitting up.
sentences.chinese: 我为朱莉的婚姻处于破裂的边缘感到难过。

detailed_translations.english: If you are sad, you feel unhappy, usually because something has happened that you do not like

sentences.english: Whenever I have a cold I get a nosebleed.
sentences.chinese: 每次我一感冒都会流鼻血。

detailed_translations.english: if you have a nosebleed, blood starts flowing from your nose

sentences.english: The parliament building sits in a large square.
sentences.chinese: 议会大楼位于一个大广场上。

sentences.english: He’s got a computer sitting on his desk, but he doesn’t use it.
sentences.chinese: 他有一台电脑放在书桌上，但他不用。

sentences.english: My climbing boots were sitting unused in a cupboard.
sentences.chinese: 我的登山靴在橱柜里，一直没有穿。

sentences.english: The house has sat empty for two years.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子已经空置两年了。

detailed_translations.english: to be in a particular position or condition

detailed_translations.chinese: (Sit)人名；(东南亚国家华语)硕；(罗)西特

name: festival
trans: n. 节日；庆祝，纪念活动；欢乐
adj. 节日的，喜庆的；快乐的

sentences.english: the Swansea Festival of Music and the Arts
sentences.chinese: 斯旺西音乐艺术节

sentences.english: Christmas is one of the main festivals in the Christian Calendar.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节是基督教历的重大节日之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔电影、戏剧、音乐等的〕节，节庆，会演；节日
detailed_translations.english: an occasion when there are performances of many films, plays, pieces of music etc, usually happening in the same place every year

name: achievement
trans: n. 成就；完成；达到；成绩

sentences.english: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.chinese: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.english: As we climbed the final few metres, we felt a sense of achievement.
sentences.chinese: 我们攀登最后几米的时候，有一种成就感。

detailed_translations.english: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts

name: interesting
trans: adj. 有趣的；引起兴趣的，令人关注的

sentences.english: That’s an interesting question.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个有趣的问题。

sentences.english: a really interesting TV programme
sentences.chinese: 十分有趣的电视节目

sentences.english: Did you meet any interesting people?
sentences.chinese: 你见过什么有意思的人吗？

sentences.english: It’s interesting that no one remembers seeing the car.
sentences.chinese: 竟然没人记得见过这辆车，真是有趣。

detailed_translations.english: attracting your attention because it is special, exciting or unusual

sentences.english: The nation’s fuel supplies will not last forever.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家的燃料供应不会无穷无尽。

sentences.english: To protect the food supply , the government ordered the slaughter of affected cattle.
sentences.chinese: 为保护食品供应，政府下令宰杀被感染的牛。

detailed_translations.english: an amount of something that is available to be used

sentences.english: He came at me like a tiger.
sentences.chinese: 他像老虎一般地向我冲过来。

sentences.english: Or tiger ?
sentences.chinese: 或者老虎？

detailed_translations.english: a large wild animal that has yellow and black lines on its body and is a member of the cat family

name: freezing
trans: adj. 冰冻的；严寒的；冷冻用的

sentences.english: It’s freezing in this house. Can’t I turn on the heating?
sentences.chinese: 房子里冷极了，我不可以开暖气吗？

sentences.english: We were freezing cold in the tent last night.
sentences.chinese: 昨晚我们在帐篷里都冻僵了。

sentences.english: freezing fog
sentences.chinese: 冰雾

detailed_translations.english: extremely cold

sentences.english: a geography lesson
sentences.chinese: 地理课

detailed_translations.english: the study of the countries, oceans, rivers, mountains, cities etc of the world

name: run
trans: n. 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
vt. 管理，经营；运行；参赛

sentences.english: For a while, she ran a restaurant in Boston.
sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.english: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.english: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.english: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

sentences.english: a state-run (= controlled by the government ) television station
sentences.chinese: 国营电视台

detailed_translations.english: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country

detailed_translations.chinese: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
detailed_translations.english: to be very busy and continuously rushing about

name: story
trans: n. 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话
vt. 用历史故事画装饰

sentences.english: a book of short stories
sentences.chinese: 短篇小说集

sentences.english: We cuddled together over a bedtime story .
sentences.chinese: 我们依偎在一起看睡前故事。

sentences.english: The film was based on a true story .
sentences.chinese: 这部影片是根据真实故事改编的。

sentences.english: Don’t be frightened – it’s only a story (= it is imaginary ) .
sentences.chinese: 别害怕，这只是一个故事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 故事；小说；新闻报道；来历；假话
detailed_translations.english: a description of how something happened, that is intended to entertain people, and may be true or imaginary
to decorate (a pot, wall, etc) with scenes from history or legends

sentences.english: Last year they sold twice as many computers as their competitors.
sentences.chinese: 去年他们的计算机销量是竞争对手的两倍。

detailed_translations.english: a person, team, company etc that is competing with another

name: glad
trans: adj. 高兴的；乐意的；令人高兴的；灿烂美丽的

sentences.english: We’re so glad you came.
sentences.chinese: 你来了我们真高兴。

sentences.english: ‘I’ve decided to accept the job.’ ‘I’m glad.’
sentences.chinese: “我决定接受这份工作。”“我很高兴。”

sentences.english: I’d be glad if you’d let me know when the funeral is.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能告诉我葬礼的时间，我将非常感激。

detailed_translations.english: pleased and happy about something

name: attention
trans: n. 注意力；关心；立正！（口令）

sentences.english: My attention wasn’t really on the game.
sentences.chinese: 我的注意力其实不在比赛上。

sentences.english: She tried to pay attention to what he was saying.
sentences.chinese: 她尽量注意听他说话。

sentences.english: If you paid more attention in class, you might actually learn something!
sentences.chinese: 要是你上课更认真些，也许能实实在在地学到些东西！

sentences.english: Scott sat down at his desk and turned his attention to the file he had in front of him.
sentences.chinese: 斯科特在自己的办公桌前坐下，将注意力转向面前的文件。

sentences.english: As a society we need to give more attention to the needs of older people.
sentences.chinese: 生活在同一社会里，我们得更加关注长者的需求。

sentences.english: Now he’s gone, I can give you my undivided attention .
sentences.chinese: 现在他已经走了，我可以把全部注意力都放在你身上。

sentences.english: This game is fun and is sure to keep the attention of any young student.
sentences.chinese: 这个游戏很有趣，一定能使年幼学生保持注意力。

sentences.english: They listened to the speech with close attention .
sentences.chinese: 他们很认真地听演讲。

sentences.english: Attention to detail is essential in this job.
sentences.chinese: 关注细节是这份工作所必需的。

sentences.english: During the lecture Sarah’s attention began to wander .
sentences.chinese: 上课时，萨拉开始走神了。

detailed_translations.english: when you carefully listen to, look at, or think about someone or something

name: energy
trans: n.  能量；精力；活力；精神

sentences.english: Where do those kids get their energy from?
sentences.chinese: 那些孩子哪来这么多精力？

sentences.english: I really put a lot of energy into what I do.
sentences.chinese: 我做起事来总是投入很大精力。

sentences.english: kinetic energy
sentences.chinese: 动能

detailed_translations.english: the physical and mental strength that makes you able to do things

sentences.english: There is built-in storage space in all bedrooms.
sentences.chinese: 所有卧室里都有内置储藏空间。

sentences.english: the restaurant that Hugh and all his friends go to
sentences.chinese: 休和他所有的朋友们去的那家饭馆

detailed_translations.english: the whole of an amount, thing, or type of thing
the whole of a particular group or thing or to everyone or everything of a particular kind

name: tail
trans: n. 尾巴；踪迹；辫子；燕尾服
adj. 从后面而来的；尾部的

sentences.english: The dog wagged its tail .
sentences.chinese: 那条狗摇了摇尾巴。

detailed_translations.english: the part that sticks out at the back of an animal’s body, and that it can move

name: knowledgeable
trans: adj. 知识渊博的，有知识的；有见识的；聪明的

sentences.english: Do you think you are more knowledgeable about life than your parents were at your age?
sentences.chinese: 父母在你这个年龄时，你认为你比他们更了解生活吗？

detailed_translations.chinese: 知识渊博的，有知识的；有见识的；聪明的
detailed_translations.english: knowing a lot

sentences.english: ...the laws of physics.
sentences.chinese: …物理学定律。

detailed_translations.english: the science concerned with the study of physical objects and substances, and of natural forces such as light, heat, and movement

name: final
trans: n. 决赛；期末考试；当日报纸的末版
adj. 最终的；决定性的；不可更改的

sentences.english: The final episode will be shown tonight.
sentences.chinese: 最后一集将于今晚播出。

sentences.english: students preparing for their final examinations
sentences.chinese: 正在准备期末考试的学生

sentences.english: Stone is filming the final instalment of his Vietnam trilogy.
sentences.chinese: 斯通正在拍摄越战三部曲的最后一部。

sentences.english: the final stages in their relationship
sentences.chinese: 他们之间关系的最后阶段

sentences.english: They scored in the final minutes of the game.
sentences.chinese: 他们在比赛的最后几分钟得分。

sentences.english: We can advise the client, but in the end it is he who has the final say.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以提出建议，但是最终的决定权还是在客户自己手里。

detailed_translations.english: last in a series of actions, events, parts of a story etc

name: chicken
trans: n. 鸡肉；小鸡；胆小鬼，懦夫
adj. 鸡肉的；胆怯的；幼小的

sentences.english: Lionel built a coop so that they could raise chickens and have a supply of fresh eggs.
sentences.chinese: 莱昂内尔搭建了一个鸡笼，这样他们就可以养鸡，得到新鲜鸡蛋。

sentences.english: roast chicken
sentences.chinese: 烤鸡

detailed_translations.english: a common farm bird that is kept for its meat and eggs

name: let
trans: vt. 允许，让；出租；假设；妨碍

sentences.english: I can’t come out tonight – my dad won’t let me.
sentences.chinese: 今天晚上我不能出来，我爸爸不允许。

detailed_translations.english: to allow someone to do something

sentences.english: Tim’s good at math and science.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆的数学和自然科学很好。

sentences.english: a set of simple math problems
sentences.chinese: 一组简单的数学题

sentences.english: She’s learning calculus in math class.
sentences.chinese: 她在数学班学微积分。

sentences.english: a math test
sentences.chinese: 数学测验

detailed_translations.english: mathematics

name: shame
trans: n. 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人

sentences.english: He felt a deep sense of shame.
sentences.chinese: 他深深地感到羞愧。

sentences.english: Maria blushed with shame.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚羞得脸都红了。

sentences.english: (= it made her feel ashamed ) , she gained back all the weight she’d lost.
sentences.chinese: 让她感到惭愧的是，她减掉的体重全又长回来了。

sentences.english: He’s brought shame on the whole family.
sentences.chinese: 他使全家蒙羞。

sentences.english: (= it should not make you feel ashamed ) saying ‘I don’t know’.
sentences.chinese: 说一句"我不知道”也没什么可难为情的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 羞耻，羞愧；憾事，带来耻辱的人
detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you feel guilty and embarrassed because you, or someone who is close to you, have done something wrong
to make someone feel ashamed

name: out
trans: adv. 出现；在外；出局；出声地；不流行地
adj. 外面的；出局的；下台的

sentences.english: She opened her suitcase and took out a pair of shoes.
sentences.chinese: 她打开手提箱，拿出一双鞋。

sentences.english: Lock the door on your way out.
sentences.chinese: 你出去时把门锁上。

sentences.english: Charlotte went to the window and looked out.
sentences.chinese: 夏洛特走到窗前往外看。

sentences.english: Out you go (= used to order someone to leave a room )!
sentences.chinese: 你给我出去！

sentences.english: When the sun came out, a rainbow formed in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 太阳出来时，天空中出现了一道彩虹。

detailed_translations.english: from inside an object, container, building, or place

sentences.english: I didn’t really know your name – it was just a lucky guess.
sentences.chinese: 我并不知道你的名字―只是运气好猜中的。

sentences.english: a lucky charm
sentences.chinese: 吉祥符

detailed_translations.english: having good luck

name: peaceful
trans: adj. 和平的，爱好和平的；平静的

sentences.english: We had a peaceful afternoon without the children.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们不在，我们度过了一个宁静的下午。

sentences.english: It’s very peaceful out here in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 这树林里真安静。

sentences.english: the use of nuclear power for peaceful purposes
sentences.chinese: 核能的和平利用

detailed_translations.english: a peaceful time, place, or situation is quiet and calm without any worry or excitement

sentences.english: Our cow is carrying again.
sentences.chinese: 我家的母牛又怀胎了。

sentences.english: The cow is expected to calve next week.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛预期下周生小牛。

sentences.english: The cow cast a calf.
sentences.chinese: 这头母牛早产了。

detailed_translations.english: a large female animal that is kept on farms and used to produce milk or meat

name: paragliding
trans: n. 高崖跳伞运动；滑翔伞运动

sentences.english: Adventurous travelers can go heli-skiing, paragliding and bungee jumping.
sentences.chinese: 好冒险的旅行者可以去高山滑雪，空中滑翔跳伞和蹦极。

detailed_translations.english: a sport in which you jump off a hill or out of a plane and use a  parachute  to fly for long distances before floating back down to the ground

name: note
trans: n. 笔记；音符；票据；注解；纸币；便笺；照会；调子

sentences.english: Dave made a note of her address and phone number.
sentences.chinese: 戴夫记下了她的地址和电话号码。

sentences.english: I was going to write Kathy a note, but I decided to call her instead.
sentences.chinese: 我原来准备给凯茜写个便条，但又决定还是打电话给她。

sentences.english: The notes are at the back of the book.
sentences.chinese: 注解在书末。

detailed_translations.english: something that you write down to remind you of something

sentences.english: She climbed up the ladder.
sentences.chinese: 她爬上梯子。

sentences.english: He hurt himself falling off a ladder.
sentences.chinese: 他从梯子上摔下来受了伤。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment used for climbing up to or down from high places. A ladder has two bars that are connected by rungs(= short bars that you use as steps ) .

name: close
trans: adj. 紧密的；亲密的；亲近的

sentences.english: Would you mind if I closed the window?
sentences.chinese: 我把窗户关上你不介意吧？

sentences.english: She closed the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 她拉上了窗帘。

sentences.english: Let me do the car door – it won’t close properly.
sentences.chinese: 我来修一下车门，它关不紧。

sentences.english: Beth closed her eyes and tried to sleep.
sentences.chinese: 贝丝合上眼睛想睡觉。

sentences.english: She heard the door close behind her.
sentences.chinese: 她听见门在她身后关上了。

sentences.english: I will now close the meeting by asking you to join me in a final toast.
sentences.chinese: 现在我要请大家最后干一杯来结束这次会议。

detailed_translations.english: to shut something in order to cover an opening, or to become shut in this way

sentences.english: a tidy desk
sentences.chinese: 整洁的书桌

sentences.english: I try to keep the garden tidy .
sentences.chinese: 我尽量保持花园整洁。

sentences.english: Ellen’s room is always neat and tidy .
sentences.chinese: 埃伦的房间总是非常整洁。

detailed_translations.english: a room, house, desk etc that is tidy is neatly arranged with everything in the right place
to make a place look tidy

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: He’s taken the dog for a walk .
sentences.chinese: 他去遛狗了。

sentences.english: We used to have a dog when I was young.
sentences.chinese: 我小时候我们养过狗。

sentences.chinese: 最受人喜欢的犬种

name: degree
trans: n. 程度，等级；度；学位；阶层

sentences.chinese: 报纸重宣传轻资讯的程度各不相同。

sentences.chinese: 女孩转眼消失在人群中。

sentences.chinese: 我能听到灌木丛中某个地方传来说话的声音。

sentences.chinese: 我们走在山坡上的栗树林中。

vt. 把（电线） 接地；盖（土）；追赶入洞穴

sentences.chinese: 爵士乐俱乐部

sentences.chinese: 现代爵士乐

sentences.chinese: 暑假期间你在家吗？

sentences.chinese: 要是有人在街上抢劫你，你会怎么办？

sentences.chinese: 在接到命令之前，部队不会前进。

sentences.chinese: 卢克把它们卖了吗？如果是这样的话，那钱到哪里去了？

sentences.english: ‘Look – I’ve even cleaned the windows.’ ‘ So I see .’
sentences.chinese: “瞧，我把窗子也擦干净了。”“我看到了。”

vi. 玩保龄球；滑动；平稳快速移动

sentences.english: Mix all the ingredients thoroughly in a large bowl.
sentences.chinese: 将所有配料放在大碗里搅拌均匀。

sentences.english: Fill the bowl with water.
sentences.chinese: 在碗里装满水。

sentences.chinese: 军方可能觉得无法在明年把政权移交给一位民选总统。

sentences.chinese: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

sentences.chinese: 历史学家在日期上画了一条水平线来记住这天。

name: French
trans: adj. 法国的；法语的；法国人的

sentences.chinese: 上等的法国葡萄酒

sentences.chinese: 尽量多吃新鲜水果。

sentences.english: a large garden with fruit trees
sentences.chinese: 种了果树的大花园

sentences.chinese: 他们有两个女孩和一个男孩。

detailed_translations.english: a female child

name: busy
trans: adj. 忙碌的；热闹的；正被占用的

sentences.english: She’s busy now – can you phone later?
sentences.chinese: 她现在正忙，你稍后打来好吗？

sentences.english: a busy mother of four

sentences.english: There were lots of activities to keep the kids busy .
sentences.chinese: 有很多活动可以让孩子们不闲着。

sentences.english: December is the busiest time of year for shops.
sentences.chinese: 十二月份是一年中商店最繁忙的时期。

detailed_translations.english: if you are busy, you are working hard and have a lot of things to do

name: classic
trans: n. 名著；经典著作；大艺术家
adj. 经典的；古典的，传统的；最优秀的

sentences.english: The Coca-Cola bottle is one of the classic designs of the last century.
sentences.chinese: 可口可乐瓶是上个世纪的经典设计之一。

detailed_translations.chinese: 最优秀的，典型的，标准的；传统式样的，典雅的
detailed_translations.english: having all the features that are typical or expected of a particular thing or situation

detailed_translations.chinese: 文学名著， 经典作品， 杰作； 优秀的典范； 古典文学， 古典语文研究
detailed_translations.english: a book, play, or film that is important and has been admired for a long time

name: product
trans: n. 产品；结果； 乘积；作品

sentences.english: The London factory assembles the finished product .
sentences.chinese: 伦敦工厂组装成品。

sentences.english: He works in marketing and product development.
sentences.chinese: 他从事营销和产品开发。

sentences.english: Paula was the product of a sheltered middle-class home.
sentences.chinese: 葆拉是备受呵护的中产阶级家庭的产物。

sentences.english: The product of 21 and 16 is 336.

detailed_translations.english: something that is grown or made in a factory in large quantities, usually in order to be sold

name: ride
trans: n. 骑；乘坐；交通工具；可供骑行的路；（乘坐汽车等的）旅行；乘骑；（乘车或骑车的）短途旅程；供乘骑的游乐设施
vi. 骑马；乘车；依靠；漂浮
vt. 骑；乘；控制；（骑马、自行车等）穿越；搭乘；飘浮

sentences.english: She learned to ride when she was seven.
sentences.chinese: 她七岁时学会了骑马。

sentences.english: He was riding a large grey mare.
sentences.chinese: 他骑着一匹灰色的大母马。

sentences.english: He prefers travelling on the subway to riding in a limousine.
sentences.chinese: 他宁愿乘坐地铁出行而不愿乘坐豪华加长轿车。

sentences.english: She took some friends for a ride in the family car.
sentences.chinese: 她用私家车载了朋友们一程。

detailed_translations.english: to sit on an animal, especially a horse, and make it move along
a trip on a horse or bicycle, or in a vehicle.

name: brand
trans: vt. 铭刻于，铭记；打烙印于；印…商标于

sentences.english: products which lack a strong brand image
sentences.chinese: 缺乏鲜明品牌形象的产品

sentences.english: The owner couldn't be bothered to brand the cattle.
sentences.chinese: 主人懒得给这牛打上烙印。

detailed_translations.english: a type of product made by a particular company, that has a particular name or design

detailed_translations.chinese: 铭刻， 打烙印于； 加污名于， 谴责
detailed_translations.english: When you brand an animal, you put a permanent mark on its skin in order to show who it belongs to, usually by burning a mark onto its skin

sentences.english: The waiter crumbed the table.
sentences.chinese: 服务员清除桌上的面包屑。

detailed_translations.english: a man who serves food and drink at the tables in a restaurant

name: invitation
trans: n. 邀请；引诱；请帖；邀请函

sentences.chinese: 在科学大会上发言的邀请

sentences.english: We sent out more than 300 wedding invitations.
sentences.chinese: 我们发出了超过300份婚礼请柬。

detailed_translations.english: a written or spoken request to someone, inviting them to go somewhere or do something

sentences.english: The rabbit disappeared in the bushes.
sentences.chinese: 那只兔子消失在树丛中。

sentences.english: At this time, a robust rabbit said: "No, or eat me !
sentences.chinese: 这时，一只健壮的兔子又说：“不，还是先吃我吧！

sentences.english: Mother rabbit told him that he was old enough to eat other food, but not keep pestering her to suckle.
sentences.chinese: 兔妈妈让他不要老缠着妈妈吃奶，他已经能够自己去吃些别的东西啦。

detailed_translations.english: a small animal with long ears and soft fur, that lives in a hole in the ground

sentences.english: I really admire the way she brings up those kids all on her own.
sentences.chinese: 我十分佩服她独力把那些孩子抚养大。

detailed_translations.english: to respect and like someone because they have done something that you think is good

sentences.english: Can you take a photo of me and Rachel?
sentences.chinese: 你能给我和雷切尔拍张照吗？

detailed_translations.english: a photograph

name: towel
trans: n. 毛巾，手巾； 纸巾

sentences.english: Have you got a clean towel I could use?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有干净毛巾给我用？

detailed_translations.english: a piece of cloth that you use for drying your skin or for drying things such as dishes
to dry yourself using a towel

name: flower
trans: vi. 成熟，发育；开花；繁荣；旺盛

sentences.english: a lovely rose bush with delicate pink flowers
sentences.chinese: 一簇开着娇嫩的粉红色花朵的美丽蔷薇

sentences.english: fields full of beautiful wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 开满美丽野花的田野

sentences.english: It was May, and the apple trees were all in flower.
sentences.chinese: 那是个5月，苹果树开满了花。

detailed_translations.english: a coloured or white part that a plant or tree produces before fruit or seeds

sentences.english: Have you almost finished?
sentences.chinese: 你差不多完成了吗？

sentences.english: Supper’s almost ready.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭就要做好了。

sentences.english: It was almost midnight.
sentences.chinese: 午夜将至。

sentences.english: Almost nothing was done to improve the situation.
sentences.chinese: 几乎没有采取什么措施来改善这个情况。

sentences.english: The story is almost certainly true.
sentences.chinese: 这故事几乎肯定是真实的。

sentences.english: He’s almost as old as I am.
sentences.chinese: 他差不多跟我一样大。

detailed_translations.english: nearly, but not completely or not quite

name: black
trans: adj. 黑色的；黑人的；邪恶的
vt. 使变黑；把鞋油等涂在…上；把（眼眶）打成青肿

sentences.english: a black evening dress
sentences.chinese: 黑色晚礼服

sentences.english: It was still pitch black (= very dark ) out.
sentences.chinese: 外面依然一片漆黑。

detailed_translations.english: having the darkest colour, like coal or night

sentences.english: The police are disappointed by the slow pro-gress of the investigation.
sentences.chinese: 警方对调查进度缓慢感到失望。

sentences.english: We made good progress despite the snow.
sentences.chinese: 尽管下雪，我们的行程还是很顺利。

sentences.english: I asked the nurse how my son was progressing.
sentences.chinese: 我询问护士我儿子身体恢复得如何。

detailed_translations.english: the process of getting better at doing something, or getting closer to finishing or achieving something

name: deep
trans: adj. 深的；低沉的；深奥的

sentences.chinese: 又深又窄的山谷

sentences.english: a deep wound
sentences.chinese: 很深的伤口

sentences.chinese: 她坐在一张很深的皮椅子里。

name: stone
trans: n. 石头；结石； 宝石
vt. 向扔石块；用石头铺

sentences.english: a stone wall
sentences.chinese: 石墙

sentences.english: stone steps
sentences.chinese: 石台阶

sentences.english: The floors are made of stone.
sentences.chinese: 地面是石头铺成的。

detailed_translations.english: a hard solid mineral substance
to throw stones at someone or something

sentences.english: They meet fairly often to play chess .
sentences.chinese: 他们经常在一起下国际象棋。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two players, who move their playing pieces according to particular rules across a special board to try to trap their opponent’s king

sentences.chinese: 这家公司的管理非常差。

sentences.chinese: 出了那次滑雪事故以后，他的腿跛得很厉害。

sentences.chinese: 他被打得连他哥哥都认不出他了。

sentences.english: The school is badly in need of (=  very much needs  ) some new computers.
sentences.chinese: 学校急需一些新电脑。

sentences.english: Things started to go badly wrong (=  go wrong in a serious way  ) for Eric after he lost his job.
sentences.chinese: 埃里克失去工作以后，一切都很不如意。

sentences.chinese: 他教我分数和计算。

sentences.chinese: 儿童的常见病她小时候都得过。

sentences.chinese: 她母亲重病后正在逐渐康复。

sentences.english: I’ve never missed a day’s work through illness.
sentences.chinese: 我从未因病耽误过一天工作。

name: material
trans: adj. 重要的；物质的，实质性的；肉体的
n. 材料，原料；物资；布料

sentences.english: materials like wood or stone
sentences.chinese: 木材或石头之类的材料

sentences.chinese: 有害的放射性材料

sentences.chinese: 从北美进口原材料的纸业公司

sentences.english: recycled material
sentences.chinese: 再生材料

sentences.english: Anita is collecting material for a novel.
sentences.chinese: 安妮塔正在收集小说素材。

sentences.english: a society that places high importance on material rewards
sentences.chinese: 重视物质回报的社会

detailed_translations.english: a solid substance such as wood, plastic, or metal

name: strong
trans: adj. 坚强的；强壮的；牢固的；擅长的

sentences.chinese: 他高大健壮。

sentences.english: Jack was tall and strong.
sentences.chinese: 杰克又高又壮。

sentences.english: I’m not strong enough to fight him.
sentences.chinese: 和他打我还不够强壮。

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of physical power so that you can lift heavy things, do hard physical work etc

sentences.chinese: 留下没走的几位客人都在厨房里。

sentences.chinese: 加入余下的原料，用文火炖30分钟。

v. 结婚，与…结婚（marry的过去式）

sentences.chinese: 你是已婚还是单身？

sentences.chinese: 他们已经结婚八年了。

sentences.chinese: 已婚男子比单身男子多挣70%。

sentences.chinese: 我们下个月结婚。

sentences.chinese: 她初到伦敦时刚结婚，而且没有工作。

sentences.chinese: 我感觉自己肯定通过这次测验了。

sentences.english: Many people look certain to lose their jobs.
sentences.chinese: 许多人看来肯定要失业了。

detailed_translations.english: confident and sure, without any doubts

trans: n. 圣诞节；圣诞节期间

sentences.english: Are you going home for Christmas?
sentences.chinese: 你回家过圣诞节吗？

sentences.english: a Christmas present
sentences.chinese: 圣诞礼物

sentences.english: the Christmas holidays
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节假期

sentences.english: Merry Christmas and a happy New Year everyone!
sentences.chinese: 祝大家圣诞快乐、新年快乐！

detailed_translations.english: the period of time around December 25th, the day when Christians celebrate the birth of Christ

name: broken
trans: v. 折断；打碎；损坏（break的过去分词）

sentences.english: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.english: a badly broken leg
sentences.chinese: 严重骨折的腿

sentences.english: Gibbs had an X-ray, which revealed no broken bones.
sentences.chinese: 吉布斯拍了X光片，显示没有骨折。

detailed_translations.english: in small pieces because it has been hit, dropped etc

sentences.chinese: 然后我说再见。

sentences.english: The boy waved goodbye to his grandmother.
sentences.chinese: 男孩向他的奶奶挥手再见。

sentences.english: If it ends great, it means both of you want more. If it ends otherwise, the next thing to do is to wave goodbye.
sentences.chinese: 如果结束得好，那么它意味着你们两个都想接触的时间更长；否则，接下来要做的事情就是挥手再见。

name: community
trans: n. 社区； 群落；共同体；团体

sentences.chinese: 这座新的艺术中心将为整个社区服务。

sentences.english: the Polish community in London
sentences.chinese: 在伦敦的波兰侨民团体

detailed_translations.english: the people who live in the same area, town etc

sentences.chinese: 你不能叫这种东西肉汁吧？

sentences.chinese: 你把肉汁泼到台布上了。

sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意的话，他们甚至会给你的三明治浇上肉汁。

sentences.chinese: 3个巨大的地球仪立在地板上。

sentences.chinese: 我们的商品出口到世界各地。

detailed_translations.english: the world

name: really
trans: adv. 实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）

sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？
