name: population
trans: n. 人口； 种群， 群体；全体居民

sentences.english: Nearly 70 percent of the population still live in the countryside.
sentences.chinese: 人口中差不多有70%仍住在乡村。

sentences.english: Most of the world’s population doesn’t get enough to eat.
sentences.chinese: 世界上大多数人都吃不饱。

detailed_translations.english: the number of people living in a particular area, country etc

name: cheap
trans: adj. 便宜的；小气的；不值钱的

sentences.english: cheap rail fares
sentences.chinese: 便宜的火车票

sentences.english: the cheapest TV on the market
sentences.chinese: 市场上最便宜的电视机

sentences.english: Property is cheaper in Spain than here.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的房地产比这里便宜。

sentences.english: a cheap shop (= one that sells goods cheaply )
sentences.chinese: 廉价商店

sentences.english: The equipment is relatively cheap and simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 这种设备相对比较便宜，而且操作简单。

sentences.english: Cheap wine gives me a headache.
sentences.chinese: 我喝劣质的葡萄酒会头痛。

detailed_translations.english: not at all expensive, or lower in price than you expected

sentences.chinese: 6月28日加州南部地区发生了里氏6.1级地震。

sentences.chinese: 该市位于地震带。

sentences.english: The residents are being asked to shoulder the costs of the repairs.
sentences.chinese: 居民们被要求承担这笔修理费用。

sentences.english: They shouldered the boat and took it down to the river.
sentences.chinese: 他们把船扛在肩上抬到河里。

sentences.chinese: 要惩罚孩子，不应该用打的方式。

sentences.english: He promised to punish severely any officials found guilty of electoral fraud.
sentences.chinese: 他承诺要严惩任何在选举中有欺诈行为的官员。

sentences.english: They deserve to be punished for putting passengers at risk.
sentences.chinese: 他们置乘客于危险之中，理应受到惩罚。

sentences.english: I felt I was being punished for what my mother had done.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得自己在为妈妈的所作所为接受惩罚。

name: rather
trans: int. 当然啦（回答问题时用）

sentences.english: I grew up in rather unusual circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 我在相当不寻常的环境中长大。

sentences.english: I'm afraid it's a rather long story.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕这是个相当长的故事。

sentences.english: I’d rather have a quiet night in front of the TV.
sentences.chinese: 我宁愿晚上安安静静地看看电视。

detailed_translations.english: fairly or to some degree

sentences.chinese: 这次试验产生了一些意想不到的结果。

sentences.english: Her death was totally unexpected.
sentences.chinese: 她的死完全出人意料。

sentences.chinese: 我是加文·威廉斯，在纽约联合国总部为您报道。

sentences.english: We aim to report the news as fairly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们力求公正地报道这一新闻。

sentences.english: The incident was widely reported in the national press.
sentences.chinese: 这一事件在全国的媒体上被广泛报道。

detailed_translations.english: to give people information about recent events, especially in newspapers and on television and radio

sentences.chinese: 男孩子们想踢足球。

sentences.english: boys and girls aged 11–18
sentences.chinese: 11到18岁之间的男孩和女孩

sentences.english: What a polite little boy (=  young male child  ) you are.
sentences.chinese: 你真是个有礼貌的小男孩。

sentences.english: Come on, Timmy, act like a big boy (=  an older boy  ) now.
sentences.chinese: 行了，蒂米，要有大男孩的样子了。

sentences.english: Good boy!
sentences.chinese: 好伙计！

detailed_translations.english: a male child, or a male person in general

name: British

sentences.english: the British government
sentences.chinese: 英国政府

detailed_translations.english: relating to Britain or its people

sentences.chinese: 我一直想学会讲日语。

sentences.english: one of my more able students
sentences.chinese: 我班上能力比较强的学生之一

detailed_translations.english: to have the skill, strength, knowledge etc needed to do something

trans: n. 学习，研究；课题；书房；学问

sentences.english: They had three children, if I remember rightly .
sentences.chinese: 如果我没记错，他们有三个孩子。

sentences.english: You left your keys on the table, remember?
sentences.chinese: 你把钥匙放在桌子上了，想起来了吗？

sentences.english: I hope he remembers the wine.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他记得带酒。

detailed_translations.english: to have a picture or idea in your mind of people, events, places etc from the past

name: fall
trans: vi. 落下；变成；来临；减弱

sentences.english: The tree was about to fall.
sentences.chinese: 那棵树快要倒下了。

sentences.english: The book fell from his hands.
sentences.chinese: 书从他手上跌落。

sentences.english: Enough rain had fallen to flood the grounds.
sentences.chinese: 雨量很大，淹没了地面。

sentences.english: She flushed and her eyes fell (= she looked down ) .
sentences.chinese: 她脸一红，垂下了眼帘。

detailed_translations.english: to move or drop down from a higher position to a lower position

sentences.english: Nora was an excellent gymnast in this country.
sentences.chinese: 诺拉是这个国家卓越的体操运动员。

sentences.english: I was 26 by then -- which is ancient for a male gymnast.
sentences.chinese: 我那时26岁，作为一名男子体操运动员已经太老了。

sentences.english: Ah, the perspective of the proud gymnast.
sentences.chinese: 嘿，自以为是的体操运动员的观点。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is good at gymnastics and competes against other people in gymnastics competitions

sentences.english: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子觉得与大人很难谈得来。

sentences.english: an adult lion
sentences.chinese: 一头成年的狮子

detailed_translations.english: a fully-grown person, or one who is considered to be legally responsible for their actions
fully grown or developed

name: spare
trans: vt. 节约，吝惜；饶恕；分出，分让
adj. 多余的；瘦的；少量的

sentences.english: Sorry, I can’t spare the time.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我抽不出时间。

sentences.english: Have you got any spare boxes?
sentences.chinese: 你有没有多余的盒子？

sentences.english: You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.chinese: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.english: Do you have any spare cash?
sentences.chinese: 你手头有闲钱吗？

sentences.english: I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.chinese: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.english: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.chinese: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

detailed_translations.english: to make something such as time, money, or workers available for someone, especially when this is difficult for you to do
not being used or not needed at the present time

sentences.english: Sharks were circling around our boat.
sentences.chinese: 鲨鱼在我们的小船周围游弋。

sentences.english: Beware the sharks when you are making up your mind how to invest.
sentences.chinese: 当你决定如何投资时要提防诈骗者。

detailed_translations.english: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans

sentences.english: The United States is north of the equator.
sentences.chinese: 美国位于赤道以北。

sentences.english: In the hot zone near the equator the sun heats the air continually; hence the air there ascends.
sentences.chinese: 在靠近赤道的热带地区，太阳不断地加热那里的空气，于是那里的热空气就上升。

detailed_translations.english: an imaginary line drawn around the middle of the Earth that is exactly the same distance from the North Pole and the South Pole

name: cheer
trans: n. 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事
vt. 欢呼；使高兴；为…加油

sentences.english: Everybody cheered when the firemen arrived.
sentences.chinese: 消防员到达时，大家都欢呼起来。

sentences.english: The audience was shouting and cheering.
sentences.chinese: 观众在呐喊欢呼。

sentences.english: The spectators cheered him wildly.
sentences.chinese: 观众拼命为他加油。

detailed_translations.english: to shout as a way of showing happiness, praise, approval, or support of someone or something

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢呼；愉快；心情；令人愉快的事
detailed_translations.english: a shout of happiness, praise, approval, or encouragement

sentences.english: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.english: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。

sentences.english: You need to touch up the poem.
sentences.chinese: 你需要给这首诗润色一下。

sentences.english: The poem was all the rage then.
sentences.chinese: 这首诗在当时十分流行。

sentences.english: His poem compares poorly with yours.
sentences.chinese: 他的诗做得不如你的好。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of writing that expresses emotions, experiences, and ideas, especially in short lines using words that  rhyme (= end with the same sound )

name: behave
trans: vi. 表现；（机器等）运转；举止端正；（事物）起某种作用
vt. 使守规矩；使表现得…

sentences.english: She behaved in a very responsible way .
sentences.chinese: 她表现得很有责任心。

sentences.english: I couldn't believe these people were behaving in this way.
sentences.chinese: 我无法相信这些人竟这样行事。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表现，举止；运转，做出反应
detailed_translations.english: to do things that are good, bad, sensible etc
The way that you behave is the way that you do and say things, and the things that you do and say

sentences.english: We still lack a pair of chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 还少一双筷子。

sentences.english: Before lunch he learned the foreigner how to use chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 午饭前他教那个外国人怎样使筷子。

sentences.english: If you want your friend to try something they should pick it up from your plate with their own chopsticks.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想让你的朋友尝尝某道菜时，应该让他们用他们自己的筷子从你的盘中夹。

name: not
trans: n. “非”（计算机中逻辑运算的一种）

sentences.english: Most of the stores do not open until 10 am.
sentences.chinese: 大多数商店要到上午10点才开始营业。

sentences.english: She’s not a very nice person.
sentences.chinese: 她为人不太好。

sentences.english: You were wrong not to inform the police.
sentences.chinese: 你没有通知警方是错误的。

sentences.english: ‘Can we go to the park?’ ‘No, not today, dear.’
sentences.chinese: “我们能去公园吗？”“不，今天不行，亲爱的。”

detailed_translations.english: used to make a word, statement, or question negative

name: cent
trans: n. 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）

sentences.english: A cup of rice which cost thirty cents a few weeks ago is now being sold for up to one dollar.
sentences.chinese: 几周前价值30美分的1杯米如今卖到了1美元。

detailed_translations.chinese: 分；一分的硬币；森特（等于半音程的百分之一）
detailed_translations.english: 1/100th of the standard unit of money in some countries. For example, there are 100 cents in one dollar or in one  euro  : symbol ¢.

name: fame
trans: n. 名声，名望；传闻，传说

sentences.english: He claims he is not really interested in fame.
sentences.chinese: 他称自己对出名真的没有兴趣。

detailed_translations.english: the state of being known about by a lot of people because of your achievements

name: beside
trans: prep. 在旁边；与…相比；和…无关

sentences.english: Wendy came up and sat beside me.
sentences.chinese: 温迪走过来，坐在我身边。

sentences.english: the table beside the bed
sentences.chinese: 床边的桌子

sentences.english: I was standing right beside her at the time.
sentences.chinese: 当时我就站在她的旁边。

detailed_translations.english: next to or very close to the side of someone or something

name: wrong
trans: adj. 错误的；失常的；不适当的
vt. 委屈；无理地对待；诽谤
adv. 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地

sentences.english: You’ve spelt my name wrong.
sentences.chinese: 你把我的名字拼错了。

sentences.english: What? Have I done it wrong ?
sentences.chinese: 什么？我做得不对吗？

sentences.english: I asked him to sort those files, but he’s done it all wrong (= in completely the wrong way ) .
sentences.chinese: 我让他整理这些文件，可是他弄得根本不对。

sentences.english: I must have added it up wrong, then.
sentences.chinese: 那我一定是加错了。

sentences.english: It looks like it's spelled wrong.
sentences.chinese: 看起来像是拼错了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误地；邪恶地，不正当地
detailed_translations.english: not in the correct way
behaviour that is not morally right

detailed_translations.chinese: 错误的；失常的；不适当的
detailed_translations.english: not correct, and not based on true facts
Wrong is also an adverb

sentences.english: I’ve looked everywhere but I can’t find the map.
sentences.chinese: 我到处都找过了，但就是找不到地图。

sentences.english: He’s travelled everywhere in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 他走遍了欧洲各地。

sentences.english: The south should remain dry, but everywhere else will have heavy rain.
sentences.chinese: 南部持续干旱，但其他地区会下暴雨。

detailed_translations.english: in or to every place

name: mobile phone
trans: 手机号码；行动电话；手提电话

sentences.english: mobile phone users
sentences.chinese: 移动电话用户

detailed_translations.english: a telephone that you can carry with you and use in any place

name: trick
trans: n. 诡计；恶作剧；窍门；花招；骗局；欺诈
adj. 特技的；欺诈的；有决窍的
vt. 欺骗；哄骗；装饰；打扮

sentences.english: Pretending he doesn’t remember is an old trick of his.
sentences.chinese: 假装不记得是他的老花招了。

sentences.english: He didn’t really lose his wallet - that’s just a trick.
sentences.chinese: 他并没有真的丢了钱包——这只是一个骗局。

sentences.english: The trick is to bend your knees as you catch the ball.
sentences.chinese: 诀窍是接球时要屈膝。

sentences.english: She knew she’d been tricked, but it was too late.
sentences.chinese: 她知道自己被骗了，但为时已晚。

detailed_translations.english: something you do in order to deceive someone
to deceive someone in order to get something from them or to make them do something

name: band
trans: n. 带，环； 波段；(演奏流行音乐的) 乐队

sentences.english: The band was playing old Beatles songs.
sentences.chinese: 乐队正在演奏披头士的老歌。

sentences.english: I grew up playing in rock bands.
sentences.chinese: 我是在摇滚乐队里玩音乐长大的。

sentences.english: Smith joined the band in 1989.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯在1989年加入这个乐队。

sentences.english: They formed a band when they were still at school.
sentences.chinese: 他们还在读书的时候就组建了一个乐队。

sentences.english: The entertainment includes a disco and live band .
sentences.chinese: 娱乐活动有跳迪斯科和乐队现场演奏。

sentences.english: interviews with band members
sentences.chinese: 对乐队成员的采访

detailed_translations.english: a group of musicians, especially a group that plays popular music

name: relief
trans: n. 救济；减轻，解除；安慰；浮雕

sentences.english: Marijuana can provide pain relief for some cancer patients.
sentences.chinese: 大麻可以为一些癌症患者减轻疼痛。

sentences.english: money raised for the relief effort
sentences.chinese: 为赈灾筹集的钱款

detailed_translations.english: when something reduces someone’s pain or unhappy feelings

name: gallery
trans: n. 画廊；走廊；旁听席；地道
vt. 在…修建走廊；在…挖地道

sentences.english: The bright modern painting stares out at you in the otherwise conservative gallery.
sentences.chinese: 有些古典派画廊也会陈列出明亮色彩的现代派绘画。

sentences.english: Statement and portrait together form a single image of a thinker. (See the interactive gallery, “Why Philosophy?
sentences.chinese: 陈述和肖像一起构成了一位思想家的独有影像。 （参见互动画廊，“何为哲学？”）

sentences.english: Whether you just want to browse our huge image gallery or want to share your personal photos with others, this is the site for you!
sentences.chinese: 无论你是想要浏览我们众多的画廊图片还是想要和其他人分享你的个人照片,这个网站绝对对你的味口。

detailed_translations.english: a small privately owned shop or studio where you can see and buy pieces of art

name: wash
trans: n. 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
vt. 洗涤；洗刷；冲走；拍打

sentences.english: Those jeans need a good wash (= a thorough wash ).
sentences.chinese: 那条牛仔裤要好好洗一洗了。

sentences.english: I’ll just have a quick wash before we go out.
sentences.chinese: 我很快洗个澡，然后我们就出门。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洗涤；洗的衣服；化妆水；冲积物
detailed_translations.english: an act of cleaning something using soap and water
to clean something using water and a type of soap

sentences.english: black boots with high heels
sentences.chinese: 有高跟的黑靴子

detailed_translations.english: the curved back part of your foot
(of a vessel) to lean over; list

name: truck
trans: vi. 驾驶卡车；以物易物

sentences.english: a truck driver
sentences.chinese: 卡车司机

detailed_translations.english: a large road vehicle used to carry goods

sentences.english: the family tomb
sentences.chinese: 家族坟墓

detailed_translations.english: a stone structure above or below the ground where a dead person is buried

name: pierce
trans: vt. 刺穿；洞察；响彻；深深地打动

sentences.english: Steam the corn until it can easily be pierced with a fork.
sentences.chinese: 把玉米蒸到用叉子可以轻易扎透。

sentences.english: Rose underwent emergency surgery after a bullet pierced her lung.
sentences.chinese: 罗丝被子弹射穿肺部，接受了紧急手术。

detailed_translations.english: to make a small hole in or through something, using an object with a sharp point
to make a small hole in or through something, using an object with a sharp point

name: choice
trans: n. 选择；选择权；精选品
adj. 精选的；仔细推敲的

sentences.english: I think London was a good choice as a venue.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得伦敦是个很好的选址。

sentences.english: choice steak
sentences.chinese: 上等牛排

detailed_translations.english: the person or thing that someone chooses
(especially of food) of very good quality

sentences.english: I like ice cream and cookies as much as the next guy. But I hate how it makes me feel afterward.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冰淇淋和曲奇，但我又讨厌吃完之后所带给我的感受，疲倦，瞌睡，精力不集中等等。

sentences.english: If you enjoy chocolate ice cream, as I do, when confronted with a tub of it would you also enjoy eating as much of the tub as possible?
sentences.chinese: 如果你像我一样喜欢吃巧克力冰淇淋，那么当你面前放着一桶这样的冰淇淋时，你是否会敞开肚子尽量多吃呢？

sentences.english: On the morning of the stroke, I woke up to a pounding pain behind my left eye. And it was the kind of pain, caustic pain, that you get when you bite into ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 那 天早上，我从睡梦中醒来，发现自己的左脑疼痛不止，那种痛楚跟你咬冰淇淋的那种腐蚀性的感觉一样，它抓住我，然后又放开，然后再次抓住，再次放开。

name: neighbourhood
trans: n. 邻近；周围；邻居关系；附近一带

sentences.english: Be quiet! You’ll wake up the whole neighbourhood!
sentences.chinese: 安静点！ 你会把邻居全都吵醒的！

sentences.english: She grew up in a quiet neighborhood of Boston.
sentences.chinese: 她是在波士顿一个清静的街区里长大的。

detailed_translations.english: the area around you or around a particular place, or the people who live there

name: relaxed
trans: v. relax的过去式和过去分词
adj. 松懈的，放松的；悠闲的，自在的；不严格的，不拘束的

name: control
trans: n. 控制；管理；抑制；操纵装置

sentences.english: Police had to be called in to control the crowds.
sentences.chinese: 只好调来警察控制人群。

sentences.english: He controlled the urge to laugh.
sentences.chinese: 他克制住笑的冲动。

sentences.english: The disease robs you of muscle control.
sentences.chinese: 这种疾病会让你丧失肌肉控制力。

detailed_translations.english: to make someone or something do what you want, or make something happen in the way that you want
the ability or power to make someone or something do what you want or make something happen in the way you want

sentences.english: She had read about it in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 关于这件事她已经在报纸上看到了。

sentences.english: a series of newspaper articles about life in Cuba
sentences.chinese: 刊登在报纸上的一系列关于古巴生活的文章

detailed_translations.english: a set of large folded sheets of printed paper containing news, articles, pictures, advertisements etc which is sold daily or weekly

name: unfamiliar
trans: adj. 不熟悉的；不常见的；没有经验的

sentences.english: a crowd of unfamiliar faces
sentences.chinese: 一群陌生的面孔

detailed_translations.chinese: 不熟悉的；不常见的；没有经验的
detailed_translations.english: not known to you

sentences.english: The tree was probably a hundred years old.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树很可能已经有100年了。

sentences.english: They’ve had this argument a hundred times before.
sentences.chinese: 这个问题他们以前已经争论过无数次了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 100
a very large number of things or people

name: their
trans: pron. 他们的，她们的；它们的

sentences.english: They have their compensations.
sentences.chinese: 他们有他们的报酬。

sentences.english: My pulses, her pulses, their pulses.
sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

sentences.english: His plan is to get a degree in economics and then work abroad for a year.
sentences.chinese: 他计划先取得经济学学位，然后去国外工作一年。

sentences.english: Do you have any plans for the weekend?
sentences.chinese: 你周末有什么打算？

sentences.english: He immediately began planning his escape.
sentences.chinese: 他立即开始计划逃跑。

sentences.english: The former president is planning a return to politics.
sentences.chinese: 前总统打算重返政坛。

detailed_translations.english: something you have decided to do
to think carefully about something you want to do, and decide how and when you will do it

name: attend
trans: vi. 出席；致力于；照料；照顾
vt. 出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

sentences.english: Only 12 people attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 只有12个人出席了会议。

sentences.english: Please let us know if you are unable to attend.
sentences.chinese: 如果不能出席，请通知我们。

sentences.english: On his deathbed the General was attended by several doctors.
sentences.chinese: 将军临终时有几名医生在照料他。

detailed_translations.english: to go to an event such as a meeting or a class

name: candy
trans: n. 糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
adj. 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的
vt. 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化

sentences.english: ...a piece of candy.
sentences.chinese: …一块糖果。

detailed_translations.chinese: 用糖煮；使结晶为砂糖；美化
糖果（等于sweets）；冰糖（等于sugar candy，rock candy）；毒品
detailed_translations.english: Candy is sweet foods such as chocolate or toffees

detailed_translations.chinese: 新潮的（服饰）；甜言蜜语的

name: miss
trans: n. 女士，小姐，年轻未婚女子

sentences.english: I’d like to make an appointment with Miss Taylor.
sentences.chinese: 我想约一下泰勒小姐。

detailed_translations.english: used in front of the family name of a woman who is not married to address her politely, to write to her, or to talk about her

name: message
trans: n. 消息；差使；启示；预言；广告词
vi. 报信，报告； 报文

sentences.english: The message of the film is that good always triumphs over evil.
sentences.chinese: 这部电影的主题思想是善良终必战胜邪恶。

sentences.english: The result of this legal battle sends an important message to people in similar situations.
sentences.chinese: 这场诉讼战的结果给情况相似的人们传递了一个重要的信息。

sentences.english: It’s perfectly possible to get your message across (= communicate what you want to say ) without being so angry.
sentences.chinese: 就算不这么生气，你也完全可以把意思说清楚。

sentences.english: They use illustrations to convey their message.
sentences.chinese: 他们用图示来表达他们的意思。

detailed_translations.english: the main or most important idea that someone is trying to tell people about in a film, book, speech etc

sentences.english: The scheme was pronounced a failure.
sentences.chinese: 该方案宣告失败。

detailed_translations.english: to give a judgment or opinion
to officially state that something is true

name: crayon
trans: vt. 以蜡笔作画，用颜色粉笔画

sentences.english: He coloured the picture with crayon.
sentences.chinese: 他用蜡笔给画上色。

sentences.chinese: 你们有卖草莓吗?

adj. 高的；高级的；崇高的；高音调的

sentences.chinese: 房子很漂亮，我们住在这里非常开心。

trans: adv. 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上

sentences.chinese: 她身体不舒服，在楼上躺着。

sentences.chinese: 玛萨妮搬进了楼上的公寓。

detailed_translations.chinese: 在楼上，向楼上；上楼；往楼上
detailed_translations.english: towards or on an upper floor in a building
An upstairs room or object is situated on a floor of a building that is higher than the ground floor
one or all of the upper floors in a building

name: quiet
trans: adj. 安静的；安定的；不动的；温顺的

sentences.chinese: 我们得安静点，免得吵醒宝宝。

sentences.chinese: 这车真好，发动机声音很小。

sentences.chinese: 那是一个星期天，三点钟左右，街上一片寂静。

v. 激动；刺激（excite的ing形式）；唤起

sentences.chinese: 香蕉一年收两喷。

sentences.chinese: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

trans: n. 原料；要素；组成部分

sentences.chinese: 一副刀叉

sentences.chinese: 美国有两大政党。

name: return
trans: adj. 报答的；回程的；返回的

on or during the day before today

sentences.chinese: 这是一辆旧车，但是性能非常可靠。

sentences.chinese: 她的祖母借给她一部相机，让她在学校组织的到威尼斯和埃及的旅行中使用。

sentences.chinese: 乌鸫在3月产蛋。

sentences.chinese: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.chinese: 落叶

sentences.chinese: 全面提高身体素质的方法

name: obey

sentences.chinese: 这小男孩不肯服从。

sentences.chinese: “坐下！”他说道，那只狗马上就服从了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do
to do what someone in authority tells you to do, or what a law or rule says you must do

sentences.chinese: 充满差劲对白的乏味电影

sentences.chinese: 学生被要求大声朗读简单的对话。

sentences.chinese: 周围炮弹四处飞落，我们奔跑着寻找地方躲避。

sentences.english: an exploding mortar shell
sentences.chinese: 一枚爆炸的迫击炮弹

detailed_translations.english: a metal container, like a large bullet, which is full of an explosive substance and is fired from a large gun

name: result
trans: n. 结果；成绩；答案；比赛结果

sentences.chinese: 你会如何应付失业及由此造成的收入损失？

detailed_translations.english: if something results from something else, it is caused by it

vi. 行动；扮演，充当；表现，举止；假装，演戏；起作用，见效

sentences.chinese: …一家大型连锁超市。

detailed_translations.english: a number of shops, hotels, cinemas etc owned or managed by the same company or person

sentences.chinese: 马戏演员

sentences.chinese: 150万人正因饥饿而即将面临死亡的危险。

sentences.chinese: 亚历山大 · 格雷厄姆 · 贝尔于1876年发明了电话。

sentences.chinese: 布兰奇听见后门哗啦一声被推开。

sentences.chinese: 最高法院于周二审理了此案。

sentences.chinese: 我提心吊胆地沿着花园的小道向前门走去。

sentences.chinese: 沿着河边的小路走到那座桥。

name: kitchen

sentences.chinese: 萨姆走进厨房去沏一壶茶。

sentences.english: She is in the kitchen making a meal.
sentences.chinese: 她在厨房里做饭。

sentences.english: Despite their different personalities, they became the best of friends.
sentences.chinese: 尽管个性不同，他们还是成了最好的朋友。

sentences.english: Unfortunately, the illness can lead to changes in personality.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这种病会导致性格变化。

detailed_translations.english: someone’s character, especially the way they behave towards other people

sentences.english: I think I’ll go to bed early tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我想今晚我会早点上床睡觉。

sentences.english: We’re meeting him at 9 o’clock tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚9点和他见面。

detailed_translations.english: during the night of this day
the night of this day

sentences.english: I’ll take whoever wants to go.
sentences.chinese: 谁想去我就带谁去。

sentences.english: When you’re done with the book, just give it to Kristin or Shelley or whoever.
sentences.chinese: 你看完书以后，就给克里斯廷或谢利，或者随便谁都行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 谁； 无论谁； 究竟是谁
detailed_translations.english: used to say that it does not matter who does something, is in a particular place etc

sentences.english: Groups of football fans began heading towards the ground.
sentences.chinese: 成群结队的球迷开始向球场走去。

detailed_translations.english: someone who likes a particular sport or performing art very much, or who admires a famous person

name: better
trans: n. 长辈；较好者；打赌的人（等于bettor）
adv. 更好的；更多的；较大程度地

sentences.english: Your stereo is better than mine.
sentences.chinese: 你的音响比我的好。

sentences.english: There must be a better way to do this.
sentences.chinese: 一定还有更好的办法来做这件事。

sentences.english: He can speak French a lot better than I can.
sentences.chinese: 他法语讲得比我好多了。

detailed_translations.english: more useful, interesting, satisfactory, effective, suitable etc
to a higher standard or quality

name: outstanding
trans: adj. 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的

sentences.english: an outstanding example of a 13th-century castle
sentences.chinese: 13世纪城堡的杰出典范

sentences.english: an outstanding success
sentences.chinese: 了不起的成功

sentences.english: His performance was outstanding.
sentences.chinese: 他的表演相当出色。

detailed_translations.chinese: 杰出的；显著的；未解决的；未偿付的
detailed_translations.english: extremely good

sentences.english: It took us ages to choose a new carpet.
sentences.chinese: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.english: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.english: He chose his words carefully as he spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他说话时字斟句酌。

sentences.english: You can, if you choose, invest in the stock market.
sentences.chinese: 如果你愿意，可以投资股票市场。

detailed_translations.english: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want

name: tool
trans: n. 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
vi. 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

sentences.english: I don’t have the right tools to start fiddling around with the engine.
sentences.chinese: 我没有合适的工具来摆弄发动机。

sentences.english: a shop selling garden tools
sentences.chinese: 出售园艺工具的商店

detailed_translations.chinese: 工具，用具；器械，机床；手段
detailed_translations.english: something that you hold in your hand and use to do a particular job

detailed_translations.chinese: 使用工具；用机床装备工厂

name: Italian
trans: n. 意大利人；意大利语
adj. 意大利的；意大利文化的；意大利语的

sentences.english: I watch Italian football a lot.
sentences.chinese: 我常看意大利足球。

sentences.english: The Italian way is to round off a meal with an ice-cream.
sentences.chinese: 意大利人总是在用餐结束时来份冰激凌。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Italy, its people, or its language
someone from Italy

name: thought
trans: n. 思想；思考；想法；关心
v. 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: It’s an interesting thought.
sentences.chinese: 这想法很有趣。

sentences.english: The thought that I might not have a job next year is a bit troubling.
sentences.chinese: 想到明年可能失业我有点心烦。

detailed_translations.english: something that you think of, remember, or realize

detailed_translations.chinese: 想，思考；认为（think的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.english: Judging by her past performance, Jane should do very well.
sentences.chinese: 从以往的表现来看，简应该会干得很好。

sentences.english: From past experience she knew that it was no use arguing with him.
sentences.chinese: 根据过去的经验，她知道和他争论是没有用的。

sentences.english: Study some past exam papers to get an idea of the questions.
sentences.chinese: 仔细看看以前的一些考卷，了解一下考题。

sentences.english: It’s time she stopped living in the past (= thinking only about the past ) and began to think about her future.
sentences.chinese: 她不该再沉湎过去，应开始想想将来。

detailed_translations.english: done, used, or experienced before now
the time that existed before the present

name: although
trans: conj. 尽管；虽然；但是；然而

sentences.english: Although in poor health, she continued to carry out her duties.
sentences.chinese: 尽管身体不好，她仍继续执行任务。

sentences.english: We decided to take rooms in Longwood House, although we knew we could not really afford the rent.
sentences.chinese: 虽然我们知道自己其实付不起租金，但还是决定住朗伍德庄园的房间。

sentences.english: Although I can’t help admiring the man’s courage, I do not approve of his methods.
sentences.chinese: 尽管我不得不佩服那个男子的勇气，却并不赞成他的方法。

detailed_translations.english: used to introduce a statement that makes your main statement seem surprising or unlikely

sentences.english: back-up copies of your files
sentences.chinese: 你的文档的备份

sentences.english: Could you copy this letter and send it out, please?
sentences.chinese: 你能把这封信复印一份发出去吗？

detailed_translations.english: something that is made to be exactly like another thing
to deliberately make or produce something that is exactly like another thing

name: certainly
trans: adv. 当然；行（用于回答）；必定

sentences.english: They’re certainly not mine.
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘I’d like a beer, please.’ ‘Certainly, sir.’
sentences.chinese: “请给我来杯啤酒。”“好的，先生。”

sentences.english: ‘Can I come along?’ ‘Certainly.’
sentences.chinese: “我可以一起去吗？”“当然可以。”

detailed_translations.english: without doubt

sentences.english: As a fossil hunter, Shubin distinguished himself by leading an expedition to the Arctic in 2004 which uncovered the remains of a fish with a wrist, a creature with part fin, part limb.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名化石搜寻者，舒宾的杰出成就是在2004年带领了一次北极探险。 在这次探险中，他们发现了一种半鳍半肢的动物——一条有腕的鱼化石。

detailed_translations.english: one of the thin body parts that a fish uses to swim

name: when
trans: conj. 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
n. 时间，时候；日期；场合
adv. 什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时

sentences.english: When are we leaving?
sentences.chinese: 我们什么时候走？

sentences.english: When did you first meet Dr Darnall?
sentences.chinese: 你是什么时候认识达纳尔博士的？

sentences.english: When will the work be finished?
sentences.chinese: 这项工作什么时候完成？

sentences.english: I don’t know when I’ll see her again.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道何时才能再见到她。

detailed_translations.chinese: 考虑到；既然；当…时；在…时；如果
什么时候，何时；（用于时间的表达方式之后）在那时；其时；当时
detailed_translations.english: at what time

sentences.english: Can you repeat your question?
sentences.chinese: 你能重复一遍你的问题吗？

sentences.english: Sorry - could you repeat that?
sentences.chinese: 对不起——你能再说一遍吗？

sentences.english: It is not, I repeat not, my fault.
sentences.chinese: 那不是我的错，我再说一遍，不是。

sentences.english: It was a terrible journey - I hope we don’t have a repeat performance (= have the same thing happen again ) on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 这一路上太糟糕了——我希望回程可不要再发生同样的事。

detailed_translations.english: to say or write something again
an event that is very like something that happened before

sentences.english: artistic creativity
sentences.chinese: 艺术创造力

sentences.english: Teachers have been attacked for stifling creativity in their pupils.
sentences.chinese: 教师被批评压抑了学生的创造力。

sentences.english: Editors complain about the lack of creativity in the ideas put to them.
sentences.chinese: 编辑们抱怨说交给他们的选题缺乏创意。

detailed_translations.english: the ability to use your imagination to produce new ideas, make things etc

name: collector
trans: n. 收藏家； 集电极；收税员；征收者

sentences.english: a stamp collector
sentences.chinese: 集邮者

sentences.english: The painting was bought by a private collector.
sentences.chinese: 这幅画被一个私人收藏家买走。

detailed_translations.chinese: 收藏家；[电子] 集电极；收税员；征收者
detailed_translations.english: someone who collects things that are interesting or attractive

name: produce
trans: vt. 生产；引起；创作；生育，繁殖

sentences.english: New drugs are producing remarkable results.
sentences.chinese: 新药正在产生显著的效果。

sentences.english: a rise in sea level produced by climatic change
sentences.chinese: 由气候变化引起的海平面升高

sentences.english: As a policy, it did not produce the desired effect.
sentences.chinese: 作为一项政策，它并未产生预期的效果。

sentences.english: a factory that produces microchips
sentences.chinese: 微芯片制造厂

sentences.english: He produced a letter from his pocket.
sentences.chinese: 他从口袋里掏出一封信来。

detailed_translations.english: to cause a particular result or effect

name: hot
trans: adj. 热的；辣的；热情的；激动的；紧迫的

sentences.english: a hot day in July
sentences.chinese: 7月炎热的一天

sentences.english: a hot curry
sentences.chinese: 一种辛辣的咖喱

detailed_translations.english: something that is hot has a high temperature - used about weather, places, food, drink, or objects

name: surprising
trans: v. 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）
adj. 令人惊讶的；意外的

sentences.english: She told me a surprising thing.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉我一件令人吃惊的事。

sentences.english: A surprising number of his paintings have survived.
sentences.chinese: 他的存世画作多得出奇。

sentences.english: It is hardly surprising that new mothers often suffer from depression.
sentences.chinese: 初为人母者常患上抑郁症是不足为奇的。

detailed_translations.english: unusual or unexpected

detailed_translations.chinese: 使惊奇；意外发现（surprise的ing形式）

name: concert
trans: adj. 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

sentences.english: a rock concert
sentences.chinese: 摇滚音乐会

sentences.english: a concert of French choral music
sentences.chinese: 法国合唱音乐会

sentences.english: We were going to a concert in Bath Abbey.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听一场在巴斯修道院内举行的音乐会。

sentences.english: She still does about 100 concerts every year.
sentences.chinese: 她每年仍然举行100场左右的演唱会。

detailed_translations.english: a performance given by musicians or singers

detailed_translations.chinese: 音乐会用的；在音乐会上演出的

name: middle
trans: adj. 中间的，中部的；中级的，中等的

sentences.english: We rowed out towards the middle of the lake.
sentences.chinese: 我们朝湖中央划去。

sentences.english: They spent the middle part of their vacation in Florida.
sentences.chinese: 文例句：假期的中间一段他们是在佛罗里达州度过的。

detailed_translations.english: the part that is nearest the centre of something, and furthest from the sides, edges, top, bottom etc
half of the way through an event or period of time

sentences.english: a glass of wine
sentences.chinese: 一杯葡萄酒

detailed_translations.english: an alcoholic drink made from grapes, or a type of this drink
to entertain someone well with a meal, wine etc

sentences.english: the traditions of South East Asia
sentences.chinese: 东南亚的传统

sentences.english: the tradition that the eldest son inherits the property
sentences.chinese: 长子继承家产的传统

sentences.english: By tradition, it’s the bride’s parents who pay for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 根据传统习俗，婚礼的费用由新娘的父母承担。

detailed_translations.english: a belief, custom, or way of doing something that has existed for a long time, or these beliefs, customs etc in general

sentences.english: a musical version of the fairy tale ‘Cinderella’
sentences.chinese: 童话故事《灰姑娘》的音乐剧版

sentences.english: When he began his musical career, King played only for black audiences.
sentences.chinese: 金在音乐事业的开始阶段只为黑人观众演奏。

detailed_translations.english: relating to music or consisting of music

sentences.english: homemade tomato soup
sentences.chinese: 自制的番茄汤

detailed_translations.english: cooked liquid food, often containing small pieces of meat, fish, or vegetables

name: duck
trans: n. 鸭子；鸭肉；（英）宝贝儿；零分

sentences.english: If she hadn’t ducked, the ball would have hit her.
sentences.chinese: 如果她没有弯腰躲闪的话，那个球就可能击中她了。

sentences.english: Tim ducked down to comb his hair in the mirror.
sentences.chinese: 蒂姆低下身在镜子前梳头发。

sentences.english: She ducked her head to look more closely at the inscription.
sentences.chinese: 她低下头更仔细地看碑文。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鸭子似的突然扎入水中； 突然低下
detailed_translations.english: to lower your head or body very quickly, especially to avoid being seen or hit
a very common water bird with short legs and a wide beak, used for its meat, eggs, and soft feathers

sentences.english: IS that policewoman short or tall?
sentences.chinese: 那个女警察是矮还是高？

sentences.english: A policewoman shot at the helicopter.
sentences.chinese: 一名女警察向直升飞机射击。

sentences.english: In 1984, Libyan gunmen murdered a British policewoman on the streets of London.
sentences.chinese: 1984年，在伦敦的街上，利比亚持枪歹徒杀害了一名英国女警察。

detailed_translations.english: a female police officer

sentences.english: Mr White likes chatting up the girls.
sentences.chinese: 怀特先生喜欢跟姑娘们搭讪。

sentences.english: This gave Mr White an opportunity of collecting his thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 这就给怀特先生一个使思想集中起来的机会。

sentences.english: Mr Brown and his wife corresponded for many years before they met.
sentences.chinese: 布朗先生与妻子在相识以前先通信了好多年。

name: taxi
trans: vt. 使滑行；用出租车送

sentences.english: The plane taxied to a halt.
sentences.chinese: 飞机滑行一段距离后停下来。

detailed_translations.english: if a plane taxis, it moves along the ground before taking off or after landing
a car and driver that you pay to take you somewhere

sentences.english: I can’t tell you. It’s a secret.
sentences.chinese: 我不能告诉你，这是个秘密。

sentences.english: It was no secret that the two men hated each other.
sentences.chinese: 这两个男人相互仇视，这算不得什么秘密。

sentences.english: Don’t worry. Your secret is safe with me (= I won’t tell anyone about it ) .
sentences.chinese: 别担心，我会替你保守秘密。

sentences.english: Your hair always looks so great – what’s your secret ?
sentences.chinese: 你的头发看起来总是很漂亮——你的秘诀是什么？

sentences.english: They kept their relationship secret from their parents.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩的关系瞒着父母。

detailed_translations.english: something that is kept hidden or that is known about by only a few people
known about by only a few people and kept hidden from others

sentences.english: the New York City subway
sentences.chinese: 纽约市的地铁

sentences.english: a crowded subway station
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的地铁站

sentences.english: Boston has the oldest subway system in the US.
sentences.chinese: 波士顿拥有美国最老的地铁运输系统。

detailed_translations.english: a railway system that runs under the ground below a big city

name: depend
trans: vi. 依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

sentences.english: He depended on his writing for his income.
sentences.chinese: 他靠写作谋生。

sentences.english: You can depend on Jane – she always keeps her promises.
sentences.chinese: 你可以相信简——她一向都信守诺言。

detailed_translations.english: to need the support, help, or existence of someone or something in order to exist, be healthy, be successful etc

name: sock
trans: adv. 正着地；不偏不倚地

sentences.english: a pair of socks
sentences.chinese: 一双短袜

sentences.english: white ankle socks
sentences.chinese: 白色的齐踝短袜

sentences.english: Once, after a boy made a comment, she socked him.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，一个男孩子发表了一点意见，她就挥拳猛击他。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing made of soft material that you wear on your foot inside your shoe
If you sock someone or something, you hit them hard

name: escape
trans: n. 逃跑；逃亡；逃走；逃跑工具或方法；野生种；泄漏
vi. 逃脱；避开；溜走；（气体，液体等）漏出；（未受伤或只受了一点伤害而）逃脱；声音（不自觉地）由…发出
vt. 逃避，避开，避免；被忘掉；被忽视

sentences.english: He broke down the locked door and escaped.
sentences.chinese: 他砸开上锁的门，逃走了。

sentences.english: Vents allow any steam to escape if the system overheats.
sentences.chinese: 如果系统过热，排放口可使蒸汽逸出。

sentences.english: The girl had no chance of escape.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩没有机会逃跑。

detailed_translations.english: to leave a place when someone is trying to catch you or stop you, or when there is a dangerous situation
the act of getting away from a place, or a dangerous or bad situation

sentences.english: the United Kingdom
sentences.chinese: 联合王国

sentences.english: the animal/plant/mineral kingdom
sentences.chinese: 动物界/植物界/矿物界〔大自然三界〕

detailed_translations.english: a country ruled by a king or queen

name: sky
trans: vt. 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高
vi. 踢或击高空球；把桨叶翘得过高；飞涨

sentences.english: The sky grew dark, and a cold rain began to fall.
sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

sentences.english: A shooting star sped across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 一颗流星划过天空。

detailed_translations.english: the space above the earth where clouds and the sun and stars appear

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高

name: sunshine
trans: n. 阳光；愉快；晴天；快活

sentences.english: We had three days of spring sunshine.
sentences.chinese: 我们享受了三天的春日阳光。

detailed_translations.english: the light and heat that come from the sun when there is no cloud

name: need
trans: n. 需要，要求；缺乏；必要之物

sentences.english: You don’t really need a car.
sentences.chinese: 你其实并不需要一辆车。

sentences.english: Plants need light in order to survive.
sentences.chinese: 植物需要光才能存活。

sentences.english: The camcorder needs a new battery.
sentences.chinese: 这台摄像机需要一块新电池。

sentences.english: Are you sure that you have everything you need?
sentences.chinese: 你确定需要的都有了吗？

detailed_translations.english: to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them
to have to have something or someone, because you cannot do something without them, or because you cannot continue or cannot exist without them

sentences.english: I never liked long walks, especially in winter.
sentences.chinese: 我向来不喜欢长距离散步，尤其在冬天。

sentences.english: Art books are expensive to produce, especially if they contain colour illustrations.
sentences.chinese: 美术类书籍制作成本很高，尤其是那些带彩色插图的。

sentences.english: I was especially fond of chocolate biscuits.
sentences.chinese: 我特别爱吃巧克力饼干。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize that something is more important or happens more with one particular thing than with others

name: scoop
trans: n. 勺；铲子；独家新闻；凹处
vt. 掘；舀取；抢先获得；搜集

sentences.english: ...the sound of a spoon scooping dog food out of a can.
sentences.chinese: …用勺子从罐子里舀狗粮的声音。

detailed_translations.english: If you scoop something from a container, you remove it with something such as a spoon
an important or exciting news story that is printed in one newspaper or shown on one television station before any of the others know about it

sentences.english: Foster joined in the laughter.
sentences.chinese: 福斯特也跟着笑了起来。

sentences.english: He looked shocked, then burst into laughter (= started laughing ).
sentences.chinese: 他一脸的震惊，接着便放声大笑起来。

detailed_translations.english: when people laugh, or the sound of people laughing

sentences.english: I couldn’t go out with someone for a joke, could you?
sentences.chinese: 我可不能拿谈恋爱当儿戏，对不对？

sentences.english: I never joke about money.
sentences.chinese: 我从不拿钱开玩笑。

detailed_translations.english: something that you say or do to make people laugh, especially a funny story or trick

name: help
trans: n. 帮助；补救办法；帮忙者；有益的东西
vt. 帮助；促进；治疗；补救

sentences.english: If there’s anything I can do to help, just give me a call.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要我帮忙，就给我打个电话。

sentences.english: Thank you for all your help.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你的一切帮助。

detailed_translations.english: to make it possible or easier for someone to do something by doing part of their work or by giving them something they need
things you do to make it easier or possible for someone to do something

sentences.english: They took the lift up to the third floor and walked along the quiet hallway.
sentences.chinese: 他们乘电梯到了3楼，然后走过寂静的过道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 走廊， 回廊； 门厅， 过道
detailed_translations.english: the area just inside the door of a house or other building, that leads to other rooms

name: environmental
trans: adj. 环境的，周围的；有关环境的

sentences.english: the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
sentences.chinese: 化学工业对环境造成的破坏

sentences.english: an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
sentences.chinese: 探讨环境问题的国际会议

sentences.english: the environmental impact of pollution from cars
sentences.chinese: 汽车造成的污染对环境的影响

sentences.english: an environmental group
sentences.chinese: 环境保护组织

detailed_translations.english: concerning or affecting the air, land, or water on Earth

sentences.english: a cold rainy day in October
sentences.chinese: 十月里一个寒冷的雨天

sentences.english: I hate rainy weather .
sentences.chinese: 我讨厌雨天。

sentences.english: the rainy season
sentences.chinese: 雨季

detailed_translations.english: a rainy period of time is one when it rains a lot

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 学校假期从明天开始。

sentences.english: a national holiday
sentences.chinese: 全国假日

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

sentences.english: beaches polluted by raw sewage
sentences.chinese: 受未经处理的污水污染的海滩

sentences.english: The factory pollutes the air and water.
sentences.chinese: 那家工厂污染了空气和水。

detailed_translations.english: to make air, water, soil etc dangerously dirty and not suitable for people to use

name: impossible
trans: n. 不可能；不可能的事
adj. 不可能的；不可能存在的；难以忍受的；不真实的

sentences.english: ‘I want to speak to Mr Franks.’ ‘I’m afraid that’s impossible.’
sentences.chinese: “我想和弗兰克斯先生谈谈。”“恐怕不行。”

sentences.english: It’s impossible to be accurate about these things.
sentences.chinese: 这些事情不可能准确无误 。

sentences.english: The noise made sleep impossible.
sentences.chinese: 噪音吵得人无法睡觉。

sentences.english: Members with young children often found it impossible to attend evening meetings.
sentences.chinese: 有小孩的会员常觉得没法参加晚上的聚会。

sentences.english: It is difficult to find work these days, but for blind people it is virtually impossible.
sentences.chinese: 现在找工作很难，对于盲人来说几乎是不可能。

sentences.english: He was faced with a seemingly impossible task.
sentences.chinese: 他面临着似乎不可能完成的任务。

sentences.english: It was physically impossible to get the fridge through the door.
sentences.chinese: 根本不可能把冰箱从这扇门搬过去。

sentences.english: Six months ago, peace seemed an impossible dream.
sentences.chinese: 六个月前和平还似乎是个无法实现的梦。

sentences.english: Such mental attitudes are difficult, if not impossible, to change.
sentences.chinese: 即使有可能，要改变这样的心态也是很难的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is impossible cannot happen or be done

name: stay
trans: vi. 停留；坚持；暂住；停下

sentences.english: They stayed all afternoon chatting.
sentences.chinese: 他们待了整个下午聊天。

sentences.english: She stayed late to finish the report.
sentences.chinese: 为了完成报告，她工作到很晚。

detailed_translations.english: to remain in a place rather than leave
a limited time of living in a place

name: June
trans: n. 六月；琼（人名，来源于拉丁语，含义是“年轻气盛的六月”）

sentences.english: He spent two and a half weeks with us in June 1986.
sentences.chinese: 1986年6月，他和我们呆了两个半星期。

detailed_translations.english: the sixth month of the year, between May and July

name: wood
trans: vt. 植林于；给…添加木柴

sentences.english: Put some more wood on the fire.
sentences.chinese: 往火上再添些木柴。

sentences.english: a polished wood floor
sentences.chinese: 擦得锃亮的木地板

sentences.english: Her house was made of wood .
sentences.chinese: 她家的房子是木头盖的。

detailed_translations.english: the material that trees are made of

sentences.english: Saint Patrick
sentences.chinese: 圣帕特里克

sentences.english: Statues of saints lined the walls of the church.
sentences.chinese: 教堂的墙边立着一排圣徒像。

detailed_translations.chinese: 圣人；圣徒；道德崇高的人
detailed_translations.english: someone who is given the title ‘saint’ by the Christian church after they have died, because they have been very good or holy

sentences.english: Employees must show their identity cards at the gate.
sentences.chinese: 雇员在大门口必须出示自己的身份卡。

sentences.english: I haven’t got my membership card yet.
sentences.chinese: 我还没拿到会员卡。

sentences.english: a piece of card
sentences.chinese: 一张卡片纸

sentences.english: My name’s Adam Carver. Here’s my card.
sentences.chinese: 我叫亚当•卡弗，这是我的名片。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of plastic or paper containing information about a person or showing, for example, that they belong to a particular organization, club etc

name: English
trans: n. 英语；英国人；英文；英格兰人
adj. 英国人的；英国的；英文的

sentences.english: Do you speak English?
sentences.chinese: 你会说英语吗？

sentences.english: leaflets written in plain English
sentences.chinese: 用简单英语写的传单

sentences.english: the English countryside
sentences.chinese: 英格兰乡村

detailed_translations.english: the language used in Britain, the US, Australia, and some other countries
relating to England or its people

name: rank
trans: adj. 讨厌的；恶臭的；繁茂的

sentences.english: There were several pairs of riding boots ranked neatly in the hall.
sentences.chinese: 门厅里整齐地摆放着几双马靴。

detailed_translations.english: to arrange objects in a line or row

detailed_translations.chinese: 军衔，职衔；地位，社会阶层；排，行列
detailed_translations.english: the position or level that someone holds in an organization, especially in the police or the army, navy etc
to have a particular position in a list of people or things that have been put in order of quality or importance

sentences.english: Sue showed great courage throughout her illness.
sentences.chinese: 休在生病期间表现出了极大的勇气。

sentences.english: Driving again after his accident must have taken a lot of courage (= needed courage ) .
sentences.chinese: 他出事故后再驾车肯定需要很大的勇气。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being brave when you are facing a difficult or dangerous situation or when you are very ill

name: wear
trans: v. 穿着；用旧；耗损；面露

sentences.english: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.
sentences.chinese: 你的袜子磨出了个洞。

detailed_translations.english: to become thinner or weaker after continuous use, or to make something do this

name: succeed
trans: vi. 成功；继承；继任；兴旺

sentences.english: She wanted to be the first woman to climb Mount Qomolangma, and she almost succeeded.
sentences.chinese: 她本想成为第一位登上珠穆朗玛峰的女性，而且差一点就成功了。

detailed_translations.english: to do what you tried or wanted to do
to be the next person to take a position or job after someone else

sentences.english: china teacups
sentences.chinese: 瓷茶杯

detailed_translations.english: a hard white substance produced by baking a type of clay at a high temperature

sentences.english: Germany borders on France.
sentences.chinese: 德国与法国接壤。

sentences.english: Bismarck ruled Germany by a strong hand.
sentences.chinese: 俾斯麦用铁腕手段统治德国。

sentences.english: The new Nazism is resurging in some places in Germany.
sentences.chinese: 新纳粹主义正在德国的一些地方复活。

name: primary
trans: adj. 主要的；初级的；基本的

sentences.english: Our primary concern is to provide the refugees with food and health care.
sentences.chinese: 我们的头等大事是向难民提供食品和医疗。

sentences.english: Many of the villagers rely on fishing as their primary source of income.
sentences.chinese: 很多村民以打鱼作为他们的主要收入来源。

sentences.english: Personal safety is of primary importance .
sentences.chinese: 人身安全至关重要。

detailed_translations.chinese: 首要的， 主要的； 基本的； 最初的， 初级的

name: finally
trans: adv. 最后；终于；决定性地

sentences.chinese: 几经耽搁后，我们终于在六点起飞了。

trans: n. 兴奋；刺激；令人兴奋的事物

sentences.chinese: 我们俩都是初次感受大城市多姿多彩的生活。

detailed_translations.english: the feeling of being excited

sentences.chinese: 孩子们今天实在是吵。

sentences.english: a noisy engine

sentences.chinese: 酒吧里非常嘈杂。

trans: n. 包装；一群；背包；包裹；一副

vi. 挤；包装货物；被包装；群集

sentences.chinese: 我忘记把剃须刀放入行李包了。

sentences.english: Hundreds of people packed into the mosque.
sentences.chinese: 成百上千的人挤进了清真寺。

sentences.english: Send away for your free information pack today.
sentences.chinese: 今天就来函索取免费资料包吧。

trans: n. 车库；汽车修理厂；飞机库

sentences.english: I’ll just go and put the car in the garage.
sentences.chinese: 我把车停到车库去。

sentences.english: an automatic garage door
sentences.chinese: 车库自动门

name: serious
trans: adj. 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的

sentences.english: the serious problem of unemployment
sentences.chinese: 严重的失业问题

sentences.english: Luckily, the damage was not serious.
sentences.chinese: 还好，损坏不算严重。

sentences.english: Serious crimes have increased dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 重大犯罪案件大幅度增加了。

sentences.english: Oil spills pose a serious threat to marine life.
sentences.chinese: 原油泄漏对海洋生物构成了严重威胁。

sentences.chinese: 总统遇到大麻烦了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 严肃的，严重的；认真的；庄重的；危急的

name: pleasant
trans: adj. 令人愉快的，舒适的；讨人喜欢的，和蔼可亲的

sentences.chinese: 那是个愉快的夜晚。

sentences.english: the pleasant climate of Southern California
sentences.chinese: 南加利福尼亚的宜人气候

sentences.english: The restaurant was large and pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅宽敞舒适。

sentences.english: Kate! What a pleasant surprise !
sentences.chinese: 凯特！真是让人惊喜！

sentences.chinese: 该社团一年出版两次简报。

name: assistant
trans: adj. 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的

sentences.chinese: 文书助理

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

sentences.english: We were foxed by the problem.
sentences.chinese: 我们被这个问题难住了。

detailed_translations.english: to confuse or deceive someone in a clever way
a wild animal like a dog with reddish-brown fur, a pointed face, and a thick tail

sentences.english: By the time she was eight, she could read Greek and Latin.
sentences.chinese: 她八岁时就会读希腊文和拉丁文了。

detailed_translations.english: used as the past tense of ‘can’ to say what someone was able to do or was allowed to do in the past

sentences.english: The audiences stamped loudly to express their grievances.
sentences.chinese: 听众大声地踏脚以表达他们的不满。

sentences.english: She stood on the beach, gazing at the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 她站在海滩上，凝视着大海。

sentences.english: I like to swim in the ocean when it’s warm enough.
sentences.chinese: 海水足够暖的时候，我喜欢在海里游泳。

detailed_translations.chinese: 洋， 海洋； 许多， 大量
detailed_translations.english: the great mass of salt water that covers most of the Earth’s surface

name: fire
trans: n. 火；火灾；炮火；炉火；热情；激情；磨难
vt. 点燃；解雇；开除；使发光；烧制；激动；放枪
vi. 着火；射击；开枪；激动；烧火

sentences.english: The warehouse was completely destroyed by fire.
sentences.chinese: 仓库全给烧毁了。

sentences.english: Thirty people died in a fire in downtown Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 30人死于芝加哥市中心的一场火灾。

sentences.english: Police think that the fire was started deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 警方认为有人故意纵火。

sentences.english: Rioters set fire to a whole row of stores (= made them start burning ) .
sentences.chinese: 暴徒纵火焚烧了一整排商店。

sentences.english: Soldiers fired on the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 士兵朝人群开枪。

detailed_translations.english: uncontrolled flames, light, and heat that destroy and damage things
to shoot bullets or bombs

name: sweater
trans: n. 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂

sentences.english: Somebody pinched my sweater.
sentences.chinese: 有人偷了我的运动衫。

detailed_translations.chinese: 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
detailed_translations.english: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body

name: birthday
trans: n. 生日，诞辰；诞生的日子

sentences.english: It’s my birthday on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 星期一是我的生日。

sentences.english: My aunt called to wish me a happy birthday.
sentences.chinese: 我姑妈打电话来祝我生日快乐。

sentences.english: The City of Cleveland Orchestra is celebrating its 200th birthday.
sentences.chinese: 克利夫兰市管弦乐队正在庆祝乐队成立200周年。

detailed_translations.english: the day in each year which is the same date as the one on which you were born

name: call
trans: n. 电话；呼叫；要求；访问

sentences.english: You may call it harmless fun, but I call it pornography.
sentences.chinese: 你可能会说这是无恶意的小玩笑，但是我却认为这是色情。

sentences.english: I heard someone calling in the distance.
sentences.chinese: 我听到远处有人在叫。

detailed_translations.english: to use a word or name to describe someone or something in a particular way

sentences.english: There’s no need to shout! I can hear you!
sentences.chinese: 用不着大声喊叫！我听得见！

sentences.english: ‘Watch out!’she shouted, as the car started to move.
sentences.chinese: “小心！”汽车开动时，她大声喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to say something very loudly
a loud call expressing anger, pain, excitement etc

sentences.english: ‘You never cared about me.’ ‘That’s not true.’
sentences.chinese: “你从不关心我。”“那不是事实。”

sentences.english: I wish you wouldn’t say things like that.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你不要那么说。

sentences.english: What did you do with those sandwiches?
sentences.chinese: 那些三明治你怎么处理了？

sentences.english: Victoria Street? That’s where my sister lives.
sentences.chinese: 维多利亚街？我的姐姐就住在那儿。

sentences.english: Do you remember that nice Mr Hoskins who came to dinner?
sentences.chinese: 你还记得那位来这儿吃过晚饭的好人霍斯金斯先生吗？

sentences.english: I’ve got that pain in my back again.
sentences.chinese: 我的背又疼起来了。

sentences.english: He killed a man once and that’s why he had to leave Ireland.
sentences.chinese: 他曾杀死过一个人，这就是他不得不离开爱尔兰的原因。

sentences.english: ‘We’ve been cheated,’ she said. Those were her exact words.
sentences.chinese: “我们被骗了。”她说。这是她的原话。

sentences.english: ‘I have to go,’ she said, and with that (= after saying that ) she hung up the phone.
sentences.chinese: “我得走了。”说完她就把电话挂了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 那，那个〔指已经提到或已经知道的人、事物、想法等〕
detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person, thing, idea etc that has already been mentioned or is already known about

detailed_translations.chinese: 〔用于动词、名词或形容词后引导一个从句，表示某人所说或所想，或陈述一个事实或理由〕
detailed_translations.english: used after verbs, nouns, and adjectives to introduce a  clause  which shows what someone says or thinks, or states a fact or reason

detailed_translations.chinese: 那么〔大、多等〕〔尤指通过手势比画来表示大小、数量等〕
detailed_translations.english: used to say how big, how much etc, especially when you are showing the size, amount etc with your hands

sentences.english: Jay stripped his clothes off and ran into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 杰伊脱光衣服奔入海里。

sentences.english: Most exports went by sea .
sentences.chinese: 大部分出口商品都走海路。

sentences.english: a little cottage by the sea
sentences.chinese: 一座海滨小屋

sentences.english: He spent over 30 years at sea .
sentences.chinese: 他在船上工作了30多年。

sentences.english: They stood side by side looking out to sea .
sentences.chinese: 他们并排站着眺望大海。

detailed_translations.english: the large area of salty water that covers much of the Earth’s surface

name: pink
trans: n. 粉红色；化身，典范；石竹花；头面人物
adj. 粉红的；比较激进的；石竹科的；脸色发红的
vt. 扎，刺，戳；使…变粉红色；使…面红耳赤

sentences.english: Her room was decorated in bright pinks and purples.
sentences.chinese: 她的房间装饰成明亮的粉红色和紫色。

sentences.english: She had arrived dressed in pink.
sentences.chinese: 她穿着粉色的衣服来了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉红色；化身，典范；石竹花；头面人物
detailed_translations.english: a pale red colour

detailed_translations.chinese: 扎，刺，戳；使…变粉红色；使…面红耳赤
detailed_translations.english: to prick lightly with a sword or rapier

detailed_translations.chinese: 粉红的；比较激进的；石竹科的；脸色发红的
detailed_translations.english: pale red

name: part-time
trans: adj. 兼职的；部分时间的
adv. 兼职地；用部分时间地

sentences.english: a part-time job
sentences.chinese: 兼职工作

sentences.english: women wishing to return to work on a part-time basis
sentences.chinese: 希望以兼职形式重返职场的女性

detailed_translations.english: someone who has a part-time job works for only part of each day or week

name: rush
trans: n. 冲进；匆促；急流；灯心草
vt. 使冲；突袭；匆忙地做；飞跃

sentences.english: A small girl rushed past her.

sentences.chinese: 她正在这儿跑1500米。

sentences.chinese: 我在大门外等你。

vt. 锻炼；练习；使用；使忙碌；使惊恐

sentences.chinese: 尽量在日常生活中安排一些经常性的锻炼。

adj. 第十八的，第十八个的；十八分之一的

sentences.chinese: 他爷爷曾是位教授。

sentences.chinese: 带18英寸彩色屏幕的电脑

sentences.chinese: 他继续盯着电视屏幕看。

sentences.chinese: 事故是由于人为过失造成的。

sentences.chinese: 一条蛇蜿蜒爬过我们的小路。

sentences.chinese: 这条新公路应该在年底前完工。

sentences.chinese: 看演出前在我们家碰头吧。

sentences.english: We only got back from Scotland the day before yesterday (=  two days ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们前天才从苏格兰回来。

name: situation

sentences.chinese: 房子位于林木茂密的小山坡上，环境十分优美。

name: vehicle

sentences.chinese: 你锁车了吗？

sentences.english: The boys were playing a game in the backyard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在后院里玩游戏。

sentences.english: game birds
sentences.chinese: 被捕猎的鸟

detailed_translations.english: an activity or sport in which people compete with each other according to agreed rules

name: well
trans: adj. 良好的；健康的；适宜的
