sentences.english: That transmitter was beamed at Russia.
sentences.chinese: 那台发射机曾用于对俄罗斯广播。

sentences.english: He was doubling for America and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 他给美国和俄罗斯当双重间谍。

name: public
trans: n. 公众；社会；公共场所
adj. 公众的；政府的；公用的；公立的

sentences.english: We have to show that publishing this story is in the public interest (= helpful or useful to ordinary people ) .
sentences.chinese: 我们必须证明刊登这篇报道有利于公众。

sentences.english: full public access to information
sentences.chinese: 公众对信息的充分知情权

sentences.english: Public opinion is gradually shifting in favor of the imprisoned men.
sentences.chinese: 舆论渐渐倾向于同情入狱的男子。

sentences.english: There was a public outcry (= expression of anger by a lot of people ) about the shooting.
sentences.chinese: 公众就枪击事件发出了强烈抗议。

sentences.english: Their activities have been hidden from the public gaze (= people’s eyes or attention ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的活动一直在避开公众的视线。

sentences.english: He is adored by his public.
sentences.chinese: 他深受支持者喜爱。

detailed_translations.english: relating to all the ordinary people in a country, who are not members of the government or do not have important jobs
ordinary people who do not work for the government or have any special position in society

name: outgoing
trans: adj. 对人友好的，开朗的；出发的，外出的；即将离职的；乐于助人的

sentences.english: We’re looking for someone with an outgoing personality.
sentences.chinese: 我们在找一个性格外向的人。

detailed_translations.chinese: 外出的， 离开的； 即将离职的； 友好的， 好交际的； 外向的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is outgoing likes to meet and talk to new people

sentences.english: He was always a solid player, a hard worker, a great example to his teammates.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是实力派运动员，勤奋刻苦，是队友的好榜样。

detailed_translations.english: In a game or sport, your teammates are the other members of your team

name: word
trans: n.  单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令

sentences.english: Write an essay of about five hundred words.
sentences.chinese: 写一篇约500字的文章。

sentences.english: What does that word mean?
sentences.chinese: 那个单词是什么意思？

sentences.english: ‘Vater’ is the German word for (= that means ) ‘father’.
sentences.chinese: vater在德语中是“父亲”的意思。

sentences.english: Perhaps ‘lucky’ is not exactly the right word .
sentences.chinese: 也许“幸运”一词还不够贴切。

detailed_translations.chinese: [语] 单词；话语；消息；诺言；命令
detailed_translations.english: a single group of letters that are used together with a particular meaning
to use words that are carefully chosen in order to express something

name: wind
trans: vi. 缠绕；上发条；吹响号角
vt. 缠绕；上发条；使弯曲；吹号角；绕住或缠住某人

sentences.english: The wind blew from the northeast.
sentences.chinese: 风从东北方向吹来。

detailed_translations.english: moving air, especially when it moves strongly or quickly in a current

name: Dr
trans: abbr. 速度三角形定位法（dead reckoning）；数据记录器（Data Recorder）

detailed_translations.chinese: 速度三角形定位法（dead reckoning）；数据记录器（Data Recorder）

name: sandwich
trans: vt. 夹入；挤进；把...做成三明治

sentences.english: Carefully split the sponge ring, then sandwich the two halves together with whipped cream.
sentences.chinese: 小心地切开海绵蛋糕圈，然后在两半中间夹上生奶油。

detailed_translations.chinese: 夹入；挤进；把做成三明治
detailed_translations.english: If you sandwich two things together with something else, you put that other thing between them. If you sandwich one thing between two other things, you put it between them.
two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, cooked egg etc between them

name: pan
trans: n. 平底锅；盘状的器皿；淘盘子，金盘，秤盘
vi. 淘金；在淘洗中收获金子
vt. 淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）；严厉的批评

sentences.english: a frying pan
sentences.chinese: 炒锅

sentences.english: pots and pans
sentences.chinese: 锅碗瓢盆

sentences.english: Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water.
sentences.chinese: 把意大利面放在一大锅开水里煮。

detailed_translations.chinese: 平底锅；盘状的器皿；淘盘子，金盘，秤盘
detailed_translations.english: a round metal container that you use for cooking, usually with one long handle and a lid

detailed_translations.chinese: 淘金；在浅锅中烹调（食物）；[非正式用语]严厉的批评
detailed_translations.english: to wash soil in a metal container in order to separate gold from other substances

name: unfair
trans: adj. 不公平的，不公正的

sentences.english: an unfair advantage
sentences.chinese: 不公平的优势

sentences.english: laws aimed at preventing unfair competition
sentences.chinese: 旨在防止不公平竞争的法令

sentences.english: Many employers have recognized that age discrimination is unfair.
sentences.chinese: 许多雇主已经认识到年龄歧视是不公平的。

sentences.english: She won £20,000 for unfair dismissal(= being illegally made to leave your job ).
sentences.chinese: 她因被不公平解雇而得到两万英镑的赔偿。

detailed_translations.english: not right or fair, especially because not everyone has an equal opportunity

name: ask
trans: vt. 问，询问；要求；需要；邀请；讨价

sentences.english: ‘What’s your name?’ she asked.
sentences.chinese: “你叫什么名字？”她问道 。

sentences.english: Don’t ask him – he won’t know.
sentences.chinese: 别问他，他不知道。

sentences.english: That kid’s always asking awkward questions.
sentences.chinese: 那孩子总是问一些尴尬的问题。

sentences.english: Let’s ask them to have dinner with us some time.
sentences.chinese: 哪天我们请他们一起吃晚餐。

sentences.english: You have no right to ask anything of me.
sentences.chinese: 你没有权利对我提任何要求。

sentences.english: Jerry’s too scared to ask her out.
sentences.chinese: 杰里没有勇气邀她出去。

detailed_translations.english: to speak or write to someone in order to get an answer, information, or a solution

sentences.english: The Ormerod School educates handicapped children.
sentences.chinese: 奥默罗德学校的教育对象为残疾儿童。

sentences.english: a campaign to educate teenagers about HIV
sentences.chinese: 教育青少年了解艾滋病病毒的运动

detailed_translations.english: to teach a child at a school, college, or university

name: company
trans: n. 公司；陪伴，同伴；连队

sentences.english: Which company do you work for?
sentences.chinese: 你在哪家公司上班？

sentences.english: I called the phone company about the bill.
sentences.chinese: 我就电话账单的事给电话公司打了电话。

sentences.english: The company was set up just after the war.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司是战后不久成立的。

sentences.english: People judge you by the company you keep (= the people you spend time with ) .
sentences.chinese: 人们根据你交往的朋友来判断你的为人。

detailed_translations.english: a business organization that makes or sells goods or services

name: bamboo
trans: adj. 竹制的；土著居民的

sentences.english: Everything there is made of bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 那里什么都是竹子做的。

sentences.english: Do you like bamboo?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢竹子吗?

detailed_translations.english: a tall tropical plant with hollow stems that is used for making furniture

name: promise
trans: vt. 允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望
vi. 许诺；有指望，有前途

sentences.english: If you make a promise, you should keep it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你许下一个诺言，你就应该遵守它。

sentences.english: Last night the headmaster promised a full investigation.
sentences.chinese: 校长昨晚允诺进行全面调查。

detailed_translations.english: a statement that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will definitely happen
to tell someone that you will definitely do or provide something or that something will happen

name: DJ
trans: abbr. 流行音乐播音员，流行音乐节目主持人（disc jockey）；地方初审法院法官（District Judge）；司法部（Department of Justice）

detailed_translations.english: someone who plays records on a radio show or in a club where you can dance

name: ghost
trans: vt. 作祟于；替…捉刀；为人代笔

sentences.english: They say the young girl’s ghost still haunts (= often appears in ) the house.
sentences.chinese: 他们说那个少女的鬼魂依旧在那房子里出没。

sentences.english: He looked as if he’d seen a ghost (= he looked very frightened ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看上去像见到了鬼似的。

detailed_translations.english: the spirit of a dead person that some people think they can feel or see in a place

detailed_translations.chinese: 作祟于；替…捉刀；为人代笔
detailed_translations.english: to write something as a  ghost writer

name: reusable
trans: adj. 可以再度使用的，可重复使用的

sentences.english: Store refrigerated food in reusable containers rather than in plastic wrap or aluminium foil.
sentences.chinese: 用可再用容器而不是保鲜膜或铝箔纸来储存冷冻食品。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可重复使用的；可再次使用的
detailed_translations.english: Things that are reusable can be used more than once

name: thick
trans: n. 最拥挤部分；活动最多部分；事物的粗大浓密部分
adv. 密集地；浓浓地，厚厚地

sentences.english: a thick oak door
sentences.chinese: 一扇厚实的橡木门

sentences.english: a thick slice of homemade bread
sentences.chinese: 一片厚厚的自制面包

sentences.english: He was wearing thick glasses.
sentences.chinese: 他戴着厚厚的眼镜。

sentences.english: short thick fingers
sentences.chinese: 短粗的手指

sentences.english: thick wool socks (= socks that are heavy and warm )
sentences.chinese: 厚厚的羊毛袜子

sentences.english: If you want a thicker blanket, there are more here in the closet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要更厚的毯子，这个柜子里还有。

sentences.english: The meat is done when the thickest part turns from pink to white.
sentences.chinese: 肉最厚的部分从粉红色变成白色，就说明熟了。

detailed_translations.english: if something is thick, there is a large distance or a larger distance than usual between its two opposite surfaces or sides

name: condition
trans: n. 条件；情况；环境；身份
vt. 决定；使适应；使健康；以…为条件

sentences.english: Profits increased by £1.5m, despite the difficult economic conditions.
sentences.chinese: 尽管经济形势不佳，利润还是增长了150万英镑。

detailed_translations.english: the state that something is in, especially how good or bad its physical state is

sentences.english: He bent and touched his mouth to hers.
sentences.chinese: 他俯身吻她的嘴唇。

sentences.english: These are my gloves. Hers are in the drawer.
sentences.chinese: 这是我的手套，她的在抽屉里。

sentences.english: The idea was hers.
sentences.chinese: 这个主意是她出的。

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to something that belongs to or is connected with a woman, girl, or female animal that has already been mentioned

sentences.english: The airplane cracked up in landing.
sentences.chinese: 这架飞机在着陆时坠毁。

sentences.english: The new airplane flies at twice the speed of sound.
sentences.chinese: 这架新式飞机以两倍于音速的速度飞行。

sentences.english: We beamed the airplane down safely.
sentences.chinese: 我们给飞机导航使它安全降落。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies through the air and has one or more engines

sentences.english: Two flashes mean danger.
sentences.chinese: 两次闪光表示危险。

sentences.english: Lightning flashed overhead.
sentences.chinese: 头顶上电光闪闪。

detailed_translations.english: a bright light that shines for a short time and then stops shining
to shine suddenly and brightly for a short time, or to make something shine in this way

name: cream
trans: n. 奶油，乳脂；精华；面霜；乳酪

sentences.english: fresh cream
sentences.chinese: 鲜奶油

sentences.english: strawberries and cream
sentences.chinese: 浇奶油的草莓

sentences.english: cream silk stockings
sentences.chinese: 乳白色的长筒丝袜

detailed_translations.english: a thick yellow-white liquid that rises to the top of milk

name: lose
trans: vt. 浪费；使沉溺于；使迷路；遗失；错过

sentences.english: I’ve lost my appetite.
sentences.chinese: 我已经没有了胃口。

sentences.english: Try not to lose heart (= become sad and hopeless ) - there are plenty of other jobs.
sentences.chinese: 不要灰心―还有很多其他的工作。

sentences.english: By the time the ambulance arrived, Douglas had lost consciousness .
sentences.chinese: 救护车赶到时，道格拉斯已经失去知觉。

sentences.english: I followed her on foot, but lost her in the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 我走在她后面，可是在人群中跟丢了。

sentences.english: Klinger lost his seat in the election.
sentences.chinese: 克林格在选举中失去了他的席位。

detailed_translations.english: to stop having a particular attitude, quality, ability etc, or to gradually have less of it

name: fishing
trans: n. 渔业；捕鱼（术）；试探；装配

sentences.english: Fishing is one of his hobbies.
sentences.chinese: 钓鱼是他的一项业余爱好。

sentences.english: Terry’s going fishing at Lake Arrowhead next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 特里下周末要到阿罗黑德湖钓鱼。

detailed_translations.english: the sport or business of catching fish

name: page
trans: n. 页；记录；大事件，时期；男侍者

sentences.english: The full address is given on page 15.
sentences.chinese: 详细地址见第15页。

sentences.english: You will find the answers over the page .
sentences.chinese: 答案见下页。

sentences.english: a 400﹣page novel
sentences.chinese: 一本400页的小说

sentences.english: We took out a full page advertisement in the ‘Village Voice’.
sentences.chinese: 我们在《村声》上投放了一整版广告。

detailed_translations.english: one side of a piece of paper in a book, newspaper, document etc, or the sheet of paper itself

sentences.english: Peel and dice the potatoes.
sentences.chinese: 把马铃薯去皮并切成丁。

detailed_translations.english: to remove the skin from fruit or vegetables
to remove the skin from fruit or vegetables
the skin of some fruits and vegetables, especially the thick skin of fruits such as oranges, which you do not eat

sentences.english: A nurse cleaned and bandaged the wound.
sentences.chinese: 护士把伤口清洗包扎好。

sentences.english: It took several months for his wounds to heal .
sentences.chinese: 他的伤口几个月后才愈合。

sentences.english: The doctor said it was only a flesh wound (= one that does not cut the skin very deeply ) .
sentences.chinese: 医生说那只是皮肉伤。

sentences.english: a gaping wound (= one that is wide and open ) on his thigh
sentences.chinese: 他大腿上裂开的伤口

sentences.english: Gunmen killed two people and wounded six others in an attack today.
sentences.chinese: 在今天的一起袭击事件中，持枪歹徒打死两人，打伤六人。

detailed_translations.english: an injury to your body that is made by a weapon such as a knife or a bullet
to injure someone with a knife, gun etc

sentences.english: The banks have long competed with American Express's charge cards and various shop cards.
sentences.chinese: 这些银行长期以来一直与美国运通公司的记账卡和各种商店卡竞争。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比赛， 竞争， 对抗
detailed_translations.english: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or servicesrather than those available from another company or country

sentences.english: ...the forest ecosystem.
sentences.chinese: …森林生态系统。

detailed_translations.english: all the animals and plants in a particular area, and the way in which they are related to each other and to their environment

name: home-made
trans: adj. （本）国产的；自制的；家里做的

sentences.english: the problems of everyday life
sentences.chinese: 日常生活中的问题

sentences.english: wearing everyday clothes
sentences.chinese: 穿平常衣服

sentences.english: a simple, everyday object
sentences.chinese: 简单的日常物品

sentences.english: Describe it in ordinary everyday language.
sentences.chinese: 用一般的日常语言把它描述一下。

detailed_translations.english: ordinary, usual, or happening every day

sentences.english: They had made an agreement that they would share the profits equally.
sentences.chinese: 他们达成协议，平分利润。

sentences.english: Would their discussion result in his agreement to visit his stepmother?
sentences.chinese: 他们商量后，他会不会同意去看望继母？

detailed_translations.english: an arrangement or promise to do something, made by two or more people, companies, organizations etc

sentences.english: The financial crisis devitalized the economy of the Asian countries.
sentences.chinese: 这次金融危机使亚洲国家的经济大伤元气。

sentences.english: The government predicates that the market collapse was caused by Asian financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 政府宣布市场不景气是由于亚洲金融危机而引起的。

detailed_translations.english: from or relating to Asia, especially India or Pakistan
someone from Asia, or whose family originally came from Asia, especially India or Pakistan

name: balance
trans: vt. 使平衡；结算；使相称
vi. 保持平衡；相称；抵销

sentences.english: She balanced the cup on her knee.
sentences.chinese: 她把杯子在膝盖上放稳。

detailed_translations.english: to put your body or sth else into a position where it is steady and does not fall
an instrument for weighing things, with two dishes that hang from a bar

name: handwriting
trans: n. 笔迹；书法；书写；手稿

sentences.english: I recognised her handwriting on the envelope.
sentences.chinese: 我认出了信封上她的笔迹。

sentences.english: My handwriting has never been very neat.
sentences.chinese: 我的字从来都写得不够工整。

detailed_translations.english: the style of someone’s writing

sentences.english: He sprang up from the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 他从沙发上猛然跳了起来。

sentences.english: She spread a sheet on the sofa for me.
sentences.chinese: 她为我在沙发上铺了一条单子。

sentences.english: There's enough space to have a sofa there.
sentences.chinese: 那里还有足够的地方放下一个沙发。

detailed_translations.english: a comfortable seat with raised arms and a back, that is wide enough for two or three people to sit on

name: snack
trans: n. 小吃，快餐；一份，部分

sentences.english: I grabbed a quick snack.
sentences.chinese: 我赶紧吃了点零食。

sentences.english: Drinks and light snacks are served at the bar.
sentences.chinese: 酒吧里供应饮料和小吃。

sentences.english: snack foods like crisps and peanuts
sentences.chinese: 炸薯片和花生之类的小吃

detailed_translations.english: a small amount of food that is eaten between main meals or instead of a meal

name: picture
trans: n. 照片，图画；影片；景色；化身

sentences.english: The room had several pictures on the walls.
sentences.chinese: 那个房间墙上有几幅画。

sentences.english: a book with pictures in it
sentences.chinese: 带插图的书

sentences.english: He asked her permission to paint her picture (= paint a picture of her ) .
sentences.chinese: 他请求她允许为她画像。

detailed_translations.english: shapes, lines etc painted or drawn on a surface, showing what someone or something looks like
to show someone or something in a photograph, painting, or drawing

name: plane
trans: n. 飞机；平面；程度，水平
vt. 刨平；用刨子刨；掠过水面
vi. 刨；乘飞机旅行；翱翔

sentences.english: It is a big airline with a large fleet of planes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.english: It’s much quicker to go by plane.
sentences.chinese: 乘飞机去会快很多。

sentences.english: She slept on the plane.
sentences.chinese: 她在飞机上睡着了。

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies in the air and has wings and at least one engine

sentences.english: Do you have access to the Internet?
sentences.chinese: 你上得了网吗？

detailed_translations.english: a computer system that allows millions of computer users around the world to exchange information

name: wise
trans: adj. 明智的；聪明的；博学的

sentences.english: a wise precaution
sentences.chinese: 明智的预防措施

sentences.english: I don’t think that would be a very wise move (= not be a sensible thing to do ).
sentences.chinese: 我认为那样做不是很明智。

detailed_translations.english: wise decisions and actions are sensible and based on good judgment

name: short
trans: adj. 短的；不足的；矮的，低的

sentences.english: a short meeting
sentences.chinese: 一个短会

sentences.english: Morris gave a short laugh.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯笑了一声。

sentences.english: a short course on business English
sentences.chinese: 商业英语短期课程

sentences.english: Winter is coming and the days are getting shorter.
sentences.chinese: 冬天来临，白天变短了。

sentences.english: I’ve only been in Brisbane a short time .
sentences.chinese: 我才来布里斯班不久。

sentences.english: For a short while (= a short time ) , the city functioned as the region’s capital.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市曾经在很短的一段时间里是这个地区的首府。

sentences.english: I learned a lot during my short period as a junior reporter.
sentences.chinese: 在当初级记者的这段短暂时间里，我学到了许多。

sentences.english: Germany achieved spectacular economic success in a relatively short period of time .
sentences.chinese: 德国在相对较短的时间里取得了非凡的经济成就。

sentences.english: They met and married within a short space of time .
sentences.chinese: 他们从相识到结婚时间很短。

sentences.english: I promise to keep the meeting short and sweet (= short in a way that is good, especially not talking for a long time ) .
sentences.chinese: 我保证会议开得简短不拖拉。

sentences.english: For a few short weeks (= they seemed to pass very quickly ) the sun shone and the fields turned gold.
sentences.chinese: 短短的几个星期里，阳光照耀，田野变成了一片金黄。

detailed_translations.english: happening or continuing for only a little time or for less time than usual
a short film shown in the cinema
to almost do something but then decide not to do it

name: down
trans: n. 软毛，绒毛； 开阔的高地

sentences.english: David bent down to tie his shoelace.
sentences.chinese: 戴维弯腰系鞋带。

sentences.english: Get down off the table.
sentences.chinese: 从桌子上下来。

sentences.english: Tears were streaming down my face.
sentences.chinese: 我泪流满面。

sentences.english: The sun was going down and it would soon be dark.
sentences.chinese: 夕阳西下，天很快就要黑了。

sentences.english: They came running down the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他们跑下楼来。

sentences.english: She stood on a balcony looking down into the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 她站在阳台上朝下面的院子望去。

sentences.english: Glancing down the list of runners, I noticed a familiar name.
sentences.chinese: 我往下扫了一眼赛跑选手的名单，注意到了一个熟悉的名字。

sentences.english: Her hair came down to her waist.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发一直垂到腰际。

sentences.english: Ken fell asleep face down (= with his face towards the ground ) on the couch.
sentences.chinese: 肯趴在长沙发上睡着了。

sentences.english: We heard the sound of laughter down below.
sentences.chinese: 我们听到下面有笑声。

sentences.english: The bathroom is down those stairs.
sentences.chinese: 浴室在那段楼梯下面。

detailed_translations.english: to or towards a lower place or position

sentences.english: You’ll never guess who I met in town.
sentences.chinese: 你绝对猜不出我在镇上碰到谁了。

sentences.english: I was worried I might meet Henry on the bus.
sentences.chinese: 我担心可能会在公共汽车上遇到亨利。

detailed_translations.english: to see someone by chance and talk to them
to see someone by chance and talk to them

name: plate
trans: n. 碟；金属板；金属牌；感光底片

sentences.english: The plates were piled high with rice.
sentences.chinese: 盘子里都堆满了米饭。

sentences.english: a beautiful necklace, plated with 22-carat gold
sentences.chinese: 一条漂亮的22开镀金项链

detailed_translations.english: flat and usually round dish that you eat from or serve food on
to be covered with a thin covering of gold or silver

name: reach
trans: n. 范围；延伸；河段；横风行驶
vi. 达到；延伸；伸出手；传开
vt. 达到；影响；抵达；伸出

sentences.english: We reached London late at night.
sentences.chinese: 我们深夜到达伦敦。

sentences.english: She reached into her bag and produced a business card.
sentences.chinese: 她伸手从包里取出一张名片。

sentences.english: Chelsea could reach the final of the European Cup.
sentences.chinese: 切尔西队会进入欧洲杯决赛。

detailed_translations.english: to arrive at a place

name: chance
trans: n. 机会，际遇；运气，侥幸；可能性

sentences.english: If someone invited me over to Florida, I’d jump at the chance (= use the opportunity eagerly ) .
sentences.chinese: 如果有人邀请我去佛罗里达，我会赶紧抓住这个机会。

sentences.english: There’s always the chance that something will go wrong.
sentences.chinese: 总有可能会出现问题。

sentences.english: If we did move to London, I’d stand a much better chance (= have a much better chance ) of getting a job.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们真的搬到伦敦去，我找到工作的机会就大多了。

sentences.english: There is little chance of her being found alive.
sentences.chinese: 她生还的可能性很小。

detailed_translations.english: a time or situation which you can use to do something that you want to do

name: always
trans: adv. 永远，一直；总是；常常

sentences.english: Always lock your bicycle to something secure.
sentences.chinese: 每次都要把自行车锁在牢固的物体上。

sentences.english: She’d always assumed that Gabriel was a girl’s name.
sentences.chinese: 她一直认为加布里埃尔是个女孩名字。

sentences.english: He hadn’t always been a butler.
sentences.chinese: 他并不是一直当管家。

sentences.english: I’ll always remember that day.
sentences.chinese: 我会永远记住那一天。

detailed_translations.english: all the time, at all times, or every time

sentences.english: On the night the murder was committed , he was out of the country.
sentences.chinese: 凶案发生当晚他不在国内。

sentences.english: The man accused of her murder will appear in court today.
sentences.chinese: 被指控谋杀她的那名男子将于今天出庭。

sentences.english: He was found guilty of attempted murder.
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀未遂。

sentences.english: She was charged with two counts of first degree murder.
sentences.chinese: 她被控犯有两项一级谋杀罪。

sentences.english: The mother of the murder victim wept in court.
sentences.chinese: 凶案死者的母亲在法庭上痛哭。

sentences.english: Police are searching for the murder weapon.
sentences.chinese: 警方在寻找杀人凶器。

sentences.english: He was convicted of murdering a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 他被判谋杀一名警察的罪名成立。

detailed_translations.english: the crime of deliberately killing someone
to kill someone deliberately and illegally

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I’ve forgotten your name.
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我忘记你的名字了。

sentences.english: I know you told me, but I forgot.
sentences.chinese: 我知道你告诉过我，但是我忘了。

sentences.english: What happened that day will never be forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 那一天的事永远难忘。

sentences.english: He’s someone who never forgets a face (= forgets who someone is ).
sentences.chinese: 他是那种见人一面就不会忘记的人。

detailed_translations.english: to not remember facts, information, or people or things from the past

name: thirsty
trans: adj. 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的

sentences.english: Can I have a glass of water? I’m really thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 我能喝一杯水吗？ 我太渴了。

sentences.english: He’d been working in the garden and was very hot and thirsty.
sentences.chinese: 他一直在花园里干活，又热又渴。

sentences.english: All this digging is thirsty work (= work that makes you want a drink ) .
sentences.chinese: 这种挖地的活干了让人口渴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 口渴的，口干的；渴望的，热望的
detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want or need a drink

name: celebrate
trans: vt. 庆祝；举行；赞美；祝贺；宣告
vi. 庆祝；过节；举行宗教仪式

sentences.english: It’s Dad’s birthday and we’re going out for a meal to celebrate.
sentences.chinese: 今天是爸爸的生日，我们打算出去吃饭庆祝一下。

sentences.english: My folks are celebrating their 50th anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我父母正在庆祝他们结婚50周年。

sentences.english: poems that celebrate the joys of love
sentences.chinese: 赞美爱之喜悦的诗歌

detailed_translations.english: to show that an event or occasion is important by doing something special or enjoyable

name: sand
trans: n. 沙；沙地；沙洲；沙滩；沙子
vt. 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子

sentences.english: a mixture of sand and cement
sentences.chinese: 沙和水泥的混合物

sentences.english: I have sand in my shoe.
sentences.chinese: 我的鞋里有沙子。

detailed_translations.english: a substance consisting of very small pieces of rocks and minerals, that forms beaches and deserts

detailed_translations.chinese: 撒沙于；以沙掩盖；用砂纸等擦平或磨光某物；使撒沙似地布满；给…掺沙子
detailed_translations.english: to make a surface smooth by rubbing it with  sandpaper  or using a special piece of equipment

sentences.english: He’s never had a girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 他从来没有交过女朋友。

sentences.english: one of my ex-girlfriends
sentences.chinese: 我的一个前女友

sentences.english: I didn’t have a steady girlfriend (= one you have a long relationship with ) .
sentences.chinese: 我那时没有固定的女友。

detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman that you are having a romantic relationship with

name: yogurt
trans: n. 酸奶酪， 酸乳（等于yoghurt）

sentences.english: If you like cottage cheese, add some fruit and/or yogurt!
sentences.chinese: 如果你喜欢农家鲜干酪，那就加些水果和酸奶吧！

sentences.english: Not bad. It seems you are super yogurt lover. You have so many in your cart.
sentences.chinese: 不错。似乎你是超级喜欢酸奶。你的手推车上放了如此多的酸奶。

sentences.english: It has yogurt powder but it is mostly made up of sugar and palm-kernel oil-and all the fat is mostly saturated.
sentences.chinese: 那其中确实含有一部分酸乳酪粉，但主要成分确是糖和棕榈核油，而且脂肪也以饱和脂肪为主。

detailed_translations.english: Yogurt is a food in the form of a thick, slightly sour liquid that is made by adding bacteria to milk. A yogurt is a small container of yogurt.

name: suggest
trans: vt. 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示

sentences.english: The zoo asked its visitors to suggest a name for the new baby panda.
sentences.chinese: 动物园请游客提建议，给刚出生的大熊猫起一个名字。

sentences.english: It has been suggested that the manager will resign if any more players are sold.
sentences.chinese: 有人提议，如果再有球员被出售，球队主教练就辞职。

detailed_translations.chinese: 提议，建议；启发；使人想起；显示；暗示
detailed_translations.english: to tell someone your ideas about what they should do, where they should go etc

name: officer
trans: n. 军官，警官；公务员，政府官员；船长

sentences.english: a former Cabinet officer
sentences.chinese: 前内阁官员

sentences.english: a commanding officer of the SAS
sentences.chinese: 英国空军特种部队的一名指挥官

detailed_translations.english: someone who is in a position in an organization or the government

sentences.english: The bus stopped suddenly and we were all thrown forwards.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车猛地停住，我们都往前栽。

detailed_translations.chinese: [threw-thrown] 投， 扔， 抛； 使突然陷入； 使困惑， 使吃惊
detailed_translations.english: to make an object such as a ball move quickly through the air by pushing your hand forward quickly and letting the object go

name: playground
trans: n. 运动场，操场；游乐场

sentences.english: children shouting and running in the playground
sentences.chinese: 在操场上叫嚷奔跑的孩子们

detailed_translations.english: an area for children to play, especially at a school or in a park, that often has special equipment for climbing on, riding on etc

name: importance
trans: n. 价值；重要；重大；傲慢

sentences.english: He was full of his own importance (= he behaved in an annoying way which showed that he thought he was very important ).
sentences.chinese: 他自以为很了不起。

detailed_translations.english: the quality of being important

name: buy
trans: n. 购买，买卖；所购的物品

sentences.english: People say the judge had been bought by the Mafia.
sentences.chinese: 人们都说法官被黑手党收买了。

detailed_translations.english: to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest
to pay money to someone, especially someone in a position of authority, in order to persuade them to do something dishonest

sentences.english: Union leaders are heading for victory in their battle over workplace rights.
sentences.chinese: 工会领袖们在争取工作场所权利的斗争中正迈向胜利。

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which you win a battle, game, election, or dispute

sentences.english: It’s warm enough to eat outdoors tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚很暖和，可以在户外用餐。

sentences.english: He likes to work outdoors.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢在户外工作。

detailed_translations.english: outside, not in a building
the countryside far away from buildings and cities

name: like
trans: n. 爱好；同样的人或物

sentences.english: I like your jacket.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢你这件上衣。

sentences.english: I don’t really like classical music.
sentences.chinese: 我不是很喜欢古典音乐。

sentences.english: Do you like this colour?
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢这种颜色吗？

sentences.english: I like my coffee quite weak.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢喝很淡的咖啡。

sentences.english: I don’t like it when you get angry.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢你生气时的样子。

sentences.english: How do you like living in London (= how much do you like it )?
sentences.chinese: 住在伦敦你感觉怎样？

sentences.english: I quite like their new album.
sentences.chinese: 我很喜欢他们的新专辑。

sentences.english: We really liked the film.
sentences.chinese: 我们非常喜欢这部影片。

sentences.english: The time I like best (= like most of all ) is the evening when it’s cool.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的时间是凉爽的傍晚。

sentences.english: I didn’t like the idea of being a single parent.
sentences.chinese: 我可不想当单亲家长。

sentences.english: Would you like a drink?
sentences.chinese: 你想喝一杯吗？

detailed_translations.english: to enjoy something or think that it is nice or good

sentences.english: a story with believable characters in it
sentences.chinese: 人物真实可信的故事

sentences.english: That scenario is entirely believable.
sentences.chinese: 那样的设想完全是可信的。

detailed_translations.english: something that is believable can be believed because it seems possible, likely, or real

name: thing
trans: n. 事情；东西；事物；情况

sentences.english: People say things they don’t mean when they are angry.
sentences.chinese: 人生气时就会口不择言。

sentences.english: It was a horrible thing to happen.
sentences.chinese: 发生这样的事情太糟糕了。

sentences.english: I plan to do all the things I’ve been meaning to do for ages.
sentences.chinese: 我打算去做我多年以来一直想做的事。

sentences.english: The first thing to do is to give them food and shelter.
sentences.chinese: 首要的事是给他们提供食物和住所。

sentences.english: That’s a terrible thing to say .
sentences.chinese: 这话说得太难听了。

sentences.english: Getting more American ideas into British business would be a good thing .
sentences.chinese: 将更多的美国式理念注入英国商界会是一件好事。

sentences.english: ‘I did no such thing ,’ he protested.
sentences.chinese: “我没干过这样的事。”他抗议道。

sentences.english: I know a thing or two (= a lot ) about dogs.
sentences.chinese: 我对狗所知甚详。

sentences.english: In a democracy, it is no bad thing to be able to compromise (= it is good, even though it may not seem good ) .
sentences.chinese: 在民主国家，能够妥协并非就是坏事。

detailed_translations.english: an idea, action, feeling, or fact that someone thinks, does, says, or talks about, or that happens

name: fix
trans: vt. 使固定；修理；安装；准备

sentences.english: The interest rate has been fixed at 6.5%.
sentences.chinese: 利率已经定为6.5%。

sentences.english: The shelves should be fixed to the wall with screws.
sentences.chinese: 架子应当用螺丝固定在墙上。

detailed_translations.english: to decide on a limit for something, especially prices, costs etc, so that they do not change

name: package
trans: n. 包，包裹；套装软件， 程序包

sentences.english: There’s a package here for a Miami Lakes address.
sentences.chinese: 这里有一个寄往迈阿密湖的包裹。

detailed_translations.english: something wrapped in paper, packed in a box, and then sent by mail or delivered
to put food or other goods into a bag, box etc ready to be sold or sent

sentences.english: The spa is open from 7:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. every day of the year.
sentences.chinese: 温泉区全年从早上7:00到晚上9:00开放。

detailed_translations.english: p.m. is used after a number to show that you are referring to a particular time between 12 noon and 12 midnight

sentences.english: She tucked her hair behind her ears.
sentences.chinese: 她把头发拢到耳朵背后。

detailed_translations.english: one of the organs on either side of your head that you hear with

name: operation
trans: n. 操作；经营； 手术； 运算

sentences.english: The whole operation is performed in less than three seconds.
sentences.chinese: 全部运算在三秒内完成。

detailed_translations.english: an action done by a computer

name: step
trans: n. 步，脚步；步骤；步伐；梯级

sentences.english: a video of baby’s first steps
sentences.chinese: 一盒婴儿学步的录像带

sentences.english: He took one step and fell.
sentences.chinese: 他走了一步就跌倒了。

sentences.english: I had to retrace my steps (= go back the way I came ) several times before I found the shop.
sentences.chinese: 我来回走了几次才找到那家商店。

sentences.english: This is the first step in reforming the welfare system.
sentences.chinese: 这是福利制度改革的第一步。

sentences.english: Jenny sat on the step in front of the house, waiting.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮坐在房前的台阶上等着。

sentences.english: I accidentally stepped in a puddle.
sentences.chinese: 我不小心踩进了水坑。

detailed_translations.english: the movement you make when you put one foot in front of or behind the other when walking
to bring your foot down on something

name: recipe
trans: n. 食谱； 处方；秘诀；烹饪法

sentences.english: a recipe book
sentences.chinese: 一本烹饪书

detailed_translations.english: a set of instructions for cooking a particular type of food

sentences.english: Davis was found not guilty on all counts .
sentences.chinese: 戴维斯受到指控的各项罪名均不成立。

detailed_translations.english: one of the crimes that someone is charged with

name: magic
trans: adj. 不可思议的；有魔力的；魔术的

sentences.english: a book of magic spells
sentences.chinese: 一本关于魔法的书

sentences.english: a magic sword
sentences.chinese: 一把魔剑

detailed_translations.english: in stories, a magic word or object has special powers that make the person using it able to do impossible things
the power to make impossible things happen by saying special words or doing special actions

sentences.english: He has a lot of talent , and his work is fresh and interesting.
sentences.chinese: 他很有天赋，作品新颖有趣。

sentences.english: a persuasive speaker with a natural talent for leadership
sentences.chinese: 有领导天赋、颇有辩才的演说者

sentences.english: His latest book reveals hidden talents.
sentences.chinese: 他最新的一本书展现了他深藏不露的才能。

sentences.english: Sadly, she inherited none of her father’s musical talent.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，她一点都没有继承她父亲的音乐天赋。

sentences.english: He is a great talent.
sentences.chinese: 他是个了不起的人才。

sentences.english: Britain’s footballing talent
sentences.chinese: 英国的足球天才

detailed_translations.english: a natural ability to do something well

name: valuable
trans: adj. 有价值的；贵重的；可估价的

sentences.english: the most expensive restaurant in town
sentences.chinese: 城里最贵的餐馆

sentences.english: Petrol is becoming more and more expensive.
sentences.chinese: 汽油越来越贵了。

sentences.english: Photography is an expensive hobby.
sentences.chinese: 摄影是一项很花钱的业余爱好。

sentences.english: For low-income families, children’s safety equipment can be prohibitively expensive (= so expensive that most people cannot afford it ).
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入家庭来说，儿童的安全设备贵得让人望而却步。

sentences.english: Employing the wrong builder can be a horribly expensive mistake.
sentences.chinese: 用错建筑工人有时会是代价高昂的错误。

sentences.english: Her husband had expensive tastes (= liked expensive things ).
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫喜欢的东西都很贵。

detailed_translations.english: costing a lot of money

name: understanding
trans: n. 谅解，理解；理解力；协议
adj. 了解的；聪明的；有理解力的

sentences.english: Luckily, I have a very under­standing boss.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的是，我有一个非常通情达理的上司。

detailed_translations.chinese: 体谅的， 宽容的， 通情达理的
detailed_translations.english: sympathetic and kind about other people’s problems

detailed_translations.chinese: 理解，理解力；谅解；协议；相互理解，融洽
detailed_translations.english: an unofficial or informal agreement

name: cry
trans: n. 叫喊；叫声；口号；呼叫

sentences.english: Don’t cry, Laura. It’ll be OK.
sentences.chinese: 不要哭，劳拉，没事的。

sentences.english: Upstairs, a baby began to cry.
sentences.chinese: 楼上有个婴儿开始哭起来。

sentences.english: Jamie looked like he’d been crying.
sentences.chinese: 杰米看上去好像哭过了。

sentences.english: I just couldn’t stop crying.
sentences.chinese: 我就是哭个不停。

sentences.english: That film always makes me cry .
sentences.chinese: 那部影片总是让我落泪。

sentences.english: Oliver, alone, began to cry bitterly (= cry a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗独自一人，开始伤心地哭了。

sentences.english: ‘Stop!’ she cried.
sentences.chinese: “停下！”她喊道。

detailed_translations.english: to produce tears from your eyes, usually because you are unhappy or hurt

sentences.english: a German-English dictionary
sentences.chinese: 一本德英词典

detailed_translations.english: a book that gives a list of words in alphabetical order and explains their meanings in the same language, or another language

name: pop
trans: abbr. 卖点广告（Point of Purchase）

sentences.english: The window opened and a dog's head popped out.
sentences.chinese: 窗子打开了，冷不防一只狗探出头来。

sentences.english: An idea suddenly popped into his head.
sentences.chinese: 他突然想到了一个主意。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly appear, especially when not expected

name: backpack
trans: n. 双肩背包，背包；远足用的背包
vi. 背负简便行李旅行；挑运

detailed_translations.english: a  rucksack

name: nineteenth
trans: num. 第十九；十九分之一

sentences.english: The nineteenth to Pethahiah, the twentieth to Jehezekel.
sentences.chinese: 第十九是毗他希雅，第二十是以西结。

sentences.chinese: 十九世纪产生的保险业，需要精确地知道造成损失的危险程度有多大，以便计算保险费用。

sentences.english: One eof the most famous monuments in the world, the Statue of Liberty, was presented to the United States of America in the nineteenth century by the people of France.
sentences.chinese: 一个世界上最著名的纪念碑，自由女神像，是美国的美国在第十九世纪时由法国人民。

name: available
trans: adj. 可获得的；可购得的；可找到的；有空的

sentences.english: Tickets are available from the box office.
sentences.chinese: 售票处有票出售。

sentences.chinese: 一有新的信息就开会告诉员工。

sentences.english: Further building can continue when money is made available .
sentences.chinese: 有了资金就可以继续进一步的施工。

sentences.english: Every available space on the wall was covered in pictures.
sentences.chinese: 墙上每一个可用的地方都挂上了画。

detailed_translations.chinese: 可利用的，现有的；可获得的
detailed_translations.english: something that is available is able to be used or can easily be bought or found

name: useful
trans: adj. 有用的，有益的；有帮助的

sentences.english: useful information
sentences.chinese: 有用的信息

sentences.english: A little Japanese can be really useful.
sentences.chinese: 懂一点日语非常有用。

sentences.english: Can you come and make yourself useful(= help people to do something )?
sentences.chinese: 你能不能过来帮点忙？

detailed_translations.chinese: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: helping you to do or get what you want

name: separate
trans: adj. 单独的；分开的；不同的；各自的；
vt. 使分离；使分开；使分居

sentences.english: The gym and the sauna are in separate buildings.
sentences.chinese: 健身房和桑拿浴室在不同的大楼里。

detailed_translations.english: not joined to or touching something else

trans: adj. 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的
vt. 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化

sentences.english: This might need some salt and pepper.
sentences.chinese: 这里面也许要加点盐和胡椒粉。

sentences.english: Could you pass the salt?

detailed_translations.english: a natural white mineral that is added to food to make it taste better or to preserve it

detailed_translations.chinese: 咸水的；含盐的，咸味的；盐腌的；猥亵的
detailed_translations.english: preserved with salt

detailed_translations.chinese: 用盐腌；给…加盐；将盐撒在道路上使冰或雪融化

sentences.english: She recited a poem that she had learnt at school.
sentences.chinese: 她背诵了一首学校里学的诗。

sentences.chinese: 星期五黛安娜不来这里。

n. 地图；示意图；染色体图

sentences.chinese: 他在后来的十五年里绘制了安格尔西岛的地图。

a drawing of a particular area, for example a city or country, which shows its main features, such as its roads, rivers, mountains etc

sentences.english: They talked like old pals.
sentences.chinese: 他们像老朋友一样交谈。

detailed_translations.english: Your pals are your friends

name: second
trans: n. 秒；第二名；瞬间；二等品
adj. 第二的；次要的；附加的
adv. 第二；其次；居第二位

sentences.english: Any proposal must be seconded by two other members of the committee.
sentences.chinese: 任何提案须有委员会其他两位委员附议。

detailed_translations.english: to formally support a suggestion made by another person in a meeting

name: special
trans: n. 特使，特派人员；特刊；特色菜；专车；特价商品
adj. 特别的；专门的，专用的

sentences.english: a special place in the classroom for reading
sentences.chinese: 教室里的阅读专区

sentences.chinese: 没有人享有特殊待遇。

sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚的苹果馅饼秘方

sentences.chinese: 这些精美瓷器只在特殊场合使用。

sentences.chinese: 每一座村子都有其独特的魅力。

detailed_translations.english: not ordinary or usual, but different in some way and often better or more important

name: wild
trans: adj. 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的

sentences.english: {"COLLOINEXA":["wild animals"]}
sentences.chinese: 野生动物

sentences.english: a field full of wild flowers
sentences.chinese: 遍地野花的田野

sentences.english: animals both wild and domesticated
sentences.chinese: 野生动物和家养动物

detailed_translations.chinese: 野生的；野蛮的；狂热的；荒凉的
detailed_translations.english: living in a natural state, not changed or controlled by people
in natural and free conditions, not kept or controlled by people
if plants run wild, they grow a lot in an uncontrolled way

sentences.english: The kangaroo has a problem.
sentences.chinese: 这只袋鼠有一个难题。

sentences.english: This is the kangaroo from Australia.
sentences.chinese: 这是一只来自澳洲的袋鼠。

sentences.english: Thanks to special bacteria in their stomachs, kangaroo flatulence contains no methane and scientists want to transfer that bacteria to cattle and sheep who emit large quantities of the harmful gas.
sentences.chinese: 袋鼠胃中有一种特殊的细菌能使其放的屁中不含有甲烷。 科学家想将这种细菌移至牛羊的胃中，以抑制它们所排放的大量有害气体。

detailed_translations.english: an Australian animal that moves by jumping and carries its babies in a pouch (= a special pocket of skin ) on its stomach

name: touch
trans: n. 接触；触觉；格调；少许
vt. 接触；触动；使轻度受害
vi. 触摸；涉及；接近；提到

sentences.chinese: 她伸手去碰他的胳膊。

sentences.english: If your house has been burgled, you shouldn’t touch anything until the police arrive.
sentences.chinese: 如果家中被盗，在警察赶到之前不要动任何物品。

sentences.english: ‘Don’t touch me!’ she yelled.
sentences.chinese: “别碰我！”她大叫道。

sentences.english: Her plight has touched the hearts of people around the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的困境触动了全世界人的心弦。

sentences.chinese: 她感到有人轻轻碰了一下她的肩膀。

detailed_translations.english: to put your hand, finger etc on someone or something
the action of putting your hand, finger, or another part of your body on something or someone

sentences.english: Many are planning to return to their homeland.
sentences.chinese: 很多人正计划回到自己的祖国去。

detailed_translations.english: the country where someone was born

sentences.chinese: 这些车在一场暴雨中相撞了。

trans: n. 片刻，瞬间，时刻；重要，契机

sentences.chinese: 这是他一生中最激动人心的时刻之一。

sentences.chinese: 此时此刻她可能遇到了麻烦，正想方设法给你打电话。

sentences.chinese: 我还记得手术后第一次见到他的那一刻。

sentences.chinese: 奎因似乎总能在关键时刻把握时机。

sentences.chinese: 我才刚到，丹就想知道我什么时候走。

sentences.chinese: 这个时候恐怕不宜对局势作出评论。

sentences.chinese: 沉寂了片刻，然后雷开始说话了。

detailed_translations.english: a particular point in time

name: roof
trans: n. 屋顶；最高处，顶部；最高限度

sentences.chinese: 他们最后在屋顶上找到了那只猫。

sentences.english: a flat roof

sentences.english: a pitched roof

detailed_translations.chinese: 屋顶；最高处，顶部；最高限度
detailed_translations.english: the structure that covers or forms the top of a building, vehicle, tent etc
to put a roof on a building

sentences.english: The restaurant serves good food at affordable prices.
sentences.chinese: 那家餐厅物美价廉。

sentences.chinese: 我喜欢意大利食物，尤其是面食。

sentences.chinese: 他被告知要少吃过咸和油腻的食物。

detailed_translations.chinese: 食物，食品；养料，精神食粮
detailed_translations.english: things that people and animals eat, such as vege-tables or meat

name: old
trans: adj. 陈旧的，古老的；年老的

sentences.english: an old man
sentences.chinese: 一位老人

sentences.english: How old are you?
sentences.chinese: 你多大年纪？

sentences.chinese: 你比萨莉大吗？

sentences.chinese: 你现在已经长大，可以自己弄早餐了。

name: save
trans: vt. 节省；保存；储蓄；解救

sentences.english: We’ll save a lot of time if we go by car.
sentences.chinese: 我们要是开车去，可以节省很多时间。

sentences.english: Everyone is being encouraged to save energy.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都被鼓励节约能源。

detailed_translations.english: to use less money, time, energy etc so that you do not waste any

name: daily
trans: n. 日报；朝来夜去的女佣

sentences.chinese: 每日飞往迈阿密的航班

sentences.english: China Daily receives dispatches from all parts of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《中国日报》收到世界各地发来的电讯。

detailed_translations.english: happening or done every day

adj. 准备好；现成的；迅速的；情愿的；快要…的

sentences.chinese: 快点，你还没准备好吗？

sentences.english: When the doorbell rang he was ready and waiting .
sentences.chinese: 门铃响的时候，他已经准备好在等着了。

sentences.english: Why does it take you so long to get ready to go out?
sentences.chinese: 你外出怎么要准备那么长时间？

trans: n. 薄片；部分；菜刀，火铲

sentences.english: The bed wasn’t particularly comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 这床不大舒服。

sentences.chinese: 还有8天就到圣诞节了。

sentences.chinese: 他们是8点钟醒的。

sentences.chinese: 我认识芭芭拉很多年了，实际上我们从小就认识。

sentences.chinese: 其实再想想，我今晚不打算出去了。

sentences.chinese: 一辆马车

sentences.chinese: 李以前从未骑过马。

detailed_translations.english: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things

trans: adj. 诚实的，实在的；可靠的；坦率的

sentences.chinese: 他勤奋老实。

vt. 指向；弄尖；加标点于

sentences.chinese: 该党的得票率下跌了十个百分点。

sentences.chinese: 有三个要点我们必须记住。

name: seventeen

sentences.chinese: 由17名美国军官组成的团体

sentences.english: I left home when I was seventeen (= 17 years old ) .
sentences.chinese: 我17岁时离开家。

detailed_translations.english: the number 17

detailed_translations.chinese: 十七岁的；十七的，十七个的

detailed_translations.english: the number 17

name: seal
trans: n. 密封；印章；海豹；封条；标志

sentences.english: The document carried the seal of the governor’s office.
sentences.chinese: 文件上盖有州长办公室的章。

sentences.english: He broke the wax seal and unrolled the paper.
sentences.chinese: 他揭去封蜡，把纸卷展开。

sentences.english: The window was sealed shut.
sentences.chinese: 这扇窗户被封了起来。

detailed_translations.english: a mark that has a special design and shows the legal or official authority of a person or organization

name: long
trans: n. 长时间； 长音节；（服装的）长尺寸；长裤
adj. 长的；过长的；做多头的；长时间的；冗长的，长音

sentences.chinese: 到那里去要多长时间？

sentences.english: She longed for the chance to speak to him in private.
sentences.chinese: 她渴望有机会和他私下交谈。

detailed_translations.english: to want something very much, especially when it seems unlikely to happen soon

name: private
trans: adj. 私人的；私有的；私下的

sentences.english: Morris has a private jet.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯拥有一架私人喷气式飞机。

sentences.english: He made some notes for his private use.
sentences.chinese: 他记了些笔记供自己所用。

sentences.english: They objected to any form of private property .
sentences.chinese: 他们反对任何形式的私有财产。

detailed_translations.english: for use by one person or group, not for everyone

sentences.chinese: 燃料价格持续上涨。

sentences.english: They may pay a high price for their few years of glory.
sentences.chinese: 为了短短几年的辉煌，他们也许要付出高昂的代价。

name: tall
trans: adj. 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的

sentences.chinese: 他年轻，身材高大。

sentences.english: a house surrounded by tall trees
sentences.chinese: 大树环绕的房子

sentences.english: This bush grows tall very quickly.
sentences.chinese: 这种灌木很快就能长高。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高的；长的；过分的；夸大的

detailed_translations.chinese: (Tall)人名；(马里、阿拉伯)塔勒；(芬、罗、瑞典)塔尔；(英)托尔；(土)塔勒

name: parrot
trans: n. 鹦鹉；学舌者，应声虫；机械模仿别人的人

sentences.english: We recited poems parrot fashion.
sentences.chinese: 我们鹦鹉学舌般机械地背诵诗歌。

detailed_translations.chinese: 鹦鹉；学舌者，应声虫；机械模仿别人的人
detailed_translations.english: a tropical bird with a curved beak and brightly coloured feathers that can be taught to copy human speech

sentences.english: I want you stuffed in my stocking.
sentences.chinese: 我只要你塞在我的袜子里。

sentences.english: The Christmas stocking bulged with goodies.

sentences.chinese: 她昨天夜晚丝袜被钉子钩住，抽了丝。

name: class
trans: n. 阶级；班级；种类；班；等级
adj. 极好的；很好的，优秀的，出色的
vt. 分类；把…分等级；把…归入某等级，把…看作（或分类、归类）；把…编入某一班级
vi. 属于…类（或等级），被列为某类（或某级）

sentences.english: Gary came top of the class in English.
sentences.chinese: 加里的英文是班里顶尖的。

sentences.english: a member of the landed class
sentences.chinese: 地主阶级的一员

sentences.english: He’s not in the same class (= not as good ) as her at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 他的网球水平并不如她。

name: smoke
trans: n. 烟；抽烟；无常的事物

sentences.chinese: 我不吸烟，酒也喝得不多。

sentences.chinese: 我抽烟你介意吗？

sentences.english: He sat on the grass smoking a cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在草地上吸烟。

sentences.chinese: 哈维每做成一笔生意可得到50美元的佣金。

sentences.chinese: 汽车推销员常常宁愿降价也不愿失去一笔生意。

sentences.chinese: 对伊朗的军火销售

detailed_translations.english: when you sell something

sentences.english: religious beliefs and practices
sentences.chinese: 宗教信仰和习俗

sentences.english: dangerous working practices
sentences.chinese: 危险的工作方法

detailed_translations.english: something that people do often, especially a particular way of doing something or a social or religious custom

sentences.english: She has reason to feel guilty.
sentences.chinese: 她有理由感到内疚。

sentences.english: the human power of reason
sentences.chinese: 人类的理性

sentences.english: They reasoned that other businesses would soon copy the idea.
sentences.chinese: 他们推断其他企业也会很快仿效这个点子。

detailed_translations.english: why something happens, or why someone does something

sentences.english: They moved to a new house some time ago (=  a fairly long time ago  ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们搬进新居已有些日子了。

sentences.english: We had our bicentenary celebrations not that long ago.
sentences.chinese: 不久前，我们举行了200周年庆典活动。

detailed_translations.english: used to show how far back in the past something happened

trans: n. 及格；经过；护照；途径；传球
vi. 经过；传递；变化；终止

sentences.chinese: 人群分开让卡车通过。

sentences.chinese: 他经过时对我微笑了一下。

sentences.chinese: 我们在戏院外从一群学生身旁经过。

sentences.english: I pass the sports centre on the way to work.

sentences.english: The road passes right through the town centre.
sentences.chinese: 那条路正好穿过镇中心。

sentences.english: We passed the winter pleasantly enough.
sentences.chinese: 我们相当愉快地度过了那个冬季。

name: serve
trans: vi. 服役，服务；适合，足够；发球；招待，侍候
vt. 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用

sentences.english: There was only one girl serving customers .
sentences.chinese: 只有一个女孩在接待顾客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 招待，供应；为…服务；对…有用；可作…用

the action in a game such as tennis or  volleyball  when you throw the ball in the air and hit it over the net

name: warn
trans: vi. 发出警告，发出预告

sentences.chinese: “小心，岩石很滑。”亚历克斯提醒说。

trans: n. 调查；测量；审视；纵览

sentences.chinese: 被调查的 100 家公司中，10% 的公司营业额在 5,000 万到 9,900 万英镑之间。

sentences.chinese: 她转过头审视女儿苍白的面容。

sentences.chinese: 地质勘察

name: number
trans: n. 数；（杂志等的）期；号码；数字；算术
vt. 编号；计入；数…的数目；使为数有限

sentences.chinese: 他们在一张大纸上写下了很多不同的数字。

sentences.english: Answer question number 4.
sentences.chinese: 回答第4题。

detailed_translations.english: a word or sign that represents an amount or a quantity

sentences.english: Can I try you new badminton racket?
sentences.chinese: 我可以试用你的羽毛球拍吗？

sentences.english: I like playing basketball and  badminton.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢的篮球和羽毛球。

sentences.english: My friend and I take part in sports like tennis,badminton and swimming.
sentences.chinese: 我和我的朋友参加体育运动如打网球,羽毛球和游泳.

name: kind
trans: adj. 和蔼的；宽容的；令人感激的

sentences.chinese: 给我一份三明治，随便哪种都可以。

detailed_translations.english: one of the different types of a person or thing that belong to the same group

sentences.chinese: 至少射出了18颗子弹。

sentences.english: Jim was eighteen (= 18 years old ).

detailed_translations.english: the number 18

sentences.english: What will you do this vacation?
sentences.chinese: 你这个假期将干什么？

sentences.chinese: 您假期有什么安排吗？

sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.chinese: 黛娜一边哭一边慢慢地开车走了。

trans: vt. 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘

sentences.chinese: 贝琳达热情地招呼她。

sentences.chinese: 我们大约走了半英里。

sentences.chinese: 他正以每小时70英里的速度驾车行驶。

name: cotton
trans: vi. 一致；理解；和谐；亲近

sentences.chinese: 白色棉布衬衫

sentences.english: Made from 100% cotton.
sentences.chinese: 百分之百纯棉制作。

sentences.chinese: 冰封的山路

sentences.chinese: 在十二月的黑夜里。

sentences.chinese: 昨晚我做了很多梦。

sentences.chinese: 人们可以在家通过个人电脑办理银行业务。

sentences.chinese: 你不应尽信书上看来的东西。

sentences.english: I believed him, even though his story sounded unlikely.
sentences.chinese: 我相信了他，尽管他的话听上去难以置信。

sentences.chinese: 你爸爸会非常高兴的。

sentences.chinese: 她受了赞扬，显得很高兴。

detailed_translations.chinese: 高兴的；喜欢的；乐意做某事

detailed_translations.chinese: 满意；愿意（please的过去分词形式）

trans: adv. 双重地；两倍地；弓身地
vi. 加倍，加倍努力；快步走

sentences.chinese: 双水槽

sentences.english: a double wardrobe
sentences.chinese: 双门衣柜

sentences.chinese: 大教堂宏伟的双开大门

sentences.chinese: 不可以在双黄线处停车。

sentences.chinese: 该城被两倍厚的墙围了起来。

sentences.chinese: 六年前我搬到了这个城市。

sentences.english: I’m not late again, am I?
sentences.chinese: 我没有又迟到吧？

sentences.english: My husband and I enjoy going to the theatre.
sentences.chinese: 我和丈夫喜欢去剧院看戏。

detailed_translations.english: used by the person speaking or writing to refer to himself or herself

sentences.chinese: 哈里爬上楼梯。

sentences.english: Boys were climbing trees along the river bank.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在河边爬树。

to move up, down, or across something using your feet and hands, especially when this is difficult to do

sentences.english: But it contained one very interesting piece of data: in 2008, for the first time in sixteen years, the finance and insurance industry shrank.
sentences.chinese: 但是，这份报告里有一项非常耐人寻味的数据：在2008年，金融保险业出现近十六年来的首次萎缩。

sentences.chinese: 人都喜欢亲自去做。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize one

name: neither
trans: adv. 两个都不；既不……也不

sentences.chinese: 奥列格的父母都不会说英语。

sentences.english: The equipment is neither accurate nor safe.
sentences.chinese: 这台设备既不精确，也不安全。

detailed_translations.english: used when mentioning two things that are not true or possible

name: swing
trans: n. 摇摆；摆动；秋千；音律；涨落
adj. 旋转的；悬挂的；强节奏爵士音乐的
vi. 摇摆；转向；悬挂；大摇大摆地行走

sentences.english: Let your arms swing as you walk.
sentences.chinese: 边走边摆动双臂。

sentences.english: a sign swinging in the wind
sentences.chinese: 在风中摇摆的指示牌

sentences.chinese: 他前后甩动着他的包。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 她左右晃动着两条腿。

sentences.english: She swung her legs from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 他对准球猛地挥拍一击。

detailed_translations.english: to make regular movements forwards and backwards or from one side to another while hanging from a particular point, or to make something do this

name: windy
trans: adj. 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的

sentences.chinese: 风太大，不适合野餐。

sentences.english: a cold, windy day
sentences.chinese: 一个寒冷的大风天

sentences.english: a windy hillside
sentences.chinese: 当风的山坡

detailed_translations.chinese: 多风的，有风的；腹胀的；吹牛的
detailed_translations.english: if it is windy, there is a lot of wind

name: robot
trans: n. 机器人；遥控设备，自动机械；机械般工作的人

sentences.chinese: 机器人制造的汽车

detailed_translations.english: a machine that can move and do some of the work of a person, and is usually controlled by a computer

sentences.chinese: 杰克， 我喜欢你的短裤。

sentences.chinese: 我的短裤在哪里？

sentences.chinese: 现在我就有了一条骑车时的酷酷短裤啦！

name: east
trans: n. 东方；东风；东方国家
adj. 东方的；向东的；从东方来的

sentences.chinese: 这药一直在东方使用。

name: rule
trans: vt. 统治；规定；管理；裁决；支配

sentences.english: The judge ruled that she should have custody of the children.
sentences.chinese: 法官判定孩子的监护权归她。

detailed_translations.english: to make an official decision about something, especially a legal problem

name: box
trans: vt. 拳击；装…入盒中；打耳光

sentences.english: the jury box
sentences.chinese: 陪审团席

detailed_translations.english: a small area of a theatre or court that is separate from where other people are sitting

sentences.english: an impolite remark

detailed_translations.english: not polite

sentences.english: ...taking tiny bites of a hot dog and daintily wiping my lips with a napkin.
sentences.chinese: …小口咬着热狗并用餐巾文雅地擦着我的嘴唇。

detailed_translations.english: a square piece of cloth or paper used for protecting your clothes and for cleaning your hands and lips during a meal

name: speech
trans: n. 演讲；讲话； 语音；演说

sentences.english: He has to make a lot of after-dinner speeches .
sentences.chinese: 他经常要发表席后演说。

sentences.english: Collins gave the keynote speech (= most important speech ) .
sentences.chinese: 科林斯作了主题发言。

detailed_translations.chinese: 演讲；讲话；[语] 语音；演说
detailed_translations.english: a talk, especially a formal one about a particular subject, given to a group of people

sentences.english: This last task is possibly the most difficult.
sentences.chinese: 这最后一项任务也许是最难的。

sentences.english: It will take three weeks, possibly longer.
sentences.chinese: 要花三个星期，也许更久。

sentences.english: ‘Will you be here tomorrow?’ ‘Possibly.’

sentences.english: ‘Was it murder?’ ‘ Quite possibly (= it is very likely ) .’
sentences.chinese: “是谋杀吗？”“很可能是。”

detailed_translations.english: used when saying that something may be true or likely, although you are not completely certain

sentences.english: He was surrounded by a group of admirers.
sentences.chinese: 他的身边围了一群仰慕者。

sentences.english: The photo shows four men grouped round a jeep.
sentences.chinese: 照片上是四个男人围着一辆吉普车。

detailed_translations.english: several people or things that are all together in the same place
to come together and form a group, or to arrange things or people together in a group

name: spend
trans: vt. 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽

sentences.english: I can’t afford to spend any more money this week.
sentences.chinese: 这星期我没有能力花更多的钱了。

sentences.english: The repairs cost a lot, but it’s money well spent (= a sensible way of spending money ) .
sentences.chinese: 修理费很高，但这是该花的钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 度过，消磨（时光）；花费；浪费；用尽
detailed_translations.english: to use your money to pay for goods or services

name: air
trans: n. 空气，大气；天空；样子；曲调

sentences.english: Let’s go outside and get some fresh air.
sentences.chinese: 我们出去呼吸些新鲜空气吧。

sentences.english: You need to put some air in the tyres.
sentences.chinese: 你得给轮胎充气了。

sentences.english: Flames leapt into the air.
sentences.chinese: 火苗蹿向天空。

sentences.english: He fell 2,000 metres through the air without a parachute.
sentences.chinese: 他没用降落伞在空中下落了2,000米。

detailed_translations.english: the mixture of gases around the Earth, that we breathe

name: any
trans: adj. 任何的；所有的；丝毫
pron. 任何；任何一个；若干

sentences.english: Have you got any money?
sentences.chinese: 你身上有没有钱？

sentences.english: Any child who breaks the rules will be punished.
sentences.chinese: 凡违反规定的孩子都要受罚。

detailed_translations.english: some or even the smallest amount or number

name: small
trans: n. 小件物品；矮小的人
adj. 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的

sentences.english: a small piece of paper
sentences.chinese: 一小片纸

sentences.english: a small car
sentences.chinese: 一辆小汽车

sentences.english: a small town
sentences.chinese: 小镇

sentences.english: a small dark woman
sentences.chinese: 一个皮肤黝黑的小个子女人

sentences.chinese: 这件 T 恤衫他穿太小了。

sentences.chinese: 这羊毛衫有三个尺寸: 小号、中号和大号。

sentences.chinese: 只有相对少数的人受到了影响。

sentences.english: a small amount of money
sentences.chinese: 一小笔钱

detailed_translations.chinese: 少的，小的；微弱的；几乎没有的；不重要的；幼小的
detailed_translations.english: not large in size or amount

name: wide
trans: adj. 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
adv. 广泛地；广阔地；充分地

sentences.english: a man with a wide experience of foreign affairs
sentences.chinese: 外交事务经验丰富的人

sentences.english: Our aim is to bring classical music to a wider audience.
sentences.chinese: 我们的目的是把古典音乐带给更多的听众。

detailed_translations.chinese: 广泛的；宽的，广阔的；张大的；远离目标的
detailed_translations.english: including or involving a large variety of different people, things, or situations
opening or spreading as much as possible

sentences.english: My foot hurts.
sentences.chinese: 我脚痛。

sentences.english: I had blisters on the soles of my feet .
sentences.chinese: 我的脚底起泡了。

sentences.english: I dropped a glass earlier, so don’t walk around in bare feet .
sentences.chinese: 我刚才打破了一个玻璃杯，所以不要光着脚到处走。

sentences.chinese: 兽医检查了马的后蹄。

sentences.english: He walked to the foot of the stairs.
sentences.chinese: 他走到楼梯下面。

sentences.english: He’s six feet tall , with blonde hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身高六英尺，一头金发。

detailed_translations.english: the part of your body that you stand on and walk on

sentences.chinese: 但是从二月到七月，乔伊又无事可做了。

sentences.english: People still remembered the earthquake that had jarred this region last July.
sentences.chinese: 人们仍然记得去年七月发生的使该地区产生剧烈震动的那次地震。

sentences.english: One July a couple of years ago I took my supper with a Captain Moran on board the S.S. Margaret, that had put into a western river from I know not where.
sentences.chinese: 两年前的七月，我在玛格丽特号船上和一位名叫莫兰的船长共进晚餐，这艘船从我不熟悉的一个地方出发，驶往爱尔兰西部的某条河流。

name: sure
trans: adj. 确信的；可靠的；必定的

sentences.english: ‘That’s Sarah’s cousin.’ ‘Are you sure?’
sentences.chinese: “那是萨拉的表妹。”“你肯定吗？”

sentences.english: ‘What time does the show start?’ ‘I’m not sure.’
sentences.chinese: “表演什么时候开始？”“我说不准。”

sentences.english: My mother, I felt sure , had not met him before.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定我妈妈以前从未见过他。

used to say ‘yes’ to someone

name: endangered

sentences.chinese: 我认为有许多濒临灭绝的动物，如老虎和大熊猫，在世界。

sentences.english: I think our government should punish those people severely who kill the rare animals. It is our duty to protect the endangered animals.
sentences.chinese: 我认为政府应该严厉惩罚那些捕杀稀有动物的人。保护濒临灭绝的动物是我们的责任。

sentences.english: However, it holds six language families, two of which have only one remaining language, and almost all of the languages here are endangered.
sentences.chinese: 然而，它拥有六个语族，其中两个语族仅剩下一种语言，而且这儿几乎所有的语言都濒临灭绝。

detailed_translations.chinese: 濒危的， 将要灭绝的

name: guest
trans: adj. 客人的；特邀的，客座的

sentences.chinese: 250位贵宾出席的宴会

sentences.chinese: 受邀的嘉宾中有杰里·布朗和伊莱休·哈里斯。

sentences.english: The actress was guest of honour (= the most important guest ) at the launch.
sentences.chinese: 这位女演员是首发式上的贵宾。

sentences.english: I’ve nearly finished the guest list for the wedding.
sentences.chinese: 参加婚礼的嘉宾名单我差不多准备好了。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is invited to an event or special occasion
for guests to use

trans: adj. 通常的，惯例的；平常的

sentences.chinese: 按通常的做法做奶酪酱。

sentences.english: I’ll meet you at the usual time.
sentences.chinese: 我在老时间和你碰头。

sentences.english: She ate twice as much as usual.
sentences.chinese: 她吃了平时食量两倍的东西。

trans: n. 印度人；印第安人；印第安语
adj. 印度的；印第安人的；印第安语的

sentences.english: the Indian government
sentences.chinese: 印度政府

detailed_translations.english: relating to India or its people
someone from India

sentences.chinese: 她现在是一个寡妇。

sentences.english: But we are now a much more fragmented society.
sentences.chinese: 但是我们现在是一个更加四分五裂的社会。

sentences.english: If we leave now we’ll be there before dark.
sentences.chinese: 如果我们现在出发，天黑之前就能赶到那里。

trans: n. 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物
adj. 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的

sentences.english: The by-pass crosses Wilton Lane shortly after a roundabout.
sentences.chinese: 这条旁道绕过环岛后不久就和威尔顿巷相交。

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉，十字；十字架，十字形物

if two or more roads, lines, etc cross, or if one crosses another, they go across each other

detailed_translations.chinese: 交叉的，相反的；乖戾的；生气的
detailed_translations.english: angry or annoyed

name: late
trans: adj. 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的

sentences.chinese: 对不起，来晚了——我睡过头了。

sentences.english: The train was even later than usual.
sentences.chinese: 火车到得甚至比平时还晚。

sentences.english: We apologize for the late departure of flight AZ709.
sentences.chinese: 我们为AZ709航班延误起飞表示歉意。

sentences.english: There are penalties if loan repayments are late.
sentences.chinese: 逾期偿还贷款会被处以罚金。

sentences.english: The stores are open later on Thursdays.
sentences.chinese: 商店星期四开门较晚。

detailed_translations.english: arriving, happening, or done after the time that was expected, agreed, or arranged
after the usual time

trans: n. 事故；意外； 意外事件；机遇

sentences.chinese: 肯在工作中出了事故，不得不去医院。

sentences.english: I had a slight accident with your coffee.
sentences.chinese: 出了个小小的意外，我把你的咖啡弄洒了。

sentences.english: a train accident

detailed_translations.english: a situation in which someone is injured or something is damaged without anyone intending them to be

sentences.chinese: 露西的膝盖上缠着绷带。

sentences.english: a knee injury
sentences.chinese: 膝伤

detailed_translations.english: the joint that bends in the middle of your leg
to hit someone with your knee

sentences.english: The path descends to  the pond.
sentences.chinese: 小路下斜通到池塘。

sentences.english: This pond often catches in winter.
sentences.chinese: 这个池塘在冬天常常结冰。

sentences.chinese: 各种野花和野草环绕着这个小池塘。

sentences.chinese: 到展览会参观的人都必须先到总服务台报到。

sentences.chinese: 我国将和另外一个国家联合主办这次展览会。

sentences.chinese: 你去展览中心吧，我得赶紧汇报一下这个新情况。

sentences.chinese: 害怕坐飞机

sentences.english: Fearing violence, the group asked for police protection.
sentences.chinese: 该团体担心发生暴力事件，所以请求警方保护。

name: dumpling

sentences.chinese: 鸡肉和汤团

detailed_translations.english: a round lump of flour and fat mixed with water, cooked in boiling liquid and served with meat

name: granny
trans: n. 奶奶；外婆；婆婆妈妈的人

sentences.english: ...my old granny.
sentences.chinese: …我的老奶奶。

detailed_translations.chinese: 奶奶；外婆；婆婆妈妈的人

name: apart
trans: adj. 分离的；与众不同的
adv. 相距；与众不同地；分离着

sentences.english: They have offices in countries as far apart as India and Peru.
sentences.chinese: 他们的办事处远至印度、秘鲁等国。

sentences.english: The police try to keep rival supporters apart at all matches.
sentences.chinese: 警方在所有的比赛中都设法将双方的支持者分开。
