to believe that someone is honest or will not do anything bad or wrong

name: mail
trans: n. 邮件；邮政，邮递；盔甲

sentences.english: You shouldn’t read other people’s mail.
sentences.chinese: 你不应该看别人的信件。

sentences.english: He found a mountain of mail waiting for him.
sentences.chinese: 他发现有堆积如山的邮件等着他处理。

sentences.english: She promised to forward my mail to my new address (= send it from your old home or office to your new one ) .
sentences.chinese: 她答应把我的邮件转寄到我的新地址。

sentences.english: He gets sacks of fan mail (= letters from people who admire him ) .
sentences.chinese: 他收到成堆仰慕者的来信。

sentences.english: The weekly newsletter is mailed to women all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 每周一期的简报邮寄给全国各地的妇女。

detailed_translations.english: the letters and packages that are delivered to you
to send a letter or package to someone

name: dirty
trans: adj. 下流的，卑鄙的；肮脏的；恶劣的；暗淡的

sentences.english: a stack of dirty dishes in the sink
sentences.chinese: 洗涤槽里的一堆脏碟子

sentences.english: How did you get so dirty?
sentences.chinese: 你怎么会弄得这么脏？

sentences.english: kids telling dirty jokes
sentences.chinese: 讲着下流笑话的年轻人

sentences.english: a dirty magazine
sentences.chinese: 色情杂志

detailed_translations.english: covered in or marked by an unwanted substance

name: trip
trans: vi. 绊倒；远足；犯错误；轻快地走

sentences.english: Two lucky employees won a round-the-world trip.
sentences.chinese: 两名幸运的雇员赢得一次环游世界的机会。

sentences.english: It’s an 80-mile round trip (= a journey to a place and back again ) to Exeter.
sentences.chinese: 到埃克塞特往返有80英里。

sentences.english: I’m afraid you’ve had a wasted trip (= a trip in which you do not achieve your purpose ) . Mr Burgess has already left.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕你是白来一趟了，伯吉斯先生已经走了。

sentences.english: He was unable to make the trip to accept the award.
sentences.chinese: 他无法前去领奖。

detailed_translations.english: a visit to a place that involves a journey, for pleasure or a particular purpose
to hit something with your foot by accident so that you fall or almost fall

name: glue
trans: vt. 粘合；似胶般固着于

sentences.english: a tube of glue
sentences.chinese: 一管胶水

sentences.english: The sheets are glued together with strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 薄板用强力胶粘在一起。

detailed_translations.english: a sticky substance used for joining things together
to join two things together using glue

name: awful
trans: adj. 可怕的；极坏的；使人敬畏的

sentences.english: The weather was awful.
sentences.chinese: 天气很糟糕。

detailed_translations.english: very bad or unpleasant

name: passenger
trans: n. 旅客；乘客；过路人；碍手碍脚的人

sentences.english: Neither the driver nor the passengers were hurt.
sentences.chinese: 司机和乘客均未受伤。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is travelling in a vehicle, plane, boat etc, but is not driving it or working on it

name: pull
trans: n. 拉，拉绳；拉力，牵引力；拖

sentences.english: Mom! Davey’s pulling my hair!
sentences.chinese: 妈妈! 戴维拽我的头发！

sentences.english: He gave her a sharp pull forward.
sentences.chinese: 他猛地把她往前一拉。

detailed_translations.english: to use your hands to make something or someone move towards you or in the direction that your hands are moving
an act of using force to move something towards you or in the same direction that you are moving

name: shower
trans: n. 淋浴；（倾泻般出现的）一阵，一大批；阵雨
vt. 大量地给予；把……弄湿

sentences.english: Why does the phone always ring when I’m in the shower?
sentences.chinese: 为什么电话铃总是在我洗澡的时候响？

sentences.english: I’d like to use the shower if that’s all right.
sentences.chinese: 如果可以的话，我想用一下这里的淋浴。

sentences.english: The bathroom has a separate shower cubicle (= a shower in a separate part of the room ) .
sentences.chinese: 卫生间里有一个独立的淋浴间。

sentences.english: I need a shower.
sentences.chinese: 我需要洗个淋浴。

sentences.english: Mike shaved and showered.
sentences.chinese: 迈克刮了脸，冲了个淋浴。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment that you stand under to wash your whole body
to wash your whole body while standing under a shower

name: dry
trans: adj. 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的

sentences.english: I need to change into some dry clothes .
sentences.chinese: 我要换上干衣服。

sentences.english: Make sure that the surface is clean and dry before you start to paint.
sentences.chinese: 油漆之前一定先要确保表面清洁干燥。

sentences.english: You should store disks in a cool, dry place.
sentences.chinese: 你应该把磁盘存放在阴凉干燥的地方。

sentences.english: The path is dry as a bone (= very dry ) .
sentences.chinese: 这条小道很干燥。

detailed_translations.english: without water or liquid inside or on the surface

name: fill
trans: n. 满足；填满的量；装填物
vt. 装满，使充满；满足；堵塞；任职

sentences.english: He poured her a drink, then filled his own glass.
sentences.chinese: 他给她倒了一杯，然后将自己的杯子斟满。

sentences.english: My job was filling the flour sacks.
sentences.chinese: 我的工作是装面粉袋。

sentences.english: Take a deep breath and allow your lungs to fill.
sentences.chinese: 深吸一口气，让肺部涨满。

sentences.english: There was just enough wind to fill the sails.
sentences.chinese: 正好有足够大的风鼓满船帆。

sentences.english: Miller’s band was filling dance halls (= attracting a lot of people ) all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 米勒的乐队在全国各地的舞厅都人气爆棚。

sentences.english: Numerous pictures fill every available space.
sentences.chinese: 密密麻麻的照片填满了每一块空处。

detailed_translations.english: if a container or place fills, or if you fill it, enough of something goes into it to make it full

name: tale
trans: n. 故事；传说；叙述；流言蜚语

sentences.english: a book of old Japanese folk tales
sentences.chinese: 日本古老民间故事书

sentences.english: a fairy tale by Hans Christian Andersen
sentences.chinese: 安徒生的一则童话

sentences.english: a cautionary tale
sentences.chinese: 警示故事

sentences.english: tales of her life in post-war Berlin
sentences.chinese: 有关她在战后柏林生活的传闻

detailed_translations.english: a story about exciting imaginary events

name: day
trans: adv. 每天；经常在白天地

sentences.english: We spent three days in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 我们在巴黎度过了三天。

sentences.english: She only leaves her house during the day.
sentences.chinese: 她只在白天出门。

sentences.english: It was a cold blustery day.
sentences.chinese: 那是个寒风呼啸的冷天。

sentences.english: Kept in that dark cell, I could no longer tell whether it was day or night.
sentences.chinese: 我被关在那个漆黑的牢房里，不知是白天还是黑夜。

sentences.english: The day dawned (= started ) bright and clear.
sentences.chinese: 拂晓时天朗气清。

detailed_translations.english: a period of 24 hours

sentences.english: Father doctored me for ordinary stomachache.
sentences.chinese: 父亲为我治疗一般的胃痛。

sentences.english: A fever can also affect sleep and dreams, as can a stomachache, which is why some people believe spicy foods or eating right before bed causes wild dreams.
sentences.chinese: 发烧也能影响睡眠和做梦，胃痛也如此，这就是为什么有人相信睡前吃了辛辣的食物会做噩梦。

detailed_translations.english: pain in your stomach or near your stomach

name: very
trans: adj. 恰好是，正是；甚至；十足的；特有的

sentences.english: It feels very cold today.
sentences.chinese: 今天很冷。

sentences.english: The fishing industry is very important to the area.
sentences.chinese: 捕鱼业对于该地区非常重要。

sentences.english: The traffic’s moving very slowly this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上车流非常缓慢。

sentences.english: problems that are very similar to mine
sentences.chinese: 和我非常相似的问题

sentences.english: I feel a lot better – thank you very much.
sentences.chinese: 我感觉好多了，非常感谢。

sentences.english: I’m very, very (= used for emphasis ) pleased you can come.
sentences.chinese: 你能来我真是非常高兴。

sentences.english: It’s very kind of you to help.
sentences.chinese: 您来帮忙真是太好了。

sentences.english: My sister and I were married on the very same (= exactly the same ) day.
sentences.chinese: 我和姐姐在同一天结婚。

sentences.english: He died in this very room.
sentences.chinese: 他就是在这个房间里去世的。

sentences.english: I’ll start at the very beginning.
sentences.chinese: 我要从头开始。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize an adjective, adverb, or phrase
used to emphasize that you are talking exactly about one particular thing or person

name: even
trans: adj.  偶数的；平坦的；相等的
adv. 甚至；即使；还；实际上
vi. 变平；变得可比较；成为相等

sentences.english: Most companies have suffered a drop in their profits, even very large companies.
sentences.chinese: 大多数公司的利润都出现下滑，甚至连很大的公司也不例外。

sentences.english: It was quite difficult to see, even with the light on.
sentences.chinese: 这很难看得见，即使开着灯也没有用。

sentences.english: He became quite successful and even appeared on a television show once.
sentences.chinese: 他相当成功，甚至还上了一次电视节目。

sentences.english: She did not even bother to phone us.
sentences.chinese: 她甚至连电话都没打给我们。

sentences.english: He never even acknowledged my letter.
sentences.chinese: 他收到我的信甚至从不会告知一声。

detailed_translations.english: used to emphasize something that is unexpected or surprising in what you are saying

sentences.english: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。

sentences.english: The daughter of an emperor does not worry about finding a husband.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝女儿不愁嫁。

sentences.english: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.chinese: 触犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遥远的边疆。

detailed_translations.english: the man who is the ruler of an empire

name: relaxing
trans: v. 放松；休息（relax的ing形式）；缓和；松懈

sentences.english: a relaxing evening at home
sentences.chinese: 在家里度过的一个轻松的夜晚

detailed_translations.english: making you feel relaxed

name: instrument
trans: n. 仪器；工具；乐器；手段；器械

sentences.english: surgical instruments
sentences.chinese: 外科(手术)器械

detailed_translations.chinese: 仪器， 工具； 乐器
detailed_translations.english: a small tool used in work such as science or medicine

name: extra
trans: n. 临时演员；号外；额外的事物；上等产品
adj. 额外的，另外收费的；特大的

sentences.english: Could you get an extra loaf of bread?
sentences.chinese: 你能多拿一条面包吗？

sentences.english: Allow extra time for your journey.
sentences.chinese: 要给你的旅程多留出点时间。

sentences.english: Drivers are advised to take extra care.
sentences.chinese: 建议司机开车要格外小心。

sentences.english: You’re going to have to work extra hard to pass the exam.
sentences.chinese: 你要格外用功才能通过考试。

detailed_translations.english: more of something, in addition to the usual or standard amount or number
used to emphasize an adjective or adverb

sentences.english: a carton of orange juice
sentences.chinese: 一纸盒橙汁

sentences.english: A Coke and a tomato juice, please.
sentences.chinese: 请来一杯可乐和一杯番茄汁。

detailed_translations.english: the liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables, or a drink that is made from this

name: MS
trans: abbr. 存贮系统（Memory System）；主存储器（Main Storage）；主程序装置（Master Sequecer）；中速，平均速度（Medium Speed）；主（总）开关（Master Switch）

name: astronaut
trans: n. 宇航员，航天员；太空旅行者

sentences.english: So why become an astronaut at all?
sentences.chinese: 那么，为什么要成为一名宇航员呢？

sentences.english: Yes, I have wanted to be an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我想过成为一个宇航员。

sentences.english: Many different qualities go towards the making of an astronaut.
sentences.chinese: 一名宇航员必须具备许多不同的素质。

detailed_translations.english: someone who travels and works in a spacecraft

name: follow
trans: vt. 跟随；遵循；追求；密切注意，注视；注意；倾听

sentences.english: Are those men following us?
sentences.chinese: 那些人在跟着我们吗？

sentences.english: The patrol car followed the BMW for a few miles and then lost it.
sentences.chinese: 巡逻车跟了那辆宝马几英里，后来就跟丢了。

sentences.english: The conclusion that follows from these findings is that inner city schools need more investment, not less.
sentences.chinese: 根据这些调研得出的结论是，旧城区学校的资金投入需要增加，而不是减少。

detailed_translations.english: to go, walk, drive etc behind or after someone else

name: wooden
trans: adj. 木制的；僵硬的，呆板的

sentences.english: a wooden bench
sentences.chinese: 木制长椅

detailed_translations.english: made of wood

name: traffic
trans: n. 交通；运输；贸易； 通信量

sentences.english: There wasn’t much traffic on the roads.
sentences.chinese: 路上车辆不多。

sentences.english: The sound of the traffic kept me awake.
sentences.chinese: 车辆来往的嘈杂声令我无法入睡。

detailed_translations.english: the vehicles moving along a road or street

sentences.english: Thousands of people have been made homeless .
sentences.chinese: 成千上万人被逼得无家可归。

detailed_translations.english: without a home

name: queen
trans: n. 女王，王后；（纸牌中的）皇后；（蜜蜂等的）蜂王
vt. 使…成为女王或王后

sentences.english: Queen Elizabeth
sentences.chinese: 伊丽莎白女王

sentences.english: the future queen
sentences.chinese: 未来的王后

sentences.english: the queen of diamonds
sentences.chinese: 方块Q，方块王后

detailed_translations.english: the female ruler of a country

name: half
trans: adj. 一半的；不完全的；半途的

sentences.english: Two halves make a whole.
sentences.chinese: 两个一半构成一个整体。

sentences.english: Only half the guests had arrived by seven o’clock.
sentences.chinese: 7点钟前只来了一半客人。

sentences.english: If you look at our members, at least half are women.
sentences.chinese: 看看我们的会员，至少有一半是女性。

sentences.english: ...a half measure of fresh lemon juice.
sentences.chinese: …半量杯的新鲜柠檬汁。

detailed_translations.english: one of two equal parts of something
exactly or about 50% (1/2) of an amount, time, distance, number etc

sentences.english: How much space is there on each disk?
sentences.chinese: 每张磁盘有多大容量？

sentences.english: The hedge takes up too much space .
sentences.chinese: 这树篱占了太多的地方。

detailed_translations.english: the amount of an area, room, container etc that is empty or available to be used

name: lively
trans: adj. 活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的

sentences.english: a lively child
sentences.chinese: 精力充沛的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
detailed_translations.english: someone who is lively has a lot of energy and is very active

name: gun
trans: n. 枪支；枪状物；持枪歹徒
vi. 用枪射击；加大油门快速前进

sentences.english: I’ve never fired a gun in my life.
sentences.chinese: 我这辈子从来没开过枪。

sentences.english: Jake was pointing a gun at the door.
sentences.chinese: 杰克用枪对着门口。

sentences.english: Two policemen were killed in a gun battle .
sentences.chinese: 两名警察在一次枪战中丧生。

detailed_translations.english: a metal weapon which shoots bullets or  shells

detailed_translations.chinese: 用枪射击；加大油门快速前进

name: opening
trans: n. 开始；机会；通路；空缺的职位
v. 开放（open的ing形式）；打开；公开

sentences.english: the opening match of the season
sentences.chinese: 本赛季的首场比赛

sentences.english: the opening chapter of the book
sentences.chinese: 本书的第一章

sentences.english: at the opening of the trial
sentences.chinese: 审判伊始

detailed_translations.english: first or beginning
the beginning or first part of something

sentences.english: We shall be away next week.
sentences.chinese: 我们下周要出去。

sentences.english: I shall have to be careful.
sentences.chinese: 我得当心。

sentences.english: I’ve never liked her and I never shall.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都不喜欢她，以后也不会。

sentences.english: We shall have finished by Friday.
sentences.chinese: 星期五前我们就能完成了。

detailed_translations.english: used to say what you will do in the future

name: sing
trans: vt. 唱；用诗赞颂；唱着使
vi. 唱歌；歌颂；鸣叫；呼号

sentences.english: She can sing beautifully.
sentences.chinese: 她唱歌很好听。

sentences.english: Most children enjoy singing.
sentences.chinese: 大多数孩子都喜欢唱歌。

sentences.english: We had a great time singing some of the old songs .
sentences.chinese: 我们唱了一些老歌，非常开心。

sentences.english: I’ve never been able to sing in tune (= sing the correct notes ) .
sentences.chinese: 我唱歌总是跑调。

sentences.english: She patiently sang the baby to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 她耐心地唱歌哄宝宝入睡。

detailed_translations.english: to produce a musical sound with your voice

sentences.english: Steven’s still in bed with flu .
sentences.chinese: 史蒂文患了流感，仍卧病在床。

sentences.english: She’s got the flu .
sentences.chinese: 她得了流感。

sentences.english: I couldn’t go because I had flu .
sentences.chinese: 我得了流感，去不了。

sentences.english: Doctors now fear a flu epidemic .
sentences.chinese: 医生现在担心会出现流感大爆发。

detailed_translations.english: a common illness that makes you feel very tired and weak, gives you a sore throat, and makes you cough and have to clear your nose a lot

name: agent
trans: n. 代理人，代理商；药剂；特工

sentences.english: Our agent in Rio deals with all our Brazilian business.
sentences.chinese: 我们在里约热内卢的业务代表处理我们在巴西的全部业务。

detailed_translations.english: a person or company that represents another person or company, especially in business

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

name: husband
trans: vt. 节约地使用（或管理）

sentences.english: Have you met my husband Roy?
sentences.chinese: 你见过我的丈夫罗伊吗？

detailed_translations.english: the man that a woman is married to

name: cage
trans: vt. 把…关进笼子；把…囚禁起来

sentences.english: I hate to see birds in cages.
sentences.chinese: 我不喜欢看到鸟在笼子里。

detailed_translations.english: a structure made of wires or bars in which birds or animals can be kept

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…关进笼子；把…囚禁起来
detailed_translations.english: to put or keep an animal or bird in a cage

sentences.english: Check your spelling and grammar.
sentences.chinese: 检查你的拼写和语法。

sentences.english: the rules of English grammar
sentences.chinese: 英语的语法规则

sentences.english: A dictionary lists the words, a grammar states the rules.
sentences.chinese: 词典收列单词，语法书讲解语法规则。

detailed_translations.english: the rules by which words change their forms and are combined into sentences, or the study or use of these rules

name: action
trans: n. 行动；活动；功能；战斗；情节

sentences.english: The government must take action (=do something) now to stop the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 政府现在必须采取行动遏止暴力犯罪的上升。

detailed_translations.english: the process of doing something, especially in order to achieve a particular thing

name: might
trans: v. 可以；或许（may的过去式）；应该

sentences.english: If you need more information, you might try the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 如果你需要更多的信息，可以试试因特网。

sentences.english: I thought we might go to the new Chinese restaurant on the High Street.
sentences.chinese: 我想我们可以到大街上新开的那家中国餐馆去。

sentences.english: It might be a good idea to put those plants in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 把那些植物放在阴凉处也许是个好主意。

sentences.english: We’re going to a concert. You might like to come with us.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去听音乐会，你也许想和我们一起去吧。

name: express
trans: n. 快车，快递，专使；捷运公司
adj. 明确的；迅速的；专门的

sentences.english: Parents have expressed their concerns about their children’s safety.
sentences.chinese: 父母对自己孩子的安全表示忧虑。

sentences.chinese: 许多人反对这些提议。

sentences.chinese: 他最初是在舞蹈班学会通过动作表达情感的。

sentences.english: Words can’t express (= it is impossible to describe ) how angry we felt.
sentences.chinese: 我们的愤怒无以言表。

sentences.english: London–Gatwick Express/Orient Express (=a fast train or bus which does a particular journey regularly)
sentences.chinese: 伦敦﹣盖特威克快车/东方快车

sentences.english: Send these books by express.
sentences.chinese: 把这些书用快递寄出去。

detailed_translations.english: to tell or show what you are feeling or thinking by using words, looks, or actions
a train or bus that does not stop in many places and therefore travels quickly

name: graduate
trans: vt. 授予…学位；分等级；标上刻度

sentences.english: a graduate student
sentences.chinese: 研究生

detailed_translations.english: relating to or involved in studies done at a university after completing a first degree
to obtain a degree, especially a first degree, from a college or university
someone who has completed a university degree, especially a first degree

name: upset
trans: adj. 心烦的；混乱的；弄翻的

sentences.english: You’re not still upset with me, are you?
sentences.chinese: 你不是还在生我的气吧？

detailed_translations.chinese: 心烦的， 苦恼的； 不适的
detailed_translations.english: unhappy and worried because something unpleasant or disappointing has happened

detailed_translations.chinese: 使心烦意乱，使苦恼，使不适；搅乱；弄翻，倾覆
detailed_translations.english: to make someone feel unhappy or worried
an illness that affects the stomach and makes you feel sick

name: celebration
trans: n. 庆典，庆祝会；庆祝；颂扬

sentences.english: the lively New Year celebrations in the city centre
sentences.chinese: 市中心热闹的新年庆祝活动

detailed_translations.english: an occasion or party when you celebrate something

sentences.english: The plate went crashing to the floor.
sentences.chinese: 盘子哗啦一声掉在地板上。

sentences.english: The bullet went flying over my head.
sentences.chinese: 子弹从我头顶飞过。

sentences.english: John went rushing off down the corridor.
sentences.chinese: 约翰沿走廊飞奔而去。

sentences.english: Her hair is starting to go grey.
sentences.chinese: 她的头发开始变白了。

detailed_translations.english: to move in a particular way, or to do something as you are moving

sentences.english: There’s a meeting on Thursday afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 星期四下午有个会议。

sentences.english: It was very hot in the afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午很热。

sentences.english: See you tomorrow afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 明天下午见。

sentences.english: Are you going into town this afternoon ?
sentences.chinese: 今天下午你进城去吗？

sentences.english: We met in the early afternoon .
sentences.chinese: 下午较早的时候我们见了面。

sentences.english: By late afternoon , Micky had changed his mind.
sentences.chinese: 到了傍晚，米基已改变了主意。

sentences.english: He was having his afternoon nap .
sentences.chinese: 他在睡午觉。

detailed_translations.english: the part of the day after the morning and before the evening

sentences.english: He shouldn’t be so selfish.
sentences.chinese: 他不该这么自私。

sentences.english: Why should anyone want to marry Tony?
sentences.chinese: 怎么竟然会有人意嫁给托尼？

detailed_translations.english: used to say what is the right or sensible thing to do

name: board
trans: n. 董事会；木板；甲板；膳食
vt. 上（飞机、车、船等）；用板盖上；给提供膳宿

sentences.english: a board meeting
sentences.chinese: 董事会会议

sentences.english: a board member
sentences.chinese: 董事会成员

detailed_translations.english: a group of people in a company or other organization who make the rules and important decisions

sentences.english: He craved the teacher's pardon.
sentences.chinese: 他恳求老师原谅他。

sentences.english: I earnestly pray for your pardon.
sentences.chinese: 我恳切地请求你原谅。

sentences.english: I hope you will pardon me for doing so.
sentences.chinese: 我希望你原谅我这样做。

name: tired
trans: v. 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）
adj. 疲倦的；厌倦的，厌烦的

sentences.english: He looks tired out (= very tired ) .
sentences.chinese: 他看起来累坏了。

sentences.chinese: “不。”弗兰克语带疲倦地说。

detailed_translations.english: feeling that you want to sleep or rest

detailed_translations.chinese: 疲倦；对…腻烦（tire的过去分词形式）

name: forest
trans: vt. 植树于，使成为森林

sentences.english: a tropical forest
sentences.chinese: 热带森林

sentences.english: the danger of forest fires
sentences.chinese: 发生森林火灾的危险

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land that is covered with trees

name: eleventh
trans: num. 第十一；十一分之一
n. 第十一；十一分之一
adj. 第十一的；十一分之一的

sentences.english: in the eleventh century
sentences.chinese: 在11世纪

sentences.english: her eleventh birthday
sentences.chinese: 她的11岁生日

detailed_translations.english: one of eleven equal parts of something

detailed_translations.chinese: 第十一的；十一分之一的
detailed_translations.english: coming after ten other things in a series
one of eleven equal parts of something

name: right
trans: adj. 正确的；直接的；右方的
adv. 正确地；恰当地；彻底地

sentences.english: Yes, that’s the right answer .
sentences.chinese: 对，回答正确。

sentences.english: Is that the right time ?
sentences.chinese: 那个时间对吗？

sentences.english: I got most of the questions right .
sentences.chinese: 大部分问题我都答对了。

sentences.english: His ideas have now been proved right .
sentences.chinese: 他的观点现已证明是对的。

detailed_translations.english: a statement or piece of information that is right is correct and based on true facts
exactly in a particular position or place
used to check if what you have said is correct
exactly in a particular position or place

trans: n. 咳嗽，咳嗽声；咳嗽病

sentences.chinese: 马修咳了一声清清喉咙。

sentences.english: I think I’m getting a cold or flu – I’ve been coughing and sneezing all day.
sentences.chinese: 我想我是着凉了，或者得了流感——我整天都在咳嗽和打喷嚏。

sentences.english: He’s got a bad cough.
sentences.chinese: 他咳嗽得很厉害。

detailed_translations.english: to suddenly push air out of your throat with a short sound, often repeatedly

sentences.english: Try to satisfy your hunger by eating some fruit.
sentences.chinese: 吃些水果充充饥吧。

sentences.english: her hunger for knowledge
sentences.chinese: 她的求知欲

detailed_translations.english: the feeling that you need to eat

name: roll
trans: n. 卷，卷形物；名单；摇晃
vi. 卷；滚动；转动；起伏，摇晃

sentences.english: The ball rolled into the street.
sentences.chinese: 球滚到了街上。

sentences.chinese: 摄影机开始转动，大家安静了下来。

detailed_translations.english: if something rolls, especially something round, or if you roll it, it moves along a surface by turning over and over

name: machine
trans: n. 机械，机器；机构；机械般工作的人

sentences.english: Could you get me a coffee from the drinks machine ?
sentences.chinese: 给我从自动饮料机里买一罐咖啡好吗？

sentences.english: The fax machine is broken.
sentences.chinese: 传真机坏了。

sentences.english: Did you put my dirty shirts in the machine (= washing machine ) ?
sentences.chinese: 你把我的脏衬衫放进洗衣机里了吗？

sentences.english: I left a message for you on your machine (= telephone answering machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 我在你的电话答录机里留了言。

sentences.english: The machine wouldn’t let me have any money (= cash machine ) .
sentences.chinese: 自动取款机不让我取钱。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of equipment with moving parts that uses power such as electricity to do a particular job

sentences.english: The ticket is valid until March.
sentences.chinese: 这张票的有效期一直到 3 月份。

sentences.english: He waited until she had finished speaking.
sentences.chinese: 他一直等到她讲完。

sentences.english: Until recently, Anna worked as a teacher in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 直到最近，安娜一直在日本当老师。

sentences.english: Up until last year, they didn’t even own a car.
sentences.chinese: 一直到去年，他们连汽车也没有。

detailed_translations.english: if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time
if something happens until a particular time, it continues and then stops at that time

name: least
trans: adj. 最小的；最少的（little的最高级）

sentences.chinese: 他虽然经验最少，却是最出色的老师。

sentences.english: He’s my least favourite member of staff.
sentences.chinese: 他是最不讨我喜欢的员工。

detailed_translations.english: smallest in size, amount, degree, etc.

sentences.chinese: 首先，它们效率不高，其次，它们的制作成本很高。

detailed_translations.english: used when you want to give a second point or fact, or give a second reason for something

name: come
trans: vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达

sentences.chinese: 他们来了就告诉我。

sentences.english: Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?

adj. 姐妹般的；同类型的

sentences.chinese: …国际货币基金组织和它的姐妹机构，世界银行。

detailed_translations.english: a girl or woman who has the same parents as you
You can use sister to describe something that is of the same type or is connected in some way to another thing you have mentioned. For example, if a company has a sister company, they are connected.

name: washroom
trans: n. 洗手间；盥洗室；厕所

sentences.chinese: 房东雇了清洁工每天来打扫，还有一个昏暗的公用盥洗室，供住户们洗自己的东西。

detailed_translations.english: a room in a public building where you can wash and use the toilet

name: relation
trans: n. 关系；叙述；故事；亲属关系

sentences.english: diplomatic/international/foreign relations
sentences.chinese: 外交 / 国际 / 对外关系

sentences.english: a close/near/distant relation of mine
sentences.chinese: 我的一位近亲 / 远亲

detailed_translations.english: the way in which two people, groups or countries behave towards each other or deal with each other

sentences.english: ...the Russian parliament.
sentences.chinese: ...俄罗斯国会。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Russia, its people, or its language
someone from Russia

name: doubt
trans: v. 怀疑；不信；恐怕；拿不准

sentences.english: I’ll see you Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 星期二见。

detailed_translations.english: the day between Monday and Wednesday

sentences.english: How many people were at the meeting?
sentences.chinese: 有多少人到会？

sentences.chinese: 至少有40人遇害。

sentences.chinese: 他保证绝不对美国人民撒谎。

sentences.chinese: 她在澳大利亚内陆独自背包旅行了八个月。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Australia or its people

name: yourselves
trans: pron. 你们自己；你们本人（yourself的复数）

sentences.english: Believe in yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 相信你们自己。

sentences.english: I need not press the urgency of the matter on you, as I konw you are fully aware of it yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我无需向你们强调此事的急迫性，因为我知道，你们自己对此完全了解。

sentences.chinese: 但是我在这儿说的最重要的是：你们在问那些问题——不仅是问我，而是在问你们自己。

name: level
trans: adj. 水平的；平坦的；同高的
vi. 瞄准；拉平；变得平坦

sentences.english: Your arms should be at the same level as your desk.
sentences.chinese: 手臂应该与桌子齐平。

sentences.english: The floors in the old house were not completely level.
sentences.chinese: 老房子的地面不是完全平整的。

detailed_translations.english: the height of something in relation to the ground or to another object

trans: vt. 期望；指望；认为；预料

sentences.chinese: 他很难击败。我确信这一点，不过我准备好了。

sentences.english: ‘Who are you?’ he murmured, only half expecting (= thinking it was possible, but not likely ) her to answer.
sentences.chinese: “你是谁？”他低声问道，预计她可能不会回答。

sentences.english: to expect a visit/call/letter from sb
sentences.chinese: 等待某人的来访 / 电话 / 来信

detailed_translations.english: to think that something will happen because it seems likely or has been planned

name: enjoy
trans: vt. 欣赏，享受；喜爱；使过得快活

sentences.chinese: 我们在纽约的时间过得十分快活。

sentences.english: Thanks for a great evening. I really enjoyed it.
sentences.chinese: 感谢你这美好的晚会。我真的玩得很开心。

detailed_translations.english: to get pleasure from something

name: fifth
trans: adj. 第五的；五分之一的

sentences.english: a fifth of bourbon
sentences.chinese: 五分之一加仑的波旁威士忌酒

detailed_translations.english: one of five equal parts of something
one of five equal parts of something

sentences.english: ...a tiny fossil plant, only a few centimetres high.
sentences.chinese: …一块小小的植物化石，只有几厘米高。

detailed_translations.english: a unit for measuring length. There are 100 centimetres in one metre.

name: compare
trans: vi. 相比，匹敌；比较，区别；比拟（常与to连用）

sentences.english: The report compares the different types of home computer available.
sentences.chinese: 这份报告比较了市场上不同类型的家用计算机。

detailed_translations.chinese: 比较， 对照； 把…比作
detailed_translations.english: to consider two or more things or people, in order to show how they are similar or different

sentences.english: a Japanese car
sentences.chinese: 日本(汽)车

sentences.english: At least three British golf courses are now owned by the Japanese.
sentences.chinese: 现在英国至少有3家高尔夫球场为日本人所有。

detailed_translations.english: relating to Japan, its people, or its language
people from Japan

sentences.english: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.chinese: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.english: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.english: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.chinese: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

detailed_translations.english: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net

name: year
trans: n. 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
sentences.chinese: 我两年前来到这里。

sentences.english: We’ve known each other for over a year.
sentences.chinese: 我们相识一年多了。

sentences.english: It’s almost a year since Sue died.
sentences.chinese: 休去世快一年了。

sentences.english: Jodi is 15 years old.
sentences.chinese: 约迪15岁。

sentences.english: a three-year business plan
sentences.chinese: 三年的业务发展计划

sentences.english: a four-year-old child
sentences.chinese: 四岁的孩子

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

sentences.english: Could we have the menu, please?
sentences.chinese: 请把菜单给我们，好吗？

sentences.english: a three course set menu
sentences.chinese: 三道菜的套餐

detailed_translations.english: a list of all the kinds of food that are available for a meal, especially in a restaurant

name: family
trans: n. 家庭；亲属；家族；子女；科；语族；族
adj. 家庭的；家族的；适合于全家的

sentences.english: Do you know the family next door?
sentences.chinese: 你认识隔壁那家人吗？

sentences.english: The Webb family still has its farm over there.
sentences.chinese: 韦伯家依然保留着那里的农场。

sentences.english: The family now live in London.
sentences.chinese: 那家人现居伦敦。

sentences.english: This house isn’t big enough for a family of seven.
sentences.chinese: 这房子住不下七口之家。

sentences.english: My family come from Scotland originally.
sentences.chinese: 我祖籍是苏格兰。

detailed_translations.english: a group of people who are related to each other, especially a mother, a father, and their children

name: garden
trans: vi. 从事园艺；在园中种植

sentences.english: He’s outside in the garden.
sentences.chinese: 他在外面花园里。

sentences.english: Grace brought us some flowers from her garden.
sentences.chinese: 格雷丝给我们送来一些她花园里的花。

sentences.english: the botanical gardens in Edinburgh
sentences.chinese: 爱丁堡的植物园

detailed_translations.english: piece of land next to or around your house where you can grow flowers, fruit, vegetables, etc., usually with an area of grass(called a lawn )

name: fifty
trans: n. 五十；五十个；编号为50的东西
adj. 五十的；五十个的；众多的

sentences.english: Standards of living rose in the fifties.
sentences.chinese: 50年代生活水平提高了。

detailed_translations.english: the number 50

name: passage
trans: n. 一段（文章）；走廊；通路

sentences.english: My office is just along the passage.
sentences.chinese: 我的办公室就在过道旁边。

sentences.english: We walked down a narrow passage to the back of the building.
sentences.chinese: 我们沿着一条狭窄的通道来到大楼的后面。

sentences.english: an underground passage
sentences.chinese: 地下通道

sentences.english: The bridge isn’t strong enough to allow the passage of heavy vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 那座桥不够坚固，无法让重型车辆通过。

detailed_translations.english: a way through something

name: song
trans: n. 歌曲；歌唱；诗歌；鸣声

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.
sentences.chinese: …舞蹈、音乐、哑剧和歌唱。

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

trans: n. 银行家；银行业者；掘土工

sentences.chinese: …一位投资银行家。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in a bank in an important position

sentences.chinese: 玛丽站在洗涤槽边削土豆皮。

name: driver
trans: n. 驾驶员；驱动程序；起子；传动器

sentences.english: a taxi driver
sentences.chinese: 出租车司机

sentences.english: Do you think you’re a good driver?
sentences.chinese: 你认为自己是个好司机吗？

detailed_translations.english: someone who drives a car, bus etc

sentences.chinese: 他慢慢地摇了摇头。

sentences.english: ‘That’s true,’ said Joe slowly.
sentences.chinese: “没错。”乔慢吞吞地说道。

detailed_translations.english: at a slow speed

trans: adj. 痛苦的；疼痛的；令人不快的

sentences.chinese: 僵硬疼痛的关节

sentences.chinese: 你的手臂很疼吗？

sentences.english: The neck becomes swollen and painful to the touch (= hurts when you touch it ) .
sentences.chinese: 脖子肿起来了，一碰就疼。

detailed_translations.chinese: 痛苦的，疼痛的，令人不快的
detailed_translations.english: if a part of your body is painful, it hurts

name: tour
trans: n. 旅游，旅行；巡回演出
vt. 旅行，在……旅游；在……作巡回演出
vi. 旅行，旅游；作巡回演出

sentences.english: We met on a coach tour in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 我们是在意大利乘长途客车旅游时相识的。

detailed_translations.english: a journey for pleasure, during which you visit several different towns, areas etc

name: independence
trans: n. 独立性，自立性；自主

sentences.english: The country has made great advances since independence.
sentences.chinese: 该国自独立以来发展迅速。

detailed_translations.chinese: 独立； 自主； 自立
detailed_translations.english: political freedom from control by the government of another country

name: curly
trans: adj. 卷曲的；卷毛的；（木材）有皱状纹理的；蜷缩的

sentences.english: long dark curly hair
sentences.chinese: 又长又黑的鬈发

detailed_translations.english: having a lot of curls or a curved shape

name: gum
trans: vt. 用胶粘，涂以树胶；使…有粘性

sentences.chinese: 牙刷轻轻地刷去齿菌斑，没有伤及牙床或引起出血。

detailed_translations.english: your gums are the two areas of firm pink flesh at the top and bottom of your mouth, in which your teeth are fixed

name: snowy
trans: adj. 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的

sentences.english: the snowy fields
sentences.chinese: 被雪覆盖的田野

sentences.english: one snowy January day
sentences.chinese: 1月里大雪纷飞的一天

detailed_translations.chinese: 下雪的，多雪的；被雪覆盖的；洁白无瑕的
detailed_translations.english: with a lot of snow

name: desert
trans: n. 沙漠；荒原；应得的赏罚
adj. 沙漠的；荒凉的；不毛的

sentences.english: the Sahara Desert
sentences.chinese: 撒哈拉沙漠

sentences.english: This area of the country is mostly desert.
sentences.chinese: 该国的这一地区大部分是沙漠。

detailed_translations.english: a large area of land where it is always very dry, and there is a lot of sand
to leave someone or something and no longer help or support them

name: near
trans: adj. 近的；亲近的；近似的

sentences.english: They live near London.
sentences.chinese: 他们住在伦敦附近。

sentences.english: I’m sure they live somewhere near here.
sentences.chinese: 我肯定他们就住在这附近。

sentences.english: They moved house to be nearer the school.
sentences.chinese: 他们把家搬到离学校近一些。

sentences.english: She told the children not to go near the canal.
sentences.chinese: 她告诉孩子们不要走近运河。

sentences.english: I’m warning you - don’t come any nearer!
sentences.chinese: 我警告你别再靠近！

sentences.english: We heard voices as we drew near the village.
sentences.chinese: 我们走近村子时听见了说话声。

detailed_translations.english: only a short distance from a person or thing
only a short distance away from someone or something

name: manage
trans: vt. 管理；经营；控制；设法

sentences.chinese: 他被要求去管理一个新的部门。

sentences.english: Managing a football team is harder than you think.
sentences.chinese: 管理一支足球队比你想象的要难。

sentences.english: The company had been very badly managed.
sentences.chinese: 公司管理非常糟糕。

sentences.english: I don’t know how I’ll manage it , but I’ll be there.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道怎么去，但我会去的。

sentences.english: I don’t know how she manages with seven children.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道七个孩子她是怎么应付的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 管理；设法；成功应付，对付
detailed_translations.english: to direct or control a business or department and the people, equipment, and money involved in it

name: transportation
trans: n. 运输；运输系统；运输工具；流放

sentences.english: The city needs to improve its public transportation (= buses, trains etc ) .
sentences.chinese: 这座城市需要改善公共交通。

detailed_translations.english: a system or method for carrying passengers or goods from one place to another

name: properly
trans: adv. 适当地；正确地；恰当地

sentences.english: The brakes don’t seem to be working properly.
sentences.chinese: 刹车似乎不正常。

sentences.english: Then he’s not doing his job properly.
sentences.chinese: 那么他没把分内事做好。

sentences.english: Parents should teach their children to behave properly in public.
sentences.chinese: 家长应该教导子女在公共场合要有规有矩。

sentences.english: properly trained staff
sentences.chinese: 训练有素的员工

detailed_translations.english: correctly, or in a way that is considered right

name: are
trans: v. 是（be的第二人称单复数现在式）

sentences.english: They  are my students.
sentences.chinese: 他们是我的学生。

sentences.english: We are sure you dare not.
sentences.chinese: 我们断定你们是不敢的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 是（be的第二人称单复数现在式）

detailed_translations.english: a unit of area equal to 100 sq metres or 119.599 sq yards; one hundredth of a hectare

sentences.english: Who guesses one centimeter?
sentences.chinese: 谁觉得是一厘米？

sentences.english: In every square centimeter!
sentences.chinese: 每一平方厘米！

sentences.english: With the profile of a dinosaur and the texture of a rose bush, a thorny devil in Alice Springs Desert Park looks like trouble, but this slow-moving, six-inch [15-centimeter] lizard eats only ants.
sentences.chinese: 长着恐龙的外形和一身的刺犹如一丛玫瑰，这样一个棘手的恶魔在阿丽斯春天的沙漠公园里看似麻烦，但他动作缓慢，六英寸[15厘米]蜥蜴只吃蚂蚁。

sentences.english: He kicked the door hard.
sentences.chinese: 他用力踢门。

sentences.english: The boys were kicking a ball around in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 男孩们在院子里踢球。

sentences.english: She gave him a kick on the shin.
sentences.chinese: 她朝他的小腿踢了一脚。

detailed_translations.english: to hit sb/sth with your foot
a movement with the foot or the leg, usually to hit sth with the foot

name: book
trans: n. 书籍；卷；帐簿；名册；工作簿

sentences.english: I’ve just started reading a book by Graham Greene.
sentences.chinese: 我刚开始看格雷厄姆·格林写的一本书。

sentences.english: a cookery book
sentences.chinese: 烹饪书

sentences.english: Have you booked a holiday this year?
sentences.chinese: 你今年有没有预订去度假？

detailed_translations.english: a set of printed pages that are held together in a cover so that you can read them

sentences.english: the fall semester
sentences.chinese: 秋季学期

detailed_translations.english: one of the two periods of time that a year at high schools and universities is divided into, especially in the US

name: knowledge
trans: n. 知识，学问；知道，认识；学科

sentences.chinese: 他对美国历史所知不多。

sentences.english: Evans denied all knowledge of the robbery.
sentences.chinese: 埃文斯说他对这次抢劫一无所知。

detailed_translations.english: the information, skills, and understanding that you have gained through learning or experience

trans: n. 区域，地区；面积；范围

sentences.english: Only cheeses made in this area may be labelled ‘Roquefort.’
sentences.chinese: 只有这个地区出产的干酪才能被称作“罗克福尔干酪”。

sentences.english: Crime rates are much higher in urban areas.
sentences.chinese: 城镇地区的犯罪率要高很多。

sentences.english: an area of 2,000 square miles
sentences.chinese: 2,000平方英里的面积

sentences.english: The course covers three main subject areas.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程涵盖三大学科领域。

detailed_translations.english: a particular part of a country, town etc

sentences.chinese: 这个壁橱里塞满了杂物。

detailed_translations.english: old or unwanted objects that have no use or value
to get rid of something because it is old or useless

sentences.english: Has anyone seen my keys? I can’t find them anywhere.
sentences.chinese: 有人见到我的钥匙吗？我哪儿都找不到。

sentences.english: The police were very helpful when I spoke to them.
sentences.chinese: 我和警察说了，他们很帮忙。

sentences.chinese: 我借给他几本书，但他一本还没看过。

name: understand
trans: vt. 理解；懂；获悉；推断；省略

sentences.chinese: 她不懂英语。

sentences.english: I’m sorry, I don’t understand. Can yon explain that again?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，我不明白。你能再解释一遍吗？

sentences.english: The woman had a strong accent, and I couldn’t understand what she was saying.
sentences.chinese: 那女人口音很重，我听不懂她在说些什么。

trans: vt. 加标签于；指派；对…开出交通违规罚单

sentences.chinese: 开慢点儿，否则你会接到一张罚款通知单。

trans: adv. 可是，虽然；不过；然而

sentences.chinese: 一年里心脏病发作了两次，可是那也没让他把烟戒掉。

used to introduce a statement that makes the main statement coming after it seem surprising, unlikely, or unexpected

trans: n.  句子，命题；宣判，判决

sentences.chinese: 她被判八年徒刑。

sentences.chinese: 他犯了谋杀罪，刚开始服无期徒刑。

trans: vt. 显示；说明；演出；展出

sentences.chinese: 要往好的方面想，拿出决心来。

sentences.chinese: 她早就学会了不流露出自己的感情。

sentences.english: It was the sound a man might make when in pain but trying not to show it.
sentences.chinese: 那是一个人强忍着疼痛不愿表露出来时发出的声音。

sentences.chinese: 玛丽对这些小孩子表示出极大的兴趣。

detailed_translations.chinese: 表演，节目；演出，上映；展览，展览物，展览会；显示，展示；表面，外观

name: rest
trans: n. 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
vt. 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于
vi. 休息；静止；依赖；安置

sentences.english: If you’re tired, we’ll stop and rest for a while.
sentences.chinese: 如果你累了，我们就停下来歇一会儿。

detailed_translations.chinese: 使休息，使轻松；把…寄托于
detailed_translations.english: to stop working or doing an activity for a time and sit down or lie down to relax

detailed_translations.chinese: 休息，静止；休息时间；剩余部分；支架
detailed_translations.english: a period of time when you are not doing anything tiring and you can relax or sleep

sentences.english: But we have the same problem in UK.
sentences.chinese: 而在我们英国，也有同样的问题。

sentences.english: What does that mean for those at the very bottom in the UK?
sentences.chinese: 对那些在英国处于社会底层的人来说这意味着什么呢？

sentences.chinese: 她捂住脸，悲痛得身体不住地来回晃动。

sentences.english: The waves rocked the boat from side to side .
sentences.chinese: 波浪使小船左摇右晃。

sentences.english: Paul sat gently rocking the child in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 保罗坐着，轻轻摇晃怀里的孩子。

sentences.english: Jim rocked with laughter when he heard what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆听了发生的事情后笑得前仰后合。

detailed_translations.english: to move gently backwards and forwards or from side to side, or to make something do this
a type of popular modern music with a strong loud beat, played using  guitar s  and drums

name: childhood
trans: n. 童年时期；幼年时代

sentences.english: I had a very happy childhood.
sentences.chinese: 我的童年很快乐。

detailed_translations.english: the period of time when you are a child

name: put
trans: vt. 放；表达；移动；安置；赋予

sentences.english: He put the coffee on the table.
sentences.chinese: 他把咖啡放在桌上。

sentences.english: Where did you put the programmes?
sentences.chinese: 你把节目单放在哪里了？

detailed_translations.english: to move something to a particular place or position, especially using your hands

name: provide
trans: vt. 提供；规定；准备；装备

sentences.english: Tea and biscuits will be provided.
sentences.chinese: 有茶水和饼干供应。

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone or make it available to them, because they need it or want it

sentences.english: Which way is north?
sentences.chinese: 哪边是北？

sentences.english: He lives in North Wales.
sentences.chinese: 他住在威尔士北部。

detailed_translations.english: the direction that is at the top of a map of the world, above the Equator. It is on the left if you are facing the rising sun
in the north or facing the north

name: exactly
trans: adv. 恰好地；正是；精确地；正确地

sentences.english: It’s exactly half past five.
sentences.chinese: 一分不差，正好5点半。

sentences.english: The figures may not be exactly right, but they’re close enough.
sentences.chinese: 那些数字可能不是非常精确，但也相当接近。

sentences.english: That’s exactly what we’ve been trying to tell you.
sentences.chinese: 那正是我们一直想告诉你的。

detailed_translations.english: used when emphasizing that something is no more and no less than a number or amount, or is completely correct in every detail

sentences.english: I’m afraid I wasn’t invited.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我没有受到邀请。

sentences.english: Successful candidates will be invited for interview next week.
sentences.chinese: 通过甄别的候选人将获邀于下周参加面试。

detailed_translations.english: to ask someone to come to a party, wedding, meal etc

sentences.english: Two of his front teeth had been knocked out.
sentences.chinese: 他有两颗门牙被打落了。

sentences.english: the front cover of ‘Hello!’ magazine
sentences.chinese: 《Hello!》杂志的封面

sentences.english: the front wheel of his bicycle
sentences.chinese: 他自行车的前轮

sentences.english: the dog’s front legs
sentences.chinese: 狗的前腿

sentences.english: Ricky stepped forward to the front of the stage and began to sing.
sentences.chinese: 里基走到舞台的最前面，开始唱了起来。

detailed_translations.english: at, on, or in the front of something
the part of something that is furthest forward in the direction that it is facing or moving

name: crossing
trans: n. 十字路口；杂交；横渡；横道

sentences.english: You must give way to any pedestrians on the crossing.
sentences.chinese: 必须让人行横道上的行人先行。

detailed_translations.chinese: 人行横道， 交叉口； 横渡
detailed_translations.english: a place where you can safely cross a road, railway, river etc

sentences.english: And whenever I saw woolen products advertised, I stopped to see what was on offer.
sentences.chinese: 无论我在哪儿看见关于羊毛制品的广告，我都会停下来看看。

sentences.english: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢闻松脂和黑色润滑油味道，喜欢闻羊毛制服的霉味和潮湿的黄铜喇叭的扑鼻气味。

sentences.english: Weather patterns have changed in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 气候模式近年已经发生了变化。

sentences.english: A general pattern began to emerge .
sentences.chinese: 一个总体模式开始显现。

sentences.english: Their descriptions seemed to follow a set pattern (= always develop in the same way ) .
sentences.chinese: 他们的描述似乎依据固定的模式。

sentences.english: His behavior fits a pattern of violent acts.
sentences.chinese: 他的举动符合暴力行为的模式。

sentences.english: a dress pattern
sentences.chinese: 连衣裙的纸样

detailed_translations.english: the regular way in which something happens, develops, or is done

sentences.english: The old man looked cross and unfriendly.
sentences.chinese: 老人看上去生气了，很不友好。

sentences.english: a lonely unfriendly place
sentences.chinese: 偏僻冷漠的地方

detailed_translations.english: not kind or friendly

name: lady
trans: n. 女士，夫人；小姐；妻子

sentences.english: Lady Spencer
sentences.chinese: 斯宾塞夫人

sentences.english: the lords and ladies of the court
sentences.chinese: 宫廷的贵族及夫人

detailed_translations.english: used as the title of the wife or daughter of a British noblemanor the wife of a knight

sentences.english: I’ve never lived abroad before.
sentences.chinese: 我以前从未在国外生活过。

sentences.english: She often goes abroad on business.
sentences.chinese: 她经常出国公干。

sentences.english: We never travelled abroad when we were kids.
sentences.chinese: 我们小时候从来没有去国外旅行过。

sentences.english: goods imported from abroad
sentences.chinese: 从国外进口的商品

sentences.english: The books about Harry Potter have been very popular, both at home and abroad .
sentences.chinese: 有关哈利·波特的书在国内外一直都很流行。

detailed_translations.english: in or to a foreign country

sentences.english: She became a lifelong friend of ours.
sentences.chinese: 她成了我们一辈子的朋友。

sentences.english: David finally realized his lifelong ambition.
sentences.chinese: 戴维终于实现了他毕生的抱负。

detailed_translations.english: continuing or existing all through your life

name: arrive
trans: vi. 到达；成功；达成；出生

sentences.english: Give me a call to let me know you’ve arrived safely.
sentences.chinese: 打个电话给我，告诉我你已平安到达。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived on the scene, the burglars had fled.
sentences.chinese: 警方赶到现场时，窃贼已经逃跑了。

sentences.english: When her wedding day arrived, she was really nervous.
sentences.chinese: 到了婚礼那天，她十分紧张。

detailed_translations.english: to get to the place you are going to

name: performance
trans: n. 性能；绩效；表演；执行；表现

sentences.english: This evening’s performance will begin at 8.00 pm.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的演出8点开始。

sentences.english: the performance of his official duties
sentences.chinese: 履行他的职务

sentences.english: Sean’s performance at school has greatly improved.
sentences.chinese: 肖恩在学校的表现进步很大。

detailed_translations.english: when someone performs a play or a piece of music

sentences.english: Maurice asked me whether I needed any help.
sentences.chinese: 莫里斯问我是否需要帮助。

sentences.english: There were times when I wondered whether or not we would get there.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我也想知道我们能不能做得到。

sentences.english: I didn’t know whether to believe him or not.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道该不该相信他。

sentences.english: The question arose as to whether this behaviour was unlawful.
sentences.chinese: 问题出现了: 这种行为是否不合法？

detailed_translations.english: used when talking about a choice you have to make or about something that is not certain

sentences.english: grated carrots
sentences.chinese: 磨碎的胡萝卜

sentences.english: carrot juice
sentences.chinese: 胡萝卜汁

detailed_translations.english: a long pointed orange vegetable that grows under the ground

name: prisoner
trans: n. 囚犯，犯人；俘虏；刑事被告

sentences.english: He was being held prisoner.
sentences.chinese: 他正遭囚禁。

sentences.english: Our pilot was taken prisoner .
sentences.chinese: 我们的飞行员被抓起来了。

sentences.english: The army advanced, taking 200,000 prisoners .
sentences.chinese: 军队向前推进，抓获20万名俘虏。

detailed_translations.english: someone who is taken by force and kept somewhere

name: sour
trans: adj. 酸的；发酵的；刺耳的；酸臭的；讨厌的

sentences.english: Rachel sampled the wine. It was sour.
sentences.chinese: 雷切尔尝了尝葡萄酒，是酸的。

sentences.english: sour cherries
sentences.chinese: 酸樱桃

detailed_translations.chinese: 酸的；发酵的；刺耳的；酸臭的；讨厌的
detailed_translations.english: having a sharp acid taste, like the taste of a  lemon  or a fruit that is not ready to be eaten
if milk sours, or if something sours it, it begins to have an unpleasant sharp taste

sentences.english: The product suddenly took off in September.
sentences.chinese: 该产品在九月份突然热销起来。

sentences.english: Do I remember that September afternoon when I first met you?
sentences.chinese: 还记不记得第一次遇见你的那个九月的下午？

sentences.english: The carmaker is almost ready to launch out a new model in September.
sentences.chinese: 汽车制造商将于九月投产新型汽车。

detailed_translations.english: the ninth month of the year, between August and October

name: keep
trans: vt. 保持；经营；遵守；饲养

sentences.english: The noise kept him awake.
sentences.chinese: 噪音使他一直醒着。

sentences.english: I was struggling to keep awake.
sentences.chinese: 我努力不让自己睡着。

detailed_translations.english: to stay in a particular state, condition, or position, or to make someone or something do this

sentences.english: Will someone take out the trash (= take it outside the house ) ?
sentences.chinese: 谁把垃圾拿出去好吗？

sentences.english: Just put it in the trash .
sentences.chinese: 就把它扔到垃圾桶里吧。

detailed_translations.english: things that you throw away, such as empty bottles, used papers, food that has gone bad etc

name: energetic
trans: adj. 精力充沛的；积极的；有力的

sentences.english: an energetic man
sentences.chinese: 精力旺盛的男子

sentences.english: an energetic drive to get more customers
sentences.chinese: 争取更多客户的十足干劲

detailed_translations.english: having or needing a lot of energy or determination

name: rain
trans: vt. 大量地给；使大量落下

sentences.english: a night of wind and rain
sentences.chinese: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.english: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.chinese: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

sentences.english: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.chinese: 外面仍在下雨。

detailed_translations.english: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

sentences.english: He transplanted his family to Australia.
sentences.chinese: 他把家迁到澳大利亚。

sentences.english: He went out to Australia about five years ago.
sentences.chinese: 他大约在五年前移居澳大利亚。

sentences.english: Australia won the toss and put England in to bat.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚队掷币获胜，要求英格兰队首先击球。

name: corner
trans: n. 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境
vt. 垄断；迫至一隅；使陷入绝境；把…难住

sentences.english: He pulled a dirty handkerchief out by its corner and waved it at me.
sentences.chinese: 他拽出一块脏手帕，捏着一角向我挥动。

detailed_translations.chinese: 角落，拐角处；地区，偏僻处；困境，窘境
detailed_translations.english: the point at which two lines or edges meet

sentences.english: Hi, Kelly. How are you?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，凯利，你好吗？

sentences.english: You must all listen carefully.
sentences.chinese: 你们大家都必须仔细听着。

sentences.english: I have some news for you.
sentences.chinese: 我有一些消息要告诉你们。

sentences.english: The letter is addressed to both of you.
sentences.chinese: 信是寄给你们俩的。

sentences.english: Did Robin give you the money?
sentences.chinese: 罗宾把钱给你了吗？

sentences.english: Only you can make this decision.
sentences.chinese: 只有你才能作这个决定。

sentences.english: You idiot!
sentences.chinese: 你这个白痴！

sentences.english: You boys have got to learn to behave yourselves.
sentences.chinese: 你们这些男孩子必须学着规矩点。

sentences.english: Hey, you over there! Get out of the way!
sentences.chinese: 嘿，说你呢，让开！

detailed_translations.english: used to refer to a person or group of people when speaking or writing to them

detailed_translations.chinese: (You)人名；(柬)尤；(东南亚国家华语)猷

name: moon
trans: n. 月亮；月球；月光；卫星

sentences.english: the craters on the surface of the moon
sentences.chinese: 月球表面的环形山

sentences.english: The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
sentences.chinese: 美国人于1969年登上月球。

sentences.english: The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
sentences.chinese: 月亮从云后钻了出来。

sentences.english: The moon rose into the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月亮升上天空。

sentences.english: The moon was shining in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 月儿当空照。

sentences.english: the moons of Saturn
sentences.chinese: 土星的卫星

detailed_translations.english: the round object that you can see shining in the sky at night, and that moves around the Earth every 28 days

sentences.english: What are you doing Sunday?
sentences.chinese: 你星期天做什么？

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

sentences.english: Did you get a good mark in the test?
sentences.chinese: 你这次测验成绩好吗？

detailed_translations.english: a set of questions, exercises, or practical activities to measure someone’s skill, ability, or knowledge
to examine a substance or thing in order to find out its qualities or what it contains

name: hey
trans: int. 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）

sentences.english: Hey, wait a minute!
sentences.chinese: 喂，等一下！

detailed_translations.chinese: 喂！（引起注意等）；你好！（表示问候）
detailed_translations.english: a shout used to get someone’s attention or to show surprise, interest, or annoyance

name: hardly
trans: adv. 几乎不，简直不；刚刚

sentences.english: My parents divorced when I was six, and I hardly knew my father.
sentences.chinese: 我六岁时父母离婚，我对父亲几乎一无所知。

sentences.english: The children were so excited they could hardly speak.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们兴奋得几乎连话都说不出来了。

sentences.english: I can hardly believe it.
sentences.chinese: 这简直让我难以置信。

sentences.english: (= almost no one ) writes to me these days.
sentences.chinese: 如今几乎没有人给我写信了。

sentences.english: Dad ate hardly anything (= almost nothing ).
sentences.chinese: 爸爸几乎没吃什么东西。

sentences.english: There was hardly any (= very little ) traffic.
sentences.chinese: 路上车少人稀。

sentences.english: She lives in Spain, so we hardly ever (= almost never ) see her.
sentences.chinese: 她住在西班牙，所以我们几乎见不到她。

detailed_translations.english: almost not

sentences.english: She’s a dangerous enemy to have.
sentences.chinese: 与她为敌很危险。

sentences.english: Cats and dogs have always been natural enemies.
sentences.chinese: 猫和狗向来是天敌。

sentences.english: an old enemy of her father
sentences.chinese: 她父亲的一个宿敌

sentences.english: the unforgettable sight of the president shaking hands with his sworn enemy
sentences.chinese: 董事长与其死敌握手的难忘情景

sentences.english: I wouldn’t wishthis on my worst enemy.
sentences.chinese: 即使是我的死对头，我也不愿看到他发生这样的事情。

detailed_translations.english: someone who hates you and wants to harm you

name: secretary
trans: n. 秘书；书记；部长；大臣

sentences.english: My secretary will fax you all the details.
sentences.chinese: 我的秘书会把所有的细节发传真给你。

sentences.english: the secretary of the tennis club
sentences.chinese: 网球俱乐部的干事

sentences.english: the Foreign Secretary
sentences.chinese: 外交大臣

detailed_translations.english: someone who works in an office typing letters, keeping records, answering telephone calls, arranging meetings etc

name: island
trans: n. 岛；岛屿；安全岛；岛状物

sentences.chinese: 我住在一个岛上。

sentences.english: Then one day, an English ship anchored near the island.
sentences.chinese: 然后有一天，一艘英国船在岛附近抛锚了。

sentences.english: This is because the island is so close to the equator. So you can choose to go whenever you like.
sentences.chinese: 就因为这个岛是如此接近赤道。所以只要你愿意你任何时候都可以去。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of land completely surrounded by water

name: unit
trans: n. 单位，单元；装置； 部队；部件

sentences.chinese: 家庭是现代社会的基本单位。

sentences.english: control/display/filter etc unit

name: outdoor
trans: adj. 户外的；露天的；野外的（等于out-of-door）

sentences.chinese: 一个规模庞大的露天市场

sentences.english: outdoor recreational activities
sentences.chinese: 户外娱乐活动

sentences.english: outdoor clothing
sentences.chinese: 户外装

sentences.english: a healthy outdoor life
sentences.chinese: 有益健康的户外生活

detailed_translations.english: existing, happening, or used outside, not inside a building

sentences.chinese: 他是一位有声望的科学家。

sentences.english: As a scientist,he disbelieves in Jesus.
sentences.chinese: 作为一名科学家，他不信耶稣。

sentences.english: The scientist thirsts after an achievement.
sentences.chinese: 这名科学家渴望取得成就。

detailed_translations.english: someone who works or is trained in science

sentences.chinese: 这本书会吸引年轻读者。

sentences.english: I’ve always been an avid reader (= someone who reads a lot ) .
sentences.chinese: 我向来是一个嗜书如命的人。

sentences.english: a series of graded English readers
sentences.chinese: 一系列分级英语读物

detailed_translations.english: someone who reads books, or who reads in a particular way

name: inspiration
trans: n. 灵感；鼓舞；吸气；妙计

sentences.english: The Malvern Hills have provided inspiration for many artists and musicians over the decades.
sentences.chinese: 几十年来，莫尔文丘陵为很多艺术家和音乐家提供了灵感。

sentences.english: He raised his eyes to the altar as if seeking inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他抬头看看祭坛，似乎在寻求灵感。

sentences.english: He draws inspiration from ordinary scenes.
sentences.chinese: 他从日常生活中得到灵感。

sentences.english: Mary Quant’s inspiration comes from the glam style of the seventies.
sentences.chinese: 玛莉·官的灵感来自70年代的魅惑风格。

sentences.english: He had a sudden flash of inspiration.
sentences.chinese: 他突然灵感闪现。

sentences.english: He has always been a source of inspiration for me.
sentences.chinese: 他一直是我灵感的源泉。

detailed_translations.chinese: 灵感； 鼓舞人心的人

sentences.english: We need to get this finished as quickly as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须尽快完成此事。

sentences.english: Kids grow up so quickly these days.
sentences.chinese: 现在的孩子长得真快啊。

detailed_translations.english: fast

sentences.english: They partook of our triumph.
sentences.chinese: 他们分享我们的胜利。

sentences.english: She spread our lunch on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 她在草地上摆好了我们的午饭。

sentences.english: We avenged ourselves on  our enemy.
sentences.chinese: 我们向我们的敌人报仇。

sentences.english: We met at 12 noon.
sentences.chinese: 我们中午12点见了面。

detailed_translations.english: 12 o’clock in the daytime

sentences.english: There’s something else I’d like to talk about as well.
sentences.chinese: 我还有其他事情要谈一谈。

sentences.english: I’d like you to come, and anyone else who’s free.
sentences.chinese: 我想请你过来，其他人有空也可以来。

sentences.english: He was awake now, as was everyone else.
sentences.chinese: 他现在已经醒了，其他人也都醒了。

sentences.english: Who else was at the party?
sentences.chinese: 还有谁参加了聚会？

sentences.english: ‘Two coffees, please.’ ‘Anything else?’ ‘No, thanks.’
sentences.chinese: “请来两杯咖啡。”“还要别的吗？”“不要了，谢谢。

sentences.english: (= more than any other things ) she was seeking love.
sentences.chinese: 她追求爱情胜过一切。

sentences.english: If I can't make a living at painting, at least I can teach someone else to paint.
sentences.chinese: 如果我不能以画画谋生的话，至少我能教别人画画。

sentences.chinese: 在那些漫长的旅途中我们别无他事可做。

detailed_translations.english: besides or in addition to someone or something
You use else after words such as "anywhere," "someone," and "what" to refer in a vague way to another person, place, or thing

name: hat
trans: vi. 供应帽子；制造帽子

sentences.english: Maria was wearing a beautiful new hat.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽亚戴着一顶漂亮的新帽子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your head

sentences.english: The waitress has offered her services to us.
sentences.chinese: 这个女服务生已经向我们自荐了。

sentences.english: Susan:Well, if a German man gives a thumbs-up tosgroupsa soda from a waitress in America, she might think he likes her!
sentences.chinese: 苏珊：如果德国人在美国向女服务员伸出大拇指点汽水，她可能会以为他对她有意思呢！

sentences.english: At the tiny restaurant where Xinran eats lunch, the waitress tries to kill herself twice, each time after a little girl’s birthday party.
sentences.chinese: 在欣然吃午饭的小餐馆中，有个女服务员曾两次试图自杀。 每次都是在一个小女孩的生日聚会之后。

detailed_translations.english: a woman who serves food and drink at the tables in a restaurant

name: western
trans: n. 西方人；西部片，西部小说
adj. 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的

sentences.english: the western end of the bay
sentences.chinese: 海湾的西端

sentences.english: Western Australia
sentences.chinese: 西澳大利亚

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的
detailed_translations.english: in or from the west of a country or area

detailed_translations.chinese: 西方人；西部片，西部小说
detailed_translations.english: a film about life in the 19th century in the American West, especially the lives of cowboys

name: appear
trans: vi. 出现；显得；似乎；出庭；登场

sentences.english: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.chinese: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.english: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.chinese: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.english: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.chinese: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.english: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.chinese: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.english: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.chinese: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

detailed_translations.english: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

name: must
trans: aux. 必须，一定；可以，应当；很可能
n. 绝对必要的事物；未发酵葡萄汁

sentences.english: All passengers must wear seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 所有乘客都必须系安全带。

sentences.english: It’s getting late. I really must go.
sentences.chinese: 天晚了，我真的必须走了。

sentences.english: You must work hard.
sentences.chinese: 你必须努力工作。

sentences.english: We must all be patient.
sentences.chinese: 我们都必须耐心。

sentences.english: Must I pay now?
sentences.chinese: 我必须现在付款吗？

sentences.english: For the engine to work, the green lever must be in the ‘up’ position.
sentences.chinese: 要启动引擎，绿色操纵杆必须在“上”这一挡。

sentences.english: Accidents must be reported to the safety officer.
sentences.chinese: 出了事故必须向安全员报告。

detailed_translations.english: to have to do something because it is necessary or important, or because of a law or order

name: discovery
trans: n. 发现，发觉；被发现的事物

sentences.english: the discovery of oil in Alaska
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉斯加发现石油

sentences.english: The Hubble Telescope allowed astronomers to make significant discoveries about our galaxy.
sentences.chinese: 哈勃望远镜使天文学家对我们的银河系有了重大发现。

detailed_translations.english: when someone discovers something

name: according to
trans: prep. 根据；按照；据（…所说）；按（…所报道）

sentences.english: According to the police, his attackers beat him with a blunt instrument.
sentences.chinese: 按照警方的说法，袭击者用钝器击打他。

sentences.english: There is now widespread support for these proposals, according to a recent public opinion poll.
sentences.chinese: 根据最近的民意调查，目前人们普遍支持这些提议。

detailed_translations.english: as shown by something or stated by someone

name: weak
trans: adj.  疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的

sentences.english: The illness left her feeling weak.
sentences.chinese: 疾病使她感到身体虚弱。

sentences.english: Poor light produces weak plants.
sentences.chinese: 光照不足，植物就生长不好。

sentences.english: The animal was weak from loss of blood.
sentences.chinese: 那只动物因失血而虚弱无力。

detailed_translations.chinese: [经] 疲软的；虚弱的；无力的；不牢固的
detailed_translations.english: not physically strong

name: magician
trans: n. 魔术师，变戏法的人

sentences.english: As a magician, his reputation spread all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个魔术师，他的名声传播到了世界各地。

detailed_translations.english: a man in stories who can use magic

sentences.english: orange juice
sentences.chinese: 橙汁

sentences.english: orange peel
sentences.chinese: 橙子皮

sentences.english: Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )
sentences.chinese: 柑橘园

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

name: check
trans: n. <美>支票；制止，抑制；检验，核对
vi. 核实，查核；中止；打勾；将一军
vt. 检查，核对；制止，抑制；在…上打勾

sentences.english: Check the tiles carefully before you buy them.
sentences.chinese: 购买之前要把瓷砖仔细检查一下。

sentences.english: A first rule in solving any mystery is to check the facts.
sentences.chinese: 揭开谜团的第一条规则是核查事实。

sentences.english: The police are failing to take adequate measures to check the growth in crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方未能采取适当的措施来阻止犯罪率上升。

sentences.english: Conduct regular checks on your water quality.
sentences.chinese: 要经常检查水质。

trans: n. 监视器；监听器；监控器；显示屏；班长

sentences.chinese: 你未来有什么打算？

sentences.chinese: 这些岛屿应当有权决定自己的未来。

sentences.chinese: 他们把家具往后挪以便练习舞蹈动作。

sentences.chinese: 我的朋友都认为我是彻底疯了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 疯狂的；发疯的；愚蠢的；着迷的

trans: vt. 检查；调查； 检测；考试

sentences.chinese: 里基转身走了。

sentences.chinese: 她惊讶地转过头来。

detailed_translations.english: a sudden or unexpected change that makes a situation develop in a different way

detailed_translations.english: not far away

sentences.chinese: 经改建后这所房子增值了一倍。

sentences.chinese: 我们决定给房子估一估价。

sentences.chinese: 她去年3月开始在这儿工作。

detailed_translations.english: the third month of the year, between February and April

sentences.chinese: 谢谢你的建议，它非常有用。

sentences.chinese: 如果我们在这里解决一些关键问题会很有用的。

sentences.chinese: 你想喝点什么？

sentences.chinese: 请坐，我去给你倒杯喝的。

sentences.chinese: 她把杯子倒满后喝了起来。

sentences.chinese: 我学习大都在晚上。

sentences.chinese: 周五晚上我通常都不在家。

sentences.chinese: 明天晚上你打算做什么？

sentences.chinese: 彼得昨天晚上走了。

sentences.chinese: 我今晚和你见面。

sentences.chinese: 我们到家时已经是傍晚了。

sentences.english: We had just finished our evening meal when the doorbell rang.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚吃完晚饭门铃就响了。

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.english: the best way of solving our dilemma
sentences.chinese: 解决我们两难处境的最佳办法

sentences.english: attempts to solve a mathematical equation
sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

detailed_translations.english: to find or provide a way of dealing with a problem

sentences.chinese: 你今天运气不太好，是不是？

sentences.english: He’s had good luck with his roses this year.
sentences.chinese: 今年他种玫瑰的运气不错。

name: visitor

sentences.chinese: 时代广场每年吸引三千多万游客。

detailed_translations.chinese: 访问者，参观者；视察者；候鸟

sentences.english: Let me tell you a little bit about myself.
sentences.chinese: 我来给你稍微讲讲我自己吧。

sentences.english: We didn’t have toys like this when I was little.
sentences.chinese: 在我小时候，我们没有这样的玩具。

detailed_translations.english: small in size

name: letter
trans: n. 信；字母，文字；证书；文学，学问；字面意义

sentences.english: I got a letter from Melanie today.
sentences.chinese: 今天我收到梅拉妮的一封信。

sentences.english: There are 26 letters in the English alphabet.
sentences.chinese: 英语字母表有26个字母。

detailed_translations.english: a written or printed message that is usually put in an envelope and sent by mail

name: yours
trans: pron. 你（们）的东西；你的责任；你的家属；来信，尊函
adj. 你（们）的（东西）；信末署名前用语

sentences.english: This is our room, and yours is just across the hall.
sentences.chinese: 这是我们的房间，你们的在走廊那边。

sentences.english: A lot of people have money problems, but yours are more serious than most people’s.
sentences.chinese: 许多人有财务问题，不过你的问题比大多数人的要严重。

sentences.english: A cash prize of £10,000 or a new car – the choice is yours.
sentences.chinese: 一万英镑的奖金或一辆新车——随你选择。

detailed_translations.chinese: 你（们）的东西；你的责任[义务]；你的家属；来信，尊函
detailed_translations.english: used when speaking or writing to one or more people to refer to something that belongs to them or is connected with them

detailed_translations.chinese: 你（们）的（东西）；信末署名前用语

name: reply
trans: vi. 回答； 答辩；回击

sentences.english: I asked Clive where he was going, but he didn’t reply.
sentences.chinese: 我问克莱夫到哪儿去，但他没有回答。

sentences.english: Sorry it took me so long to reply.
sentences.chinese: 抱歉，我过了这么久才回复。

sentences.english: ‘Did you see Simon today?’ ‘Of course,’ Nathalie replied with a smile.
sentences.chinese: “你今天见到西蒙了吗？”“当然啦。”纳萨莉笑着答道。

sentences.english: I tried calling, but there was no reply.
sentences.chinese: 我试着打电话去，但没有人接。

detailed_translations.english: to answer someone by saying or writing something
something that is said, written, or done as a way of replying

name: fiction
trans: n. 小说；虚构，编造；谎言

sentences.english: romantic fiction
sentences.chinese: 爱情小说

sentences.english: historical fiction
sentences.chinese: 历史小说

sentences.english: For years he managed to keep up the fiction that he was not married.
sentences.chinese: 多年来他设法一直给人一种未婚的假象。

detailed_translations.english: books and stories about imaginary people and events

sentences.english: pork chops
sentences.chinese: 猪排

detailed_translations.english: the meat from pigs

name: sore
trans: n. 溃疡，痛处；恨事，伤心事
adj. 疼痛的，痛心的；剧烈的，极度的；恼火的，发怒的；厉害的，迫切的

sentences.english: I had a sore throat and aching limbs.
sentences.chinese: 我喉咙疼，四肢酸痛。

sentences.english: Mac’s still sore because I didn’t invite him.
sentences.chinese: 马克还在因为我没邀请他而生气呢。

sentences.english: They were starving and covered with sores.
sentences.chinese: 他们在挨饿，身上长满了疮。

detailed_translations.english: a part of your body that is sore is painful, because of infection or because you have used a muscle too much
a painful, often red, place on your body caused by a wound or infection

name: highly
trans: adv. 高度地；非常；非常赞许地

sentences.english: Tom’s mother was highly critical of the school’s approach.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆的母亲对学校的处理方法持强烈的批评态度。

sentences.english: highly competitive industries
sentences.chinese: 竞争非常激烈的行业

sentences.english: a highly desirable neighborhood
sentences.chinese: 宜居的街区

sentences.english: T.S. Eliot’s highly influential poem, ‘The Waste Land’ T.S.
sentences.chinese: 艾略特极有影响力的诗作《荒原》

sentences.english: a highly developed economy
sentences.chinese: 高度发达的经济

detailed_translations.english: very

name: pianist
trans: n. 钢琴家；钢琴演奏者

sentences.english: They fashioned him into a fine pianist.
sentences.chinese: 他们把他培养成一个优秀的钢琴家。

sentences.english: He is now being  coached by a famous pianist.
sentences.chinese: 他现在正由一位著名的钢琴家进行辅导。

sentences.english: The pianist was irked because the audience's coughing drowned out his playing.
sentences.chinese: 这名钢琴演奏者很厌烦，因为听众的咳嗽声盖过了他的演奏。

detailed_translations.english: someone who plays the piano

sentences.english: Nowadays people are rarely shocked by the sex they see on television.
sentences.chinese: 如今人们在电视上看见性爱镜头不太会感到吃惊了。

sentences.english: Most people nowadays are aware of the importance of a healthy diet.
sentences.chinese: 现在大多数人都明白健康饮食的重要性。

detailed_translations.english: now, compared with what happened in the past

sentences.english: Would you consider ping-pong an outdoor sport?
sentences.chinese: 你认为乒乓球是一项户外运动吗？

sentences.english: But it could also have another application: electron ping-pong.
sentences.chinese: 不过它也有另一项用途：电子乒乓球。

sentences.english: She is a great ping-pong player.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个优秀的乒乓球运动员。

detailed_translations.english: Ping-Pong is the game of

name: free
trans: adj. 免费的；自由的，不受约束的； 游离的

sentences.english: He knew he could be free in as little as three years.
sentences.chinese: 他知道只要再过三年他就能自由了。

sentences.english: With one leap he was free!
sentences.chinese: 这一跳他就自由了！

sentences.english: He walked out of the courtroom a free man .
sentences.chinese: 他从法庭走出来，成了自由人。

sentences.english: They have called on the government to set all political prisoners free .
sentences.chinese: 他们呼吁政府释放所有政治犯。

sentences.english: He was found not guilty and walked free from the court.
sentences.chinese: 他被判无罪，当庭释放。

sentences.english: The animals are allowed to run free in the park.
sentences.chinese: 那些动物可以在公园里自由奔跑。

sentences.english: I’m free next weekend.
sentences.chinese: 下个周末我有空。

detailed_translations.english: not held, tied up, or kept somewhere as a prisoner

name: make
trans: vt. 使得；进行；布置，准备，整理；制造；认为；获得；形成；安排；引起；构成
vi. 开始；前进；增大；被制造

sentences.english: I’m going to show you how to make a box for your tools.
sentences.chinese: 我来教你怎么做一个箱子存放工具。

sentences.english: A family of mice had made their nest in the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝老鼠在屋顶上安了家。

sentences.english: She made her own wedding dress.
sentences.chinese: 她的婚纱是自己做的。

sentences.english: The company has been making quality furniture for over 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 这家公司制作优质家具有两百多年的历史了。

sentences.english: They met while they were making a film.
sentences.chinese: 他们是在拍电影时认识的。

sentences.english: I was made to wait four hours before I was examined by a doctor.
sentences.chinese: 我被迫等了四个小时才有一个医生给我做检查。

detailed_translations.english: to produce something, for example by putting the different parts of it together
